developer: Resources for Mothers Of Today and Tomorrow
description: Home Remedies and recipes for you to use today. Download today to see what remedies we have to offer. Home Remedies MD is a mobile application that is based around providing natural treatments to help get rid of the must common illnesses that people experience. We strive to blend great information with a little bit of social interaction to keep our audience engaged in our content. Editorial Team HomeRemediesMD.com is lead by a diverse group of editors with combined experience in health, wellness, fitness, nutrition, parenting, and lifestyle content. Our talented editors have written for several large online health and lifestyle publications. Robin Hale – is an entrepreneur and freelance writer who began researching health and fitness long before the holistic approach or the move towards alternative medicine became popular. She has worked with leading doctors and research analysts to bring clarity to topics such as Type 2 Diabetes, weight loss, and nutrition. Robin believes that the first step toward wellness is a full understanding of how the body operates in certain situations and why it reacts the way it does. With that information, individuals are more able to work with their bodies natural abilities, instead of merely masking symptoms with medication. Rebecca Fein – is the founder of Fein Life Coaching. Rebecca’s greatest joy is watching her clients transform their lives through their relationships. When Rebecca isn’t coaching she enjoys spending time with her husband and also with their dog.Visit http://feinlife.webs.com to download a FREE report called 5 Steps To Starting Over. Sarah Rasheed - Is a 22-year-old college student majoring in sociology with a passion for writing about health and wellness. When Sarah is not actively participating in sports herself, she likes to spend time trying to get children and adults in her community active and participate in sports as well. Jesse Kehrley – Is 26 years old and lives in South Carolina with his wife and three kids. Jesse has a passion for writing and home remedies, and he is active in the autism community to support his two autistic sons. Brett Stewart – is a Certified Personal Trainer and author of several fitness books including 7 Weeks to 50 Pull-Ups and 7 Weeks to Getting Ripped. An ultramarathoner and Ironman, Brett’s passions run deep for endurance sports. Follow him on Twitter @fiftypullups Regina Woodard – ”Originally from Arizona and now living in Denver, Gina is currently a freelance writer for a variety of online publications. Though she is now writing in a professional capacity, her love of writing actually began at an early age. Her website of Spantenna.com is a showcase of her original and fan based creative works.” Katie Mitchell – is a freelance writer living in Grand Rapids, Michigan. She has been writing professionally since 2006, and doing so in the health field since 2007. In addition to writing her interests include history, Ireland, vegetarianism, consumer ethics and yoga.

One in eight women in the UK will get breast cancer in their lifetime. The earlier the cancer is found, the better the chance of beating it. This app will help women be breast aware and could make all the difference. The app includes a breast check video demonstrating how women can check their breasts, the ability to set your own reminders for a breast check, and a risk report to assess how your lifestyle could affect your risk of getting breast cancer. The app also contains information about Breakthrough Breast Cancer and offers you a number of ways to get involved and help us continue our pioneering work in the fight against breast cancer. Edith Bowman, DJ & presenter said, "My mum survived breast cancer, we were lucky to catch it so early, so the work that Breakthrough Breast Cancer does is incredibly close to my heart. Many women aren't checking their breasts because they either don't think they are at risk, don't know how to check themselves or just simply forget to do it. It's fantastic that Breakthrough Breast Cancer has developed iBreastCheck specifically with all these considerations in mind, I'll have it to remind me to check and hopefully thousands of women will do the same." iBreastCheck was the winner of the New Media Age Effectiveness Awards 2011 (Charity and Voluntary Sector), and a finalist in the Technology4Good Awards 2011; Marketing Week Engage Awards 2011 (Charity and Voluntary Sector); CIPR Excellence Awards 2011 (Healthcare category); Third Sector Excellence Awards 2011 (Best Use of Digital); PR Week Awards 2011 (Not for Profit category); and Charity Times Awards 2011 (Best Use of Technology).

description: Silences all sounds including Alarm and Media sounds. Quick and easy way to completely silence your phone. If other applications try to change the volume, or if you manually change the volume, a notification will alert you to the change. Perfect for when you need to quickly silence your phone and don't want to have to deal with complicated settings or setting up volume profiles.

This app streams games from a GameStream-compatible PC on your local network or the Internet (Streaming over LTE is supported, although data usage is high and you may have latency issues). After initial pairing, Moonlight will show a list of apps to stream from your PC. You can add any other apps to this list through GeForce Experience. Mouse, keyboard, and controller input is sent from your Android device to the PC. To have a good experience, you need a mid to high-end wireless router with a good wireless connection to your Android device (5 GHz highly recommended) and a good connection from your PC to your router (Ethernet highly recommended). Disclaimer: This app is not affiliated with NVIDIA Corporation. Please do not contact them for support. Instead, use the XDA forum link at the bottom of the app description. Users using an external mouse will want to use the root version instead which has much better mouse support (no double cursors or screen border issues). See: http://tinyurl.com/moonlight-root If you're streaming over the Internet from behind a router, you will need to forward ports manually. The specific ports are here: http://tinyurl.com/k6hf2c6 PC Requirements: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 600/700/800/900 series desktop or mobile GPU (GT-series GPUs won't work) NVIDIA GeForce Experience (GFE) 2.2.2 or higher Most controllers will work just fine, but the following have been tested: Xbox 360 wired/wireless PS3 wired (with Sixaxis Enabler app) or wireless (with SixAxis Controller app) PS4 wired via USB MOGA controller (see note below) Amazon Fire Game Controller Shield integrated controller MOGA controller users: If your controller has a switch with A and B, it must be switched to B to be used for streaming. If you have no switch, use the MOGA Universal Driver app. Note for SixAxis users: Use SixAxis in "Native Gamepad" mode for Moonlight. The default button mapping needs to be adjusted to match the standard controller layout for streaming. Instructions: 1. Make sure GeForce Experience is installed, updated, and that you've scanned for games. 2. In most cases, your PC will show up automatically in the PC list. Click the entry in the PC list to start pairing. 3. On your PC, enter the PIN displayed on the Android device and accept the pairing dialog. 4. Choose your PC in the PC list and the app list will be displayed where you can select a game to stream. Troubleshooting - "Moonlight crashes" 1. Please send me an email. 2. Send the crash report. Troubleshooting - "I can't pair/stream at all" 1. Reboot your PC and device. 2. Disable your PC's firewall. 3. If all else fails: uninstall GeForce drivers, reboot, clean install GeForce drivers, and reboot again. Troubleshooting - "Video is choppy/laggy" 1. Try streaming with Bluetooth disabled to see if your device has the Bluetooth issue detailed below. 2. Make sure your device is connected on 5 GHz and your PC is wired to your router. 3. Lower the bitrate slider. 4. Try using 720p30 which has the lowest requirements. Troubleshooting - "Apps crash when launched by Moonlight" 1. Uninstall GeForce drivers, reboot, clean install GeForce drivers, and reboot again. 2. Try launching them through Steam Bluetooth-related streaming issues: Depending on your phone/tablet, you may have a bad streaming experience if Bluetooth is active while streaming. This is a hardware issue due to the antenna wiring. If you experience this, you can try a USB Ethernet adapter or a controller that connects directly to your Android device via USB OTG. For more details and to report issues, see: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2505510 This app is open-source under the GPL. The code can be found here: https://github.com/moonlight-stream/moonlight-android Legal: All trademarks cited here are the property of their respective owners.
release_text: v3.1.6 - May 5, 2015 - Fix a bug where multiple controllers could be recognized as a single controller (particularly with Xbox 360 wireless adapters) - Pass through capacitive buttons on Samsung devices so the back button can be used to exit streaming

description: Lunafaqt is an app to render the moon on any specific date and or location. It also calculates the rise and set times for the sun and moon, twilight times, time and date for the next moon phase. If you have an issue, please contact me by emailing me at lunafaqt@gmail.com and i will do everything i can to resolve your issue. Features: - Draws the current phase of the moon with parallactic angle - Swipe left/right to increase/decrease the date by a day - Two homescreen widgets with moon image and rise/set times - Adjustable widget transparency - Location based on GPS or manual coordinates - Coordinate lookup by address, city name, postal code or landmark - Adjustable date and time in 12/24 hour format - Sun rise, set and twilight times for the given location - Moon rise, set and transit times for the given location - Percentage of the moon's visible disk illuminated - Current moon altitude and azimuth in degrees - Moon age and distance to Earth - Current zodiac sign the moon is in - Date and times of the next major phases - Lunar calendar wich shows the phases for one month with indications of the major phases, swipe left/right to change the month - Supports installation to SD card (Note: if installed to SD card, the widgets won't work! This is not a bug but an Android issue. See: http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=8555 ) - Language support for English, Dutch, German, French, Italian, Russian, Czech and Spanish - Ad supported (can be removed with an in-app purchase)

description: With Caddy's Electronic Patient Health & Medical Records system, you can manage and share your patient list as well as patient tasks, notes, medications, records, images, and messages anywhere, anytime. Key features: - Share patient records securely within your healthcare team. - Take medical images of patient wounds and skin rashes. - Manage patient tasks list and assign jobs to healthcare members in your medical team. - Offline access to 125 medical calculators - Records patient problems, family history, and clinical alerts. - Add medications to easily track what your patients are taking. Medical tasks and messaging: - Use the quick tick box list for selecting medical tasks. - Customize the tick box list so you can quickly record patient tasks on ward rounds - Assign tasks within your medical team so everyone knows their plan for the day - Send comments and messages about specific tasks securely and easily. Help is always on hand - Add images to the patient's record and share them with your team Medical notes (EMR) - Records a patient's visit to your health clinic - Never miss an opportunity on ward rounds to write medical notes again Patient list: - Quickly review your patient list - Always know where your patient is located by updating ward and room information - Note demographic information such as date of birth and ethnicity. Other features include: Health & Medical Calculator: - Over 125 medical calculators - Each medical calculator offers healthcare recommendations - Fully referenced calculators - Health & Medical Calculators are constantly updated Drug Reference: - Powered by FDA drug database - Provides drug mechanism of action, drug indications, drug contraindications, physiological effects, and drug interactions Health News: - News from over 10 different health journals and news websites - Stay up to date with the latest trends and clinical breakthroughs - Healthcare news is automatically updated There are now over 500 reviews for Caddy, and while we started out as just a health & medical calculator, we have the goal to create an advanced healthcare record to help clinicians and patients around the world. Want to be involved? E-mail Caddy support. Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CaddyMed

description: AlMosaly is an Islamic prayer reminder app; it's the most important Islamic app for all Muslims all around the world. As it has a very accurate prayer times, Qibla, Fasting, Day – night & prayer' Azkar, Ramadan Emsakia, Calendar and Quran. AlMosaly has two unique features which called "Silent mode during prayer" and" Mosques "which is showing the nearest mosques to your location with a very accurate GBS. Features: 1- Shows prayer times daily or for a whole week with any date you specify. 2- Shows Qibla direction with respect to: North, Sun and Moon direction. 3- GPS is supported to get prayer times or Qibla direction wherever you are. 4- Hijri (Arabic) Calendar and its corresponding Gregorian calendar 5- Ramadan Emsakeya(fajr and sunset) times 6- Quran share alerts, and saving your last read position. 7- Each prayer has its own alerts that you can adjust as you like: Alert for Azan time, before prayer times,and for iqama time . 8- AlMosaly also alerts you for other islamic activities like: evening prayers (qiyam), Duha prayer, Azkar, fasting, Friday alerts, and more activates which important to Islam. 9- You can select your location among thousands of cities all over the world, or you can add your custom location using GPS. 10- We offer "Mosques" screen where you find near mosques to you location on the map with routes to them. 11- On the application main screen we show selected videos for Mecca, Kaaba and Madina views. Keywords: Adhan, Allah, Compass, Mosque, Muslim, athan, hadith, tasbih, alarm, fajr, sahoor, full, book; search, year, dawn, round, calculator, translation, clock, season.

Una ricca e imperdibile raccolta di rebus linguistici! Gioca con più di 80 di rebus organizzati in 9 categorie: Anagramma, Bifronte, Cambio, Locuzione, Ossimoro, Paronomasia, Scarto, Sinestesia, Zeppa. Osserva le immagini e collegale tra loro per ottenere frasi o parole di senso compiuto! I rebus sono stati ideati dagli esperti linguistici Treccani. Regole del gioco - Risolvi il maggior numero di rebus seguendo le regole linguistiche proposte. - Una volta risolto il rebus premi il tasto "Fatto" per verificare se la risposta è corretta. - La risposta è corretta se viene visualizzato un simbolo verde, errata se viene visualizzato un simbolo rosso. Funzionalità: - Tasto fatto, per verificare la correttezza delle risposte - Salvataggio automatico dei risultati acquisiti. A rich collection of linguistic enigmas and unmissable! Play with more than 80 of rebus organized into 9 categories: Anagram, two-faced, Currency Exchange, An expression, Oxymoron, Paronomasia, Scrap, Synesthesia, Wedge.   Look at the pictures and connect them together to make phrases or words that makes sense!   The puzzles are designed by language experts Treccani.   Rules of the game - Solve the puzzle by following the highest number of linguistic rules proposals. - Once you have solved the puzzle press "Done" to check whether the answer is correct. - The answer is correct if you see a green symbol, wrong if you see a red symbol.   Functionality: - Key made to verify the correctness of the answers - Automatic saving of the results obtained.

What is Different is a Find It style game; just spot the difference between the two images! At first glance, the two images appear to be identical. But looks can be deceiving. There are actually five differences between them. Can you spot them all? Do not think you’ll just walk through all the images within a minute though! What is Different contains three levels. Starting with the ‘easier’ images in level one, to the brain-cracking third level! How it works: At the start of a level you get 60 seconds to find all 5 differences. For each image you complete you'll receive 30 bonus seconds! Finding a difference will score you points. Finding a difference FAST will score you more points! Each level has its own online -world-wide- leaderboard! Do you think you can reach a top 10 score? More realistic and thorough gaming experience!!! What are you hesitating about? Just download it!!!

description: Automaton Locker from Automaton Family focuses on Automating your Device by making Locking & Unlocking device wonderfully Simple & MAGICAL!!!! ♥ XDA : “Magically” wakes your device right when you want to use it ♥ ♥ Designed for Phones, Phablets & Tablets too. Automaton Locker provides powers to Control Locking & Unlocking your device : ♥ Intelligent algorithm to lock & unlock when required ● Gives you ability to use various sensors of your device like Proximity, Light, etc Sensors depending upon which Sensor configuration you choose & very high precision of determining whether to lock / unlock device. ● Instantly locks & unlocks your device just when you want to ● Designed for both Flip Cover & Pocket usage. ♥ Many customizations ♥ Low battery consumption ● You can skip your lock-screen or directly open Home Screen for instant access to your device ● Keep the screen ON till you lock the screen using Automaton or power key! This is great when you need to look at the screen continuously. ● Stops the sensors when you don't need them. Works wonders for saving battery ● Tons of Sensor Modes to choose from, depending on your use and convenience! Also available variety of features which you would love to use. Extra Features : ● Auto Smartness : Auto Smartness will disable sensors when not required, saving battery. Note: Works only if Sensor Function is Lock or Unlock else Only lockscreen is ON. ● KitKat break time : Rejects sensor events for 'x' seconds after Locking Device, saves battery by disabling sensors. ● Only Lockscreen : Automaton will restrict locking of device on lockscreen only. But unlocking will work as usual. ● Ignore App List: Select the app for which my app should stop, for preventing accidental lock. Example: While playing games, app doesn't disturb during that game. Also while using camera. ● Invert Ignore App List ● Night Mode: Automaton stops all services during the time interval selected. Useful during night. ● Calibration: Default values for locking & unlocking can be tweaked for better reaction ● Custom ROM support: Applies special tweaks during first start up ● Say Time: Tells you the time on Unlock! ● Plethora of Well Tailored Settings for Customizing the working of App ♥ Experience true Automation in Locking & Unlocking your device ♥ Join the Automaton Discussion on G+ Community : https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/106788352862993148768 Want Automaton Locker in your language? Join the translation project here: http://www.getlocalization.com/AutomatonUnlock/ Basic Uses: ● Automated experience ● Controls Device ● Basic Locking and Unlocking of device ● Saves the hardware keys from damage ● Saves battery by instantly locking device instead of pressing any keys ● No need to find the unlock/lock hardware key again ● Super fast access to device as compared to the usual methods ● Makes you the MAGIC MAN!!!! ● Keeps the screen ON during some work when you constantly need your device ● Pocket Friendly ● Helps you instantly unlock while driving (Don't try !) For USAGE details refer Tutorial in App Please, read FAQ for more information --------------------------------------------------------- APP EXPIRES AFTER 31 DAYS OF INSTALLATION In order to continue using the app after that period, purchase the Automaton Unlocker, but first make sure you are fully satisfied with Automaton Locker --------------------------------------------------------- I want to thank all the beta testers, especially from the XDA forum & the people who took part in the translation project. Without you it would have never come out of the beta stage! Thank you! Before giving any Bad Review just mail me your problem. If I can't solve it then you are free to give any review you want Translations : German - Marc Napitupulu Dutch - Martinuse @ Xda Russian - Proser Simplified Chinese - Felix2yu

description: The game of Durak appeared in the 19th century in Russia. This is one of the few card games, in which it is possible to develop a clear plan of action. The richness and variety of different combinations, Durak leaves far behind the Checkers, and to some extent comparable to chess. Strategy game based on memorization of cards, probability theory, and psychology.

Приложение для нумизматов и просто интересующихся. Может использоваться как инструмент для работы с коллекцией, либо как справочник. Содержит полный перечень юбилейных монет и монет регулярного чекана с 1921 года, также содержит информацию о пробных монетах СССР. Более 1200 монет! Юбилейные серии в недрагоценных металлах: Юбилейные монеты СССР Юбилейные монеты банка России (1992-1995) (В том числе, серия "Красная книга") Юбилейные монеты РФ (есть новые монеты 2013 года) Каждая монета имеет описание, которое выводится при нажатии на изображение. Есть возможность указывать сколько монет имеется у вас в коллекции, качество монеты. Есть возможность просматривать вашу коллекцию в табличном виде, экспорт в excel! Можно к монетам оставлять пометки, комментарии. Можно устанавливать, какие монеты отображать в разделе по наличию: все монеты, нет в наличии, есть и есть более 1. Сортировать по номиналу, дате, названию, по количеству имеющихся монет. Гибкий поиск позволяет выводить монеты не только по годам, но и по номиналу, а также наличию в коллекции. Можно экспортировать в excel любые сформированные списки (например, список монет которых не хватает в коллекции или список для обмена из определенной серии, или список монет определенного номинала) Есть резервное копирование вашей коллекции, которая может быть перенесена на другое устройство. Приложение содержит цены на монеты. Цена формируется на основе каталога "Конрос", актуальным предложениям на аукционах. Цена зависит от заданного качества. Обновление цен примерно раз в квартал. Редкие монеты имеют желтый фон, раритетные красный. Есть возможность искать предложения в интернет-магазине по выбранной монете. (Пока это Молоток.ру) Для этого нужно нажать на иконку с буквой "m" и сразу попадете на сайт со списком предложений. С помощью приложения "Монеты России и СССР", вы всегда сможете быстро и точно оценить ценность монеты попавшей к вам в руки. И кто знает, может вам повезет, и она окажется раритетной. Ваша коллекция, теперь всегда под рукой! Рассмотрим варианты сотрудничества, размещение вашей рекламы в приложении. ______________________________ ВНИМАНИЕ! - Для группировки монет по номиналу нужно воспользоваться разделом "поиск", задав в нем нужный раздел и номинал. - Рекомендуется делать резервное копирование вашей коллекции, чтоб ее всегда можно было восстановить, если случится какой то сбой. В настройках кнопка "Сохранить на SD". Для переноса коллекции на другое устройство, нужно сделать резервное копирование, затем перенести папку "allcoinrus" на новое устройство и зайдя в настройки в меню программы, воспользоваться "Загрузить с SD". - Для восстановления полной версии, при переустановке приложения или на другом вашем устройстве (поддерживающем покупку на google play, так же нужно быть авторизованным под аккаунтом с которого было совершена покупка) нужно на главной странице нажать "Полная версия", ИНТЕРНЕТ должен быть включен! Повторно покупать ничего не надо! - Для работы приложения нужно около 1мб свободной памяти в телефоне, для создания базы данных. ______________________________ Если вам понравилось наше приложение и вы заинтересованы в дальнейшей разработке приложений для нумизматов под Андроид, можете поддержать наш проект и перейти на полную версию без рекламы с более расширенным функционалом. ______________________________ Преимущества полной версии: - отсутствие рекламы - нет ограничения в 100 монет при поиске - для сводных таблиц доступны все разделы - возможность указывать качество монеты - экспорт в excel - оставлять комментарии к монетам в любом разделе Application for numismatists and simply interested in. Can be used as a tool to work with a collection, or as a reference. For a complete list of commemorative coins and coins regular coinage since 1921, also contains information about Pix USSR. 1200 coins! Commemorative Series in precious metals: Commemorative coins of the USSR Commemorative coins of the Bank of Russia (1992-1995) (Including the series "Red Book") Commemorative coins of the Russian Federation (new coins 2013) Each coin has a description that is displayed when you click on the image. It is possible to specify how many coins do you have in the collection, the quality of the coins. It is possible to view your collection in a tabular format, export to excel! You can leave notes to coins, comments. You can specify which coin is displayed in the section on stock: all the coins is not available, there is more than one. Sort by denomination, date, name, the number of coins available. Flexible search allows you to display the coins not only data, but also at par, as well as the presence in the collection. You can export to excel any generated lists (for example, a list of coins that are missing in the collection or list for the exchange of certain series, or a list of coins specific denomination) There are backup your collection, which can be transferred to another device. The application contains the price of the coin. Price is based on the catalog "Konros" best offers at auction. The price depends on the specified quality. Update prices about once a quarter. Rare coins have a yellow background, rare red. There is an opportunity to seek suggestions from the online store of the selected coin. (While this Molotok.ru,) To do this, click on the icon with the letter "m" and land at the site with a list of suggestions. With the application "Coins of Russia and the USSR", you will always be able to quickly and accurately assess the value of the coin has fallen into your hands. And who knows, maybe you are lucky and it will be a rarity. Your collection is now always at hand! Consider options for cooperation, placing your ad in your application. ______________________________ CAUTION - For groups of coins at face value we need to use the "Search", specifying therein the desired section and the denomination. - It is recommended to make a backup of your collection, so it was always possible to recover, if it happens that some fail. In the settings button "Save to SD". To transfer the collection to another device, you need to back up, then move the folder "allcoinrus" on the new device and go to the settings in the menu, use the "Upload to SD". - To restore the full version when you reinstall the application or another your device (supports purchase on google play, just have to be authorized by the account from which it was made the purchase) should be on the main page, click the "Full Version", the Internet should be included! Re-buy do not need anything! - For the application needs about 1MB of free memory in the phone to create the database. ______________________________ If you like our app, and you are interested in further developing applications for numismatists under Android, can support our project and go to the full version without ads with more advanced features. ______________________________ Advantages of the complete version: - Lack of advertising - No limitations when searching for coins 100 - Summary tables are available for all sections - The ability to specify the quality of the coin - Export to excel - Comments to the coins in any section

description: Интересуетесь ли вы нумизматикой — наукой, связанной со всем, что касается монет и их истории? Это для кого-то — хобби, для кого-то — профессия, а для кого-то — целый смысл жизни. Представляем приложение по монетам царского периода России (1700-1917). Данное приложение-справочник послужит хорошим инструментом как для нумизматов, так и для людей увлекающихся кладоискательством. Содержит более 3100 монет с описанием! Есть возможность указывать сколько монет имеется у вас в коллекции, качество монеты. Есть возможность просматривать вашу коллекцию в табличном виде, экспорт в excel! Можно к монетам оставлять пометки, комментарии. Есть резервное копирование вашей коллекции, которая может быть перенесена на другое устройство. Приложение содержит цены на монеты. Редкие монеты имеют желтый фон, раритетные красный. Есть возможность искать предложения в интернет-магазине по выбранной монете. (Пока это Молоток.ру) Для этого нужно нажать на иконку с буквой "m" и сразу попадете на сайт со списком предложений. С помощью приложения "Монеты Царской России", вы всегда сможете быстро и точно оценить ценность монеты попавшей к вам в руки. Ваша коллекция, теперь всегда под рукой! В приложении присутствуют рекламные блоки от AdMob, автор не несет ответственности за их содержание. Рассмотрим варианты сотрудничества. Are you interested in numismatics - science related to all matters relating to coins and their history? This is for someone - a hobby, for someone - a profession, but for someone - the whole meaning of life. We present an application for coins Imperial Russia period (1700-1917). This application catalog will be a good tool for numismatists, and for people keen on seeking a treasure. Contains more than 3100 coins with the description! It is possible to specify how many coins do you have in the collection, the quality of the coins. It is possible to view your collection in a tabular format, export to excel! You can leave notes to coins, comments. There are backup your collection, which can be transferred to another device. The application contains the price of the coin. Rare coins have a yellow background, rare red. There is an opportunity to seek suggestions from the online store of the selected coin. (While this Molotok.ru,) To do this, click on the icon with the letter "m" and land at the site with a list of suggestions. With the application "Coins of Imperial Russia," you will always be able to quickly and accurately assess the value of the coin has fallen into your hands. Your collection is now always at hand! In the present application ad units from AdMob, the author is not responsible for their content. Consider options for cooperation.

description: Приложение для нумизматов и просто интересующихся. Может использоваться как инструмент для работы с коллекцией, либо как справочник. Содержит полный перечень памятных и инвестиционных монет России и СССР из драгоценных металлов. Более 1200 монет! Реализована возможность экспорта различных списков в excel. Есть возможность отключать из учета серии и номиналы. Пользователи смогут ознакомиться с приблизительной стоимостью монет. Программа позволяет производить резервное копирование для переноса на другое устройство. К монетам можно оставлять собственные пометки/комментарии. Ваша коллекция, теперь всегда под рукой! Монеты из серебра доступны только в полной версии! Рассмотрим варианты сотрудничества. Application for numismatists and interested. Can be used as a tool for working with a collection, or as a reference. Contains a complete list of commemorative and investment coins Russia and the USSR from precious metals. More than 1,200 coins! The possibility of exporting various lists in excel. It is possible to disable a series of accounting and denominations. Users will be able to get acquainted with an estimated value of coins. The program allows you to perform backups to transfer to another device. For coins you can leave your own notes / comments. Your collection is now at your fingertips! Silver coins are only available in the full version! Consider the options for cooperation.

Turn your smartphone or tablet into a powerful navigation cartographic tool that will navigate you through inaccessible dirt roads & forgotten footpaths of Greece, with the accuracy of TopoNavigator maps. Free version offers: MAPS • Offline map tiles download & cache (including Greek Cadastre orthos, OSM, Google & Bing WMS) on internal or external memory (SD card) • Downloads tiles along 1 or more selected tracks or routes. Optional tiles overwrite. • Structure analysis for any map type (levels, number of tiles & file size on each level) • Map Rotate, Tilt & Zoom with screen multitouch • Greek Geodetic Ref. Sys. (GGRS87) coordinates • Auto or manual map image scaling to compensate map lisibility for low screen resolutions • Speed-related map rotation auto-switch based either on compass or GPS heading • Combined speed-related AutoZoom & AutoTilt (perspective view) with 3 profiles (Travel, Off-road, Extreme) • Continuous Speed, Elevation, GPS Accuracy & Slope charts when a GPS is connected • 4 color classes accuracy recodring line symbol • Offline search for 200000 woldwide cities including 20000 nameplaces, 1900 archaelogical sites & 1400 monasteries in Greece ROUTING • Online routing for Greece. Options include fastest & shortest route, altitude zone, toll avoidance. • Start & destination positions can be set either on map, GPS fix, using long press on map, search, coordinates or waypoints.Nav points can be deleted or altered • Unlimited number of routes can be stored for off-line use. DATA • Digitalization of lines and points with a finger, mouse or stylus. • On-screen selection of lines & editing (press to move & add vertices, long press on a vertex to delete it, convert to point, or to split the line, union of 2 selected lines, delete lines). • Ability to set a solid symbol for lines or choose from 5 color palettes interpreting speed, slope, elevation, pace and accuracy Equal Intervals analysis. • Unlimited waypoint capture on or off GPS fix. Create, edit or delete waypoint on creen. Move points by drag & drop, to GPS fix or map center. • Advanced tabular data management • Unlimited track recording with custom time & distance intervals. Recording line symbol uses a 4 colored classes scheme to visualize PDOP values. Track statistics include elevation & speed graphs, duration, min, max & avg speed, min & max elevation, total ascent & descent, 2D & 3D length • Import & export waypoints & tracks on KML & GPX formats. • After saving data (points & tracks), user can send the file to DropBox, Google Drive,e-mail, G-mail, etc • Auto Generalize tracks on save. Options include no generalize, mild (1m tolerance), moderate (3m) and strong (6m) generalization. INTERFACE • 4 languages (english, greek, french & german) • Linked Toponavigator GPS Info app offers satellite status info, visualizes pitch & roll values, records NMEA sentences, send position by SMS or e-mail &offers an advanced Trip Computer Paid version adds: TopoNavigator Extreme app (40€ for 3 devices for a 2 years period) gives access to TopoNavigator WMS & offers 6 routing profiles (fastest, shortest, SUV car, 4x4 car, Extreme 4x4 car, Hiking). • TopoNavigator Road WMS, which provides very legible and updated road maps for Greece, for travelling in cities & the countryside • TopoNavigator Terrain WMS, the best map of Greece for any outdoor adventure activity (hiking, 4x4 driving, mountain bike), which includes 20m contour lines Both maps are available in Greek & Latin characters and cover all regions of Greece: Athens and Attica, Central Greece, Peloponnese (Southern Greece), Epirus, Macedonia & Thrace (Northern Greece), Cyclades, Ionian, Dodecanese & Creta (Kriti) islands. • Points & lines digitized on screen (off GPS fix) get elevation values from a high accuracy 30m cell Digital Elevation Model (currently DEM is server-based & covers greek territory). See a preview of TopoNavigator IMS maps at http://www.toponavigator.com/el/toponavigatorims.html

Simple Blogger client. You can: -create/view/edit/delete blog posts -post comments to published blog posts -upload picture(s) and video(s) -select size and quality of pictures uploaded -select upload album at Picasa Web Albums -set publish date/time -publish as draft -share pictures, videos, YouTube clips, links etc. * No ads * No Blogger-droid signature * Using Flurry for basic metrics Client for blogger.com (blogspot.com). *** Follow Blogger-droid on Twitter - @bloggerdroid *** --- Do you need support, have any questions or a feature request, send a mail to: bloggerdroid@gmail.com or use GTalk: bloggerdroid@gmail.com --- FAQ --- Q: I keep getting a CAPTCHA error? A: The CAPTCHA handling in the app is a known bug, to get rid of the CAPTCHA requirement you need to use a browser and log in at http://www.blogger.com and/or http://picasaweb.google.com and/or http://www.youtube.com (depending on which google service requiring CAPTCHA) with the same credentials that you're using in Blogger-droid app. Q: I get a 403 or 404 error when trying to publish blog posts with pictures? A 1: To be able to post pictures, you must activate your account @ http://picasaweb.google.com , all pictures uploaded from Blogger-droid will end up in the default album 'Drop box'. A 2: Your Google account may be full. A 3: Your 'Drop box' album may be full. It seems like there is a limit of 1000 pictures in a album. A 4: Make sure there is no unwanted spaces in your username, some keyboard software have a tendency to add a space at the end. Q: I can't publish blog posts with pictures? A: To be able to post pictures, you must activate your account @ http://picasaweb.google.com .
release_text: 1.1.13 * authentication bugfix 1.1.12 * using correct Google api key 1.1.11 * bugfixes 1.1.10 * Using Google OAuth as authentication * Using Google's Blogger API v3 (due to the old one seems to have stopped working) This is a fix release for some reported issues regarding posts not being published - this release doesn't support video in posts and you cant view/edit/share published posts.

description: ★ Mobile Number Locations Pro enables you to know location of Incoming Calls, Mobile Contacts, Mobile Numbers & any Phone Numbers. ★ Browse your Mobile Phone Contacts sorted by locations (at Country/State/City level). ★ Block Calls and SMS from unwanted mobile phone numbers & Callers. ★ It will also show Telephone Operator of the mobile or landline phone number initially assigned to. Note: Mobile Number Portability(MNP) not supported ★ Support for multiple Themes ★ For all incoming calls, it also tells time of last communication with that mobile or landline phone number. ★ Following countries are supported: USA, Canada, India, United Kingdom(UK), China Note: This application will not show the actual physical location/GPS location of the caller. All location information is at State/City level only. Landline and Mobile number series updated for India. Std codes updated for India with district information. All Area Codes updated for USA and Canada. This app will tell you location and not the Caller ID. It has many advantages over other Caller ID apps. It has offline support and works even without internet connection. FEATURES ★ Displays Location(Country/State/City) of Incoming and Outgoing Phone Calls automatically on Call Screen Display. ★ Position to show Call Details Screen can be changed by dragging the Screen displayed on Call Screen while making/receiving Calls. ★ Browse PhoneBook Contacts sorted by Location (at Country/State/City level). ★ Displays time of last Communication with that phone number. ★ Notification about geographic location(at Country/State/City level) of Incoming Calls. ★ User friendly and robust User Interface for app navigation. ★ Trace/Search any phone number for its location. ★ View Recent Call Log/PhoneBook Contacts with geographic location(at Country/State/City level) ★ View Operator details for all Phone numbers. ★ Call block phone numbers as required. Note:It will tell the Country/State/City of the phone number initially assigned/registered to and not the current location of the caller (i.e. actual physical location or GPS location or actual city while in roaming). For India, it will show at state level for mobile numbers and at city/district/state level for landline numbers. Use Case: 1.Trace location(city or state) of unknown phone numbers. 2.Browse your mobile contacts sorted by city or state. 3.Trace location(city and state) of any mobile and landline telephone numbers.
release_text: Kindly mail us at phone2location@gmail.com for any issues. Recent Changes: -Awesome User Interface -Support for multiple themes -Updated database for India -Added District info for India -Performance Improvements -Several Bug Fixes

description: This App is sure to keep your baby entertained for hours as they touch different color figures and listen to exciting sounds. [difference with the pay version] ・ This App is not the lock function of the "home button" "back button" "volume button". ・ This App to display advertising. ■ Four modes available "Single" A single figure appears, one after another. Sliding your finger while touching the figure will move it around in various ways. "Multi" A figure will appear wherever you touch the screen. Sliding your finger while touching the screen will draw a line. "Peekaboo" It becomes a state of "peeka" when you touch the screen, and then the movement of the "Boo!" When you release your finger. description: C#Shell is an offline C# compiler that lets you dynamically compile and execute C# code on your Android device. Write programs on the go, test algorithms, explore the features of C# programming language or practice your C# skills. Note: A high-end device is recommended for optimal performance. The C#Shell compiler uses Mono Compiler Service. Most of the .NET Base Class Library is available and you can use such features as LINQ and Task Parallel Library (TPL), function programming is recommended. ---IMPORTANT--- Methods must be declared as parts of classes or structs, meaning a you cannot compile a 'void Main()...' directly, either make it a part of an object, or use anonymous methods or functions. e.g. Action myCoolMethod = new Action(()=>{ Console.WriteLine("Hello there!"); }); ---Features--- • Full-featured C# 4.0 Compiler • Draw graphics using CanvasUI • Native Android API • Load and execute compiled .NET assemblies (*.exe/*.dll) (cs.LoadAssembly) • Console IO • Support for saving / opening sessions. • View object properties • Visually construct methods • IO support • Network support • Multi-threading support • ARM , ARMv7 and x86 support. C#Shell is actively developed, and more features will be added in the near future, we're taking requests too
release_text: Changelog 2.0 - Android 5.0 and ART support - Mono 3.10.0 1.7 - Upgraded to latest Mono runtime - Minor fixes 1.6.2 - Support for editing executed code (the source code is re-compiled the next time the session is opened) - Chinese translations by Magic Mao 1.6.1 - Performance improvements - C#Shell Forum 1.6 - CanvasUI Android Canvas support - Custom assemblies are now shown in the namespaces list - Bug fixes and improvements - New samples

description: Write on Wallpaper lets you style your wallpaper with your own funny jokes, inspiring quotes, touching poems or any other combination of letters you might think of - unfold your creative potential! Ever missed the freedom to just write whatever you wanted on your homescreen wallpaper? Or felt like your wallpaper could use a little spicing up? Write on Wallpaper lets you personalize your wallpaper and make it your own! Write on Wallpaper can be used to e.g.: * Type in important notes that you need to remember. Surely something written on your homescreen will stick in your memory for a long time! * Write your favorite life advice on your wallpaper to remind you of it each day; e.g. "Embrace life", “Arise and be all that you dreamed” or simply put: “Gangnam Style” * Joke with friends; install the app on their phone and modify their background (pro tip: low opacity texts will not be noticed straight away. Evil laugh.) * Or write a famous quote to inspire you to be great; e.g. “Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.” - Buddha * Write a message for yourself when lucid e.g. reminding to stop procrastination. Features: * Edit; Add or edit texts on top of the current wallpaper. * Lots of different settings for customizing the texts and their style. e.g Change font, color, opacity, size ect. * Share; Send your new wallpaper to friends, another phone or to a pc for backup. * History; Browse a history of the wallpapers you have written on. * Animated tips to help you through the first usage of the app :) A paid version of Write on Wallpaper can also be found on the market. Buy it to get rid of ads and support the developers :) Please feel free to write suggestions, comments, error reports or feedback to our mail as we cannot answer the comments - we will be more than happy to help and hear from our users!

A rooster, also known as a cockerel, or a cock is a male chicken with the female being called a hen. Immature male chickens of less than a year's age are called cockerels. The oldest term is "cock," from Old English coc. The term "rooster" originates from the United States, while in the United Kingdom and Ireland the older term "cockerel" is more widely used. In North America, Australia and New Zealand "rooster" (a relative neologism) is almost always used, occasionally cockerel. "Cock" is in general use as the name for a male of other species of bird, for example "Cock sparrow." "Roosting" is the action of perching aloft to sleep at night, and is done by both sexes. The rooster is polygamous, but cannot guard several nests of eggs at once. He guards the general area where his hens are nesting, and will attack other roosters that enter his territory. During the daytime, he often sits on a high perch, usually 4–5 feet off the ground to serve as a lookout for his flock. He will sound a distinctive alarm call if predators are nearby. description: New timeout timer and token economy app to help your children have a GreenDay! Using this application can assist you in implementing a behavior plan for your children with or without autism. Not just a token economy, GreenDay makes it easier to implement an ABA behavior plan by encouraging breaks and using reinforcement for up to three children. Helps keep the child's attention by making sounds and speaking their name. Includes a "timeout" timer for putting the child on yellow and red and keeps track of tokens banked. Provides detailed history for the past 31 days in a calendar view. This application helps you implement and track the reinforcement that enables you to change your child's problem behavior. We developed this application with input from the ABA therapist that we hired. Our family has been using the application for a year now, prompting UI improvements and feature development. Although this application and the behavior plan was developed for a child with autism, it also works on our child that doesn't have autism. IMPORTANT: Selecting an image icon for a child can cause an out of memory error, depending on the memory available in your device and the size of the image. The optimum image icon is 72 x 72 pixels. Features: The application supports up to three children. Flick the child's picture icon up toward their bank to give them a token, and the app congratulates your child and tells them how many tokens that they have earned. Long press on the child's bank to add or subtract money as they earn bonuses or make purchases. Drag the child's picture icon to yellow to put the child in yellow, and the app warns the child to stay calm and follow directions. Drag the child's picture icon to red to put the child in red, and the app lets the child know that they're on red. The app automatically puts the child into yellow when the red timer is up, and tells the child to apologize and restore the environment. Press the child's bank to view a calendar of the past 31 days and view details for each day. Press the child's red timer to have the phone suggest a break to prevent a meltdown. Long press on the child's red timer to pause the timer, if the child leaves the designated area. Long press again to unpause the timer. Suggestions: Enter your child's name phonetically, so that the text-to-speach engine speaks your child's name correctly. Enter a list of breaks from the settings screen. Create family rules that when broken will put your child on yellow, or that will put them directly on red. Create a list of family goals that will earn them tokens. The Behavior Plan: My wife and I have blogged about how we use the application to implement our behavior plan, but you may want to talk to your applied behavior analyst to help develop a behavior plan for your child. http://www.appliedautism.com Join our Google+ Community or e-mail us if you have questions or problems: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/111409172468981400329 Unfortunately there's no way for us to reply to you through the rating system. Implement a behavior plan for your children. Help them to have a GreenDay! Previous Versions: Version 1.6.1 * Bugfixes for TextToSpeech on ICS. * Going on yellow now asks child to "calm down" instead of "remain calm". Version 1.6 * Added log detail feature to record more detailed behavior information. * Updated to Android Holo Theme. * App no longer gives praise, which should be given by parent or guardian. Version 1.5.1 * Fix for ImagePicker on some devices. Version 1.5 * Child's status no longer changes until the image icon is released. This ensures that on larger displays, the status doesn't stick on yellow when going directly from green to red. This also allows the adult the chance to change his or her mind before releasing the image icon.
release_text: Version 1.6.5 * Fixed theme for KitKat * Made more compatible for tablets

description: This physics app contains a concept summary of Magnetism, 20 quiz questions, and "Get Help" buttons on each question to help you if you need it. These apps are perfect for "studying on the go", and they are designed with that in mind. Covers 20 of the most essential questions on the physics of magnetism, including magnetic forces, magnetic fields, induced currents, and electromagnetic waves. If you get stumped, instantly access hundreds of related Internet resources with the tap of a button. Do not take that test until you test yourself with this app! Whether you are in a high school conceptual physics class, an introductory college course, or you are taking a standardized test that is related to physics, the information contained in App Physics Review apps is absolutely essential to know in order to be successful. Be smart and take advantage of these convenient and effective review apps!

description: This fan community made app is a collection of basic game guides for the popular PC game; Star Trek Online. And best of all, there's NO ADS! The app includes: *The Cheat Sheet The cheat sheet does not contain actual cheats, more a list of answers to some hard missions, such as the correct way to "Interrogate Tran" in the mission "Cold Comfort" and the correct way to free the Deferi prisoners in the mission "Emancipation" *Dilithium Farming Also known as the "Antisocial Dilithium Farming Guide" this guide is a good way to hit the 8,000 a day Dilithium cap without ever being teamed with other players in STF's. *Path to 2409 Lore Complete list of answers to all the Path to 2409 Lore questions. *Video Guides Some basic Video Guides for STO such as "How to look less like an Iron Man Reject" and "The Basics of Dilithium mining" Still Under Construction. *Cheap Commodities An easy list to find out which vendors in game sell the commodities the cheapest. (And where to find them) *Gateway Loader An easy to use button for quick access to the STO gateway. *Patch Notes Reader A Basic reader that shows the game's official Patch Notes. And much much more! ================ Bugs/Issues? Report them on the PSGN Community: http://goo.gl/Oje9iq Or contact the developer directly on Google+ https://plus.google.com/+PotholeStudios ================ Want a guide added to the app? Then send in a Feature Request at the PSGN Community: http://goo.gl/Oje9iq ================ Permissions Information *Network Communication Some pages in the app load from the internet, This is done so that the pages can be updated server-side, so that you always have the latest guides without having to update the app itself. *Vibrate Due to the unusual way that the MIT App Inventor works, this permission was added because I added Sounds into the app. (Yeah, makes no sense to me either) Either way, Sound.Vibrate is never triggered by the app itself, so this permission can be ignored.
release_text: v5.2 - Added a Shortcut to the STO Wiki. - Added a shortcut to the STO Academy Skill Planner. - Corrected some issues with the Patch Notes reader. More updates soon!

It will most likely appear during old age but there are people who have been suffering over the pain since time immemorial. Having back pain doesn't mean that there is an ongoing damage or degeneration on the lower back. Unlike with acute pain where the level of pain may be associated with the degree of damage on the affected part, chronic back pain doesn't normally correlate with the level of damage. We have all heard about the benefits of the no gluten diet for weight loss. It's one of the most followed and practiced forms of dieting today with celebrities like Lady Gaga, Gwyneth Paltrow, Victoria Becham, Miley Cyrus and Kim Kardashian declaring their passion for gluten free dieting all over the media it's no wonder the world is going gaga over NO GLUTEN living style. No gluten diets have become a recent trend. A no gluten diet is a diet that excludes foods containing gluten. Gluten is a protein found in wheat (including kamut and spelt), barley, rye, malts, and triticale. It is also used as a food additive in the form of a flavoring, stabilizing, or thickening agent, often as "dextrin". Everyone should try no gluten for a week! The change in your skin, physical and mental health is amazing. You won't go back! Read this and Share it with your friends and family and get healthier than ever before.

It all start with an idea. Art did. Art is a tangible product of an mental image of something. And tattoo, being a practiced art, needs to have a constant supply of ideas. The good news is man, by nature is a creative being. He is able to produce new concepts every now and then. And all his ideas, gathered into a heap, only have one effect- astounding. Many tattoo seekers often find themselves awestruck with the infinity of tattoo ideas that will present themselves once the hunt onsets. Like a bride overwhelmed with excitement on her bridal dress shopping day, a tattoo seeker will also feel an unexplained overpowering sensation that will leave one with no idea of what tattoo must be chosen. As we have earlier noted, there are endless arrays of tattoos and each one has a character (and probably a soul of its own). The key is to identify one's self to the attributes a single design posses. After all, tattoos are for self- expression. If you cannot partake with that idea, there is no sense in adopting a tattoo design that will reside in your body for eternity. Each being has a character of its own. Man has a greater sense of what he is more than any other species. If he cannot live with the attributes that were given to him from the moment the first sparks of life ignited and those that he learned to associate with himself, then the purpose of being a human is spoiled. And that being said, let us continue with saying that each design is a character in itself. Once the being and the character share the same residence within an individual's personality, then one complements the other. This is the idea that constitutes your choice of a tattoo. You can choose to have personalized tattoos, why not. Say, an I love Missy tattoo imprinted near your heart. But come to think of this: will the message have its same meaning several years from now? If you can't answer that straight then go for more universal design. The majority of people with tattoos ...

description: Есть такая книга - Книга Перемен, Чжоуская Книга Перемен или Канон Перемен. Древние китайцы верили, что человек участвует в течении жизни как равный земле и небу. Как активная сила, не только зависимая, но и способная воздействовать на окружающий мир, на обстоятельства, на судьбу. Китайская классическая "Книга Перемен" и по сей день регулярно используется в КАЖДОЙ китайской семье. Уникальность И-Цзин заключается в том, что Книга Перемен дает развернутое толкование ситуации с возможными вариантами ее развития. Отвечая, И-Цзин описывает сложившуюся ситуацию и дает варианты ее развития, в зависимости от тех действий, которые Вы предпримите или не предпримите. Гадая по Книге Перемен, Вы не только определите развернутую характеристику Вашей жизненной ситуации, но и получите конкретную рекомендацию. Если Вы будете действовать согласно ей, то сможете прийти к оптимальному решению Ваших проблем и даже к самому благоприятному для Вас развитию событий. Доверьтесь интуиции. There is a book - The Book of Changes, Zhou Book of Changes or the canon of changes. The ancient Chinese believed that a person involved in the course of life as equal to the ground and sky. As an active force, not only sensitive, but also able to influence the world, the circumstances on fate. Chinese classic "Book of Changes" and to this day is regularly used in every Chinese family. The uniqueness of the I Ching is that the Book of Changes gives you a detailed interpretation of the situation with the options of its development. Responding, the I Ching describes the situation and gives options for its development, depending on the actions that you do not take or embark. Wondering on the Book of Changes, you will not only determine the detailed description of your situation in life, but now a specific recommendation. If you act according to it, you can come to the optimal solution to your problems, and even to the most favorable for you of events. Rely on intuition.

Counting cards is the art of keeping track of which cards have come out in a blackjack game and adjusting your betting as such. When a 2 through 7 are dealt, your count should be increased by 1 and when a 10 through A are dealt, you should decrease your count by 1. When the count is 0, you have at the very least a 1% advantage over the house. As the count gets higher, your advantage becomes greater. This is due to the fact that it has been proven that the more face cards that are in the deck, the higher your chances of winning are because the house has a greater likelyhood of busting. This app can be used in conjunction with online casinos that offer live blackjack dealers and the basic understanding of blackjack to count cards and gain an edge over the house. The best casino to use this app would be oddsmaker.com as they are still available in the U.S. and offer live dealers. This app can also be used to learn how to count cards with the practice mode which cycles randomly through a deck of cards while you keep count in your head. Work up through the speeds until your able to count cards without even thinking about it. The use of this app is discouraged in a brick and mortar casino because, although counting cards is not illegal, it is discouraged and casinos can ask you to leave. This app does not guarantee the making of money. We are not responsible for losses incurred while using our program. This is simply a program that will tell you when you may have an advantage over the house, and shouldn't be relied upon. Always use caution when playing at casinos with real money because you should be prepared to lose it all. Although counting cards does provide an advantage over the house, it should be noted that tens of thousands of hands need to be played to realize this advantage. This is because in the short run your advantage averages out, but in the long run your advantage should be greater. Again, this is a theory and should be used with caution before betting real money.

description: Welcome to Slow Strobe Light App. This is easy make slow strobe light. You just click and adjust time for blink light. It's simple easy but powerful light. A strobe light or stroboscopic lamp, commonly called a strobe, is a device used to produce regular flashes of light. It is one of a number of devices that can be used as a stroboscope. The word originated from the Greek strobos, meaning "act of whirling." A typical commercial strobe light has a flash energy in the region of 10 to 150 joules, and discharge times as short as a few milliseconds, often resulting in a flash power of several kilowatts. Larger strobe lights can be used in “continuous” mode, producing extremely intense illumination. Relate topic you can see more: strobe light slow motion, strobe light water drops, strobe water, flashing lights video effects, stroboscope water, strobe light online, strobe light photography, strobe light walmart The light source is commonly a xenon flash lamp, or flashtube, which has a complex spectrum and a color temperature of approximately 5,600 kelvins. To obtain colored light, colored gels may be used.

Roll up...Roll up...It's splatter up time. Ladies and gentlemen and children of all ages. Tin Can alley the arcade, sideshow, carnival game of old is ready for your best throwing arm or flinging finger in this case. Fling the baseballs at the soup cans and score as many points as you can from 5, 10 or 100 points on the highest tin cans. Knock them out of the ball park so to speak or just knock them in their centre and aim for your highest score within the one minute time limit. So don't be as slow as a turtle pick up those balls quick smart and make sure your throws are straight at the targets. Good luck. Aim sharp and flick those baseballs hard.

Sumberg fue el primer estonio en participar en las carreras ultramaratón de los 4 Desiertos en el Sahara y el Gobi, donde corrió 155 millas (250 km) a 113 °F (45 °C). description: Application Icon Killer is a widget that helps you identify and close applications running on your phone. This widget will show you icons for all applications or tasks currently running on your device, but will skip system applications and services, to avoid any risk of messing things up when closing them. With Application Icon Killer you will be able to see your running tasks directly in your home screen and identify them by their icons. Clicking on an icon will display app name, and show three action buttons: Open, Kill and Hide. Using the "Open" button, you can make an application that is running in the background to be visible again and continue interacting with it. Using the "Kill" button, you can close that running task or application, so that your phone gets more free RAM memory and its processor works faster. The "Hide" button is intended to stop showing some apps that you never want to kill in this widget. You may need this because you want to keep that application running, or because Android starts the application again every time you kill it (your phone may need that applications running). When no application icons are selected, you will find three buttons: one allowing to refresh running apps or tasks list, another one allowing you to edit hidden applications list (in case you have hidden an application by mistake) and a third one allowing you to "Kill All" running applications that you haven't hidden before. Using this widget you will be able to see running applications or tasks just like in desktop computers operating systems, and use the widget as a tasks bar, to be able to open that applications to resume your work or game, or close apps and make your phone work better and faster. If your phone has Android 3.1 or newer, you will also be able to resize this widget horizontally and vertically, to show more and also bigger application icons. FEATURES: - Resizable Widget (Android 3.1 or greater). - Running application icons directly in home screen. - Select, Open, Kill or Hide a running application or task directly from the widget. - Kill All applications with just one click. (not ignored applications) - Edit Hidden Apps list. - It's free! PAID VERSION: To open apps directly from the widget, hide apps from the widget or edit hidden apps list, download "Application Icon Killer Widget Pro" version. http://bit.ly/1gJaJud

description: Did you ever wonder how cumbersome it is to find a number from which you just received a call if you didn’t save it! More often than not one ends up getting confused looking for that number. “Save Contacts” comes as a breath of fresh air. It is a state-of-the-art app that prompts you to ‘Save’ the unknown contact as soon as you hang up. Salient Features: ★ User gets a choice to add the time interval after which a prompt to save the number will pop up automatically. ★ Additionally, user gets an option to add the number to existing contact or add as a new contact. ★ UI is clean and pleasing to the eye. Note: The UI of application will differ in android 3.0 below version, but the functionality is same. If any one is interested in helping me for translating the Application in different languages (International Languages). Please mail me at support@androidardent.com . His/her Name will be published in description of the application on Play Google Store And with Application in About Section. Save Contacts prompts for Missed Calls as well as received Calls depending on the Settings. By Default Prompt will be shown for the Received Calls if the user continues the call till 10 seconds or More. User can change the time Settings as per required. Ver 2.2/2.0 (GB & Lower) / Version 2.1 (ICS & Higher) GB Fixed the user reported issue "On Touch, Settings was crashing". ICS Fixed the issues in Galaxy Nexus for Settings Page Ver 1.8 (GB & Lower) / 1.9 (ICS & Higher) *Fixed User Reported Issues. *Added a Rate/Review option for the users to review the app.

description: This multi launcher theme is compatible with the most popular launchers at the same time: GO Launcher, Apex Launcher, Solo Launcher, ADW Launcher, Nova Launcher, Action Launcher, and Holo Launcher. Premium Jelly Bean 4.3 HD Launcher Theme, multi launcher compatible, packed with huge icon pack, wallpapers and clock widget, all in especial extra high resolution and attention to detail. IMPORTANT!! You need to have a launcher installed to apply the theme, you can find any of the compatible launchers free on Google play. Search for: GO Launcher, APEX Launcher, ADW Launcher, HOLO Launcher, SOLO Launcher, NOVA Launcher, and Action Launcher. REQUIRES NO UNSAFE PERMISSIONS TO INSTALL: THERE ARE NO ADDS, NO PUSH NOTIFICATIONS, NO ADWARE, NO DATA COLLECTION. Everything you need in one theme to transform your launcher into the latest android Jelly Bean look. Compatible with all the most popular launchers (GO, APEX, ADW, SOLO, HOLO, NOVA, Action...) so you can use the same theme on all your devices even if they use different launchers, or if you change your launcher later on. Icons and wallpapers especially made in extra high resolution to achieve the highest definition on your screen. FEATURES: * Multi launcher compatible theme: GO Launcher, APEX Launcher, ADW Launcher, HOLO Launcher, SOLO Launcher, NOVA Launcher, and Action Launcher, and subsequently all other launchers that can import themes from these launchers. * 1500+ iconpack made with extra high res 128x128 icons. Arranged alphabetically so they are easy to find within the icon pack. * High resolution wallpaper pack with the original 14 Jelly Bean wallpapers. Perfect for high resolution screens and/or tablets. * Includes custom wallpaper picker to easily choose between the theme's wallpapers * Includes custom themed analog clock widget compatible with all launchers. * Compatible with all screen resolutions, and android versions from 1.6 up. * No unsafe permissions required for installation, no intrusive ads. ____________________________ For launcher specific theme configuration, please visit the theme's webpage: http://faisca-art.blogspot.com.es/2013/10/premium-jelly-bean-43-hd-launcher-theme.html For how-to’s, and tips on the compatible launchers, please visit the video tutorial sections of my webpage here: http://faisca-art.blogspot.com.es/ ___________________________ IMPORTANT! This theme has close to 1500 icons, but in some devices some icons may not change automatically to the theme's icons. If an icon has not been replaced to the HD version of this theme, check to see if it’s included in the theme and change it manually. Visit my web page for videotutorials on how to: http://faisca-art.blogspot.com.es/ ___________________________ IMPORTANT! The Jelly Bean CLOCK WIDGET is included in the theme, you can select it from the widget list in any of the launchers. You may have to resize the widget to center on the screen depending on your phone's resolution. Any problems please drop me an email at faisca.art@gmail.com , much easier to solve any issues through mail than using the review/comment feature. Thank you for your support! Faisca Art

description: You can add a touch of Van Gogh to your photos! The app can be used intuitively. - App of the Day Bringing you a step closer to a masterpiece of android expressionism. - Appgratis This app offers relatively novel functionality which sets it apart from many other applications. - Androidtapp Con Photo Painter potrai modificare le tue foto e trasformarle in fantastici Collage - AppGratuita Aspiring painters can use this app to help them visualize their next magnum opus. - Androidauthority Add cool paint effects to your pictures and turn it into an artwork - AppEggs.com Introduction: Photo Painter is an interactive photo editing tool inspired by artist with different painting styles, image filters, frames, textures, and more! Making art is pure fun in this app. It also contains a intelligent image management system which can organize your photos and make your memories more valuable. The free version contains ★ Create painting from photos automatically ★ 6 fantastic painting styles — featuring realism, impressionism, color point, expressionism and color wash ★ Different textures include oil paint, color wash and sketch ★ Finger touch to draw, paint, doodle ★ Seamless remove object from pictures (touchretouch) ★ 15 cool image filters and color effects for pictures ★ 4 different picture frames ★ 4 special textures ★ Photo collage to combine your artworks with no grid ★ A intuitive and easy way to combine all these elements ★ A smart Gallery to automatically tag, categorize and organize your images and photos ★ Continuous development more to come Like us on Facebook to unlock ★ A powerful finger drawing function Pro version ★ More painting styles ★ No advertisement USES: This app’s primary use is as a creative photo editing tool based on non-photo realistic rendering. It can also be used for fast photo processing because it remembers your preference. This app is good for creating amazing and wonderful photos with its build in image filters and frames. Additionally, this app is ideal for artist and designer, allowing them to visualize different painting effects of the scene in real-time using machine learning algorithms. Painting is as simple as playing games in this app. It also has a smart image recognition and organization gallery app based on artificial intelligence.This app can recognize tens of thousands of categories, objects, and tags in any image and photo. It is a improved smart version of the official Gallery & Photo editor app included on KitKat (Android 4.4). It is also perfect for Nexus devices that have lost the classic gallery app with the last upgrade to Lollipop (Android 5.0). ADDITIONAL FEATURES: -convert photo to paint with real time painting process -easy to use and intuitive control -can adjust texture details -complete interactive user guide -brushes designed for fat finger and small screen -effects with real time preview in grid view -freedom to combine and mixture everything -auto orientation of the buttons -zoom in zoom out of the photo -direct access from gallery -easy share to social networks -large draw area with no advertisement -small just 1.5MB -install on SD card USER GUIDANCE: The user can load image from gallery or take a picture in the main page. On first use, there will be a complete tutorial with flashing buttons and animated gestures to guide the user. User can start the Photo Painter from gallery using share button directly. Images can be saved to the SD card or shared to Instagram, Facebook, WeChat, MoMo easily in the option menu. Enjoy this secret brain wars between artists and AI. Service Provider: The gallery is developed based on the Clarifai. Clarifai is an advanced image recognization algorithm based on Brain's structure. It automatically recognize your image and create tags. To know more about Clarifai, please visit http://clarifai.com/ FEEDBACK: We are open to suggestions so don't hesitate to send us an e-mail if you find something is missing.

description: Astrological Charts is a professional astrological program for Android, which reports 12 types of astrological charts, contains, besides planets, 6 asteroids and 23 fictitious points, including trans-Neptunian, and several lots. There is a choice of 11 house systems, 20 types of aspect with customizable orbs and database of about 100000 places with specified time zones, so the difference with GMT is determined automatically, besides, you can add new place. The program calculates exact dates of triggering aspects, periods of aspects by orb, moments of sign changes, lunar phases, eclipses,midpoints and planetary hours in menu of main page. There are Tropical and Sidereal zodiac in program. Chart types: - Transit/Natal - Natal + Transit - Synastry - Secondary Progressions (1 day - 1 year) - Zodiacal Directions (1 day - 1°) - Directions for Arcs of the Sun, the Moon or a planet - Profections - Returns (Solar, Lunar) - Lunar Phase - Composite - Middle - Harmonics This is the best Android app for Astrology!
