description: Österreichs auflagenstärkstes Magazin für Kochen und Lifestyle „frisch gekocht“ von BILLA als App: Entdecken Sie ca. 11.000 Rezepte und Rezeptideen, von Profiköchen kreiert und gekocht. Viele Step-by-Step Anleitungen und Kochvideos in Form von Tutorials vereinfachen auch Anfängern das Kochen. Nützliche Küchentools wie Steaktimer, Einkaufsliste oder Siedepunktrechner finden sich ebenfalls in der „frisch gekocht“ App. Als besonderes Highlight können BILLA Vorteils-Club Mitglieder die neuesten Ausgaben des frisch gekocht Magazins gratis herunterladen und lesen sowie im Magazinarchiv in älteren Ausgaben stöbern. Highlights der Frisch gekocht App von BILLA: - Riesige Rezeptsammlung: Stöbern Sie durch rund 11.000 Rezepte oder nutzen Sie die Rezeptsuche nach verschiedenen Kriterien, wie z.B. Fleisch, Fisch oder Dessert. Jede Woche kommen neue Rezepte hinzu. Speichern Sie Ihre Lieblingsrezepte und legen Sie die Zutaten gleich in der Einkaufsliste ab. - Alle Rezepte sind von Profis kreiert. Ein Augenschmaus sind auch die wunderschönen Rezeptbilder, die Lust aufs Kochen machen. - Digitale Ausgabe des aktuellen „frisch gekocht“ Magazins sowie Archiv vergangener Ausgaben. Lesezeichen-Funktion für interessante Ausgaben und Beiträge. Als BILLA Vorteils-Club Online Mitglied können Sie alle Ausgaben gratis downloaden. Wenden Sie sich an unseren Support, wenn Sie Hilfe beim Anmelden benötigen. - „frisch gekocht Kids“: Alle 10 „frisch gekocht Kids“ Magazine als Jahresabo kaufen und viele tolle Rezepte für Ihre Kinder finden! Bastelideen und Anleitungen, Rätsel, Comics und mehr runden das Kochmagazin für Kinder ab. - Rezeptvideos: Vorspeisen, Hauptgerichte und Nachspeisen als Videoanleitungen zum Nachkochen, z.B.: Grießnockerlsuppe, Forelle Müllerin, Apfelstrudel und vieles mehr. - Kühlschrankkochen: Sie sagen uns, was in Ihrem Kühlschrank ist – wir sagen Ihnen, welche Köstlichkeiten Sie daraus kochen können. - Steak Timer: Mit dem neuen Steaktimer gelingt Ihr Steak perfekt! Finden Sie tolle Tipps für die Zubereitung: Von der Auswahl der Pfanne bis zur idealen Bratzeit. - Weitere nützliche Tools wie Einkaufsliste, Küchen-Timer, Siedepunktrechner etc. Austria's largest circulation magazine for cooking and lifestyle "freshly cooked" by Billa App: Discover about 11,000 recipes and recipe ideas, created by professional chefs and cooked. Many step-by-step instructions and cooking videos in the form of tutorials simplify beginners cooking. Useful kitchen tools like Steak Timer, shopping list or boiling point computer can also be found in the "freshly cooked" App. As a special highlight BILLA Advantage Club members can download the latest issues of the magazine free freshly cooked and read and browse through the magazine archive in previous editions. Highlights of Freshly cooked App BILLA: - Huge collection of recipes: Browse by around 11,000 recipes, or use the recipe search by various criteria, such as Meat, fish or dessert. Every week add new recipes. Save your favorite recipes and put the ingredients in the same shopping list from. - All recipes are created by professionals. A feast for the eyes are the beautiful recipe images that awaken the desire to cook. - Digital output of the current "freshly cooked" magazine and archive of past issues. Bookmark function for interesting issues and contributions. As BILLA Advantage Club Online member, you can download all issues free. Please contact if you need our support help logging. - "Freshly cooked Kids": All 10 "freshly cooked Kids' Magazine buy as annual subscription and find lots of great recipes for your kids! Craft ideas and instructions, puzzles, comics and more round off the cooking magazine for children. - Recipe Videos: appetizers, entrees and desserts as video instructions on how to cook, for example: Semolina dumpling soup, trout meunière, apple strudel and more. - Refrigerator Cooking: You tell us what's in your fridge - we'll tell you which dishes you can cook it. - Steak Timer: With the new Steak Timer manages your steak perfectly! Find great tips for preparation: From choosing the pan to the ideal cooking time. - Other useful tools like shopping list, Kitchen Timer, boiling point calculator etc.

Ob Sie nun zu jenen Menschen gehören, die die Weihnachtszeit festlich im Kreise Ihrer Familie verbringen, oder ob Sie sich für ein ganz anderes Programm entschieden haben: Smartphone schütteln und vom Weihnachtsstress ablenken lassen. Whether you are among those people who spend the festive Christmas season with your family, or if you have chosen a different program: Shake smartphone and get distracted from the Christmas rush.

Blooby is the cutest seahorse you have ever seen! Blooby's friends Splashy Fish and Flashy Sharky went to a hidden place and now Blooby must find them. It's a real adventure swimming through the highly difficult obstacles but it is easy to manage by just simply one time tapping the screen, so that Blooby keeps swimming. Do you think that you can help Blooby find his friends? Nobody knows how far they went, but maybe you will be the first who will find them. Start now with Blooby the adventure of an amazing undersea world and enjoy this awesome game! Compare your Highscore with your friends in the included Game Center! If you like this game or if you have found Blooby's friends, please rate and comment Blooby in the Play Store, so that everybody knows where they are.

description: Mit „eErsteHilfe“ steht dem Benutzer der gesamte Inhalt der Ersten-Hilfe-Fibel aus dem Erste-Hilfe-Grundkurs in kurzer, anschaulicher und übersichtlicher Weise für sein Smartphone zur Verfügung. Regelmäßige Updates garantieren, dass der Anwender immer am neusten Stand in der Ersten Hilfe bleibt. Die Applikation ersetzt keinen EH-Kurse, sie dient in erster Linie interessierten Nutzern zur Wiederholung der Erste-Hilfe-Maßnahmen, da bereits ein Jahr nach Absolvierung eines Kurses viele Inhalte in Vergessenheit geraten. Sind mehrere Ersthelfer am Unfallort, kann ein Helfer die anderen mittels dieser Applikation anweisen und unterstützen.

description: Start your computer with just one click from app or widget! To add your devices, just run the integrated networkscanner. It will save all computers with Hostname, IP-Adresse and MAC-Address. Features in v1.4.8: ✓ Networkscanner to add new devices automatically ✓ Tasker / Locale-Plugin to automate wakeup of devices ✓ WAN-support to wake devices over internet (Please disable Broadcast in the expertsettings) ✓ Widget to start your computer right from your homescreen ✓ Online-status of your managed computers ✓ Manageable in groups Tips: ● "Wake on Lan" uses the WOL-Standard to wake up devices.   In order to use it, WOL must be enabled on each computer.   In order to wake devices over Internet, you have to configure adequate port-forwardings on your router. ● The networkscanner scans for all devices, which are currently online. ● Because of certain circumstances (like special network-topologies),   the networkscanner may find wrong MAC-Addresses.   If the wake-process fails, please check for a correct MAC-Address. ● Please search the web for more information about configuration.   There are several tutorials available. ● The online-status of a computer may be wrong because of several issues   like installed firewalls.
release_text: v1.4.8 ● Changed method of onlinestatus check - Fix for Samsung Galaxy S3 Android 4.3 v1.4.6 ● Fixed erroneous CPU consumption in background v1.4.5 ● Fixed crash on Android 2.2 devices ● Minor UI changes If you encounter problems or have suggestions, please feel free to contact me via E-Mail.

description: Knowledge is sexy! Expertino is the cool new Trivia and Learnapp. Create your own Questionnaire at www.expertino.com, upload and share it with your friends, family, workbuddys or download questionnaires from other people. Train your brain, compete with others! Share your Highscore, measure yourself with the whole world! Great for you next test in school, but not only for this: This is also fun in the bus, or in a traffic jam. Its not only learning. Its playing ant fun! You dont want to learn today? No Problem with Expertino! Just create a new questionnaire with useless topics which would never be learned in school! No limits with expertino! Go nuts! You get 7 start catalogs with the topics: -Two and a half men -Twilight -How i met your mother -Game of Thrones -Capitals of the U.S. -Capitalquiz Europe -Batman (The Dark Knight rises but also previous films/series)

A special place for your widgets. Put your favorite widgets into a full-screen overlay. Don't waste your precious homescreen on widgets. You are supposed to work with your phone, not staring at the homescreen. Have your widgets right there, even if you are busy or gaming. No need to close an app just to use a widget. Features: + Keep your apps running while using widgets + Have your widgets organized in one place + Have more space on the Homescreen + Completely free + No ads More features to come: Stay tuned! For wishes/requests/questions please comment or write a mail. Check it out!

description: The game design is pretty simple yet very powerful. You play on 9 tic-tac-toe fields which form a big tic-tac-toe. The official rules can be found on http://mathwithbaddrawings.com/2013/06/16/ultimate-tic-tac-toe/ where the only twist is, that within our version a small tic-tac-toe is considered as “full” if somebody won the tic-tac-toe. This version of the game is a quick and rough version of a multiplayer (and Computer-Opponent) game. Please be patient while loading (give it maybe 15-20 seconds). It looks like nothing happens at the beginning; instead your opponent is eventually playing. We did not spend a lot of time for Design and Artwork, instead we were looking to have something stable and nice to play with… Checkout also our official developer website, there we explain everything a little bit better, the space here is just not sufficient enough ( http://expertino.com/tictactoe ) Also try the other ultimate tic tac toe versions, we saw that some of them have a better design, but lack in the multiplayer ability or don’t have computer opponents…

nextstop Dubai, public transport schedule for Dubai Arab Emirates - Wojhati Nextstop provides an information service in real time for all public transport lines of Dubai City. The current timetable and information of departure times of all stations are at your hands in no time. Additionally, to allow a better orientation, stations can be displayed on a road map. For route calculation, the departure and destination points can be either stations or positions on the road map. Nextstop shows you your route, from door to door including all footpaths. With nextstop you get important information for your travel all the time and always up to date. Where and when with nextstop Start nextstop and see immediately the departures of surrounding stations! description: SEMERGY basic ist eine Android App für die approximative Berechnung des Heizwärmebedarfs (HWB) eines Gebäudes. Die App dient dazu, um - zum Beispiel beim Kauf eines Gebäudes - die Plausibilität der angegebenen Werte überprüfen zu können. Aufbauend darauf kann die webbasierte Version von SEMERGY für eine genauere Berechnung des HWB sowie die individuelle Definition von kosteneffizienten und nachhaltigen Sanierungsmaßnahmen zur Verbesserung der Gebäudeenergieeffizienz verwendet werden. Der von SEMERGY basic errechnete Heizwärmebedarf wird auf Basis Ihrer Angaben errechnet und ist als Richtwert zu verstehen. Der tatsächliche Energieverbrauch Ihres Gebäudes kann, insbesondere bei nicht normgerechten Nutzungsverhalten oder erfolgten Teilsanierungen, vom errechneten Richtwert erheblich abweichen. SEMERGY basic ist als Informationswerkzeug zu verstehen und ersetzt keine professionelle Heizwärmebedarfsberechnung. SEMERGY ist in deutscher Sprache verfügbar. Schlüsselwörter: Gebäudesanierung, Energieeffizienz, Haus, Thermische Sanierung, Neubau, HWB, Heizwärmebedarf, Energieverbrauch, kWh, Energiesparen, Gebäudeplanung, Immo, Immobilien, Immobilienbewertung, Sanierungsrechner, Hausbau, Energie sparen, Sanierungscheck, Bauen. Wir freuen uns sehr über Verbesserungsvorschläge und Feedback per email ( feedback@semergy.net ). SEMERGY basic is an android app for the approximate calculation of the heating demand (HWB) of a building. The app is designed to - for example purchasing a building - to check the plausibility of the stated values. Based on this, the web-based version of SEMERGY for a more accurate calculation of the MSB and the individual definition of cost-effective and sustainable remedial measures to improve building energy efficiency can be used. The calculated SEMERGY of basic heating requirement is calculated on the basis of your information and is intended as a guideline. The actual energy consumption of your building can, especially in non-standard usage or made part renovations, deviate from the calculated guideline value significantly. SEMERGY basic is to be understood as an information tool and not a substitute for professional heating requirement calculation. SEMERGY is available in German language. Keywords: building renovation, energy efficiency, home, thermal renovation, new construction, HWB, heating demand, energy consumption, kWh, energy conservation, building design, Realty, real estate, real estate appraisal, remediation calculator, home construction, save energy, restoration check, Building. We are very pleased about suggestions and feedback by email ( feedback@semergy.net ).

description: Formula is definitive training resource for hospitality professionals and those in the general public wanting to know more about the fundamentals of being a great bartender. Create amazing mixed drinks and cocktails, make coffee like the best baristas and pour and talk about beer like an aficionado; it’s all here! Please ensure you are running version 2.2(Gingerbread) or above before downloading FORMULA. The app contains over 50 instructional videos from spirits, beer, coffee and hospitality equipment professionals, plus over 200 helpful images and mountains of useful step by step information, all packaged to allow you to access exactly what you need quickly and easily. Those not in the hospitality industry will also get lots of relevant information across the beer, spirits and coffee sections – ever wanted to make cocktails like a legend, coffee like a barista and talk about and pour beer like an aficionado – Formula is your app! Formula has been designed to cover all practical aspects of the daily life of a bartender, with relevant and easy to access information covering areas such as: • Spirits – what they are and how describe and sell them • The art of great cocktails – step by step instructions on how to make amazing, consistent drinks every time • How understanding 7 basic formulas can allow you to make almost any mixed drink known • Coffee – How to make coffee professionally from start to finish, from tamping and dosing to putting the finishing touches on a macchiato • Beer – the fundamentals – how to talk about it, what it tastes like and what food goes with it • How to pour beer correctly, change kegs and CO₂ canisters • What to do when things go wrong with your coffee, beer or post-mix equipment • How to clean and maintain all of the important beverage serving equipment in your venue • All of the important OH&S issues to look out for in a typical bar We guarantee no hidden agendas or brand fluff, just simple, easy to use and understand practical knowledge and help. Formula is an indispensable resource for a bar professional and a peek into the world of quality bartending for those who want to be in the know... Created by Coca-Cola Amatil Australia. Developed and licensed by Sydney-based company Digital Stampede Pty Ltd.
release_text: • New content for Beer, Spirits and Post Mix • New videos for all sections • Favourites functionality • Share functionality • Improved 'hotspots'

description: Complete connect the dot puzzles of your favorite dinosaurs, listen to their roar and learn how to pronounce each of their names. From the award winning educational game developer designed for toddlers and preschoolers aged 2 and above. This educational and fun App helps young children learn the letters of the alphabet and the counting numbers while developing their hand eye coordination and puzzle solving skills. It is a great early learning game with photo quality pictures which toddlers, preschoolers, and kindergarten age children will enjoy. Kid's Dinosaur Join the Dots Puzzle has: • high quality images set against photographic scenes that look great on High Definition (HD) and retina displays of both tablets and smart phones • roars and fun sound effects for every dinosaur • select from lowercase a b c... uppercase A B C... or numbers 1 2 3... for the dots in each of the puzzles • optional hint feature to help young ones find the next dot • shows written name and pronunciation for every prehistoric creature in the set (English language) • teaches the order of letters of the alphabet from A to Z and numbers 1 to 26 • covers lots of your favorite dinosaurs including the Tyrannosaurus Rex (T Rex), Brachiosaurus, Stegosaurus, Triceratops, Dilophosaurus, Diplodocus, Gigantoraptor. Also covers some lesser known one’s like the Utahraptor, Zuniceratops and many others. • puzzles that can be replayed again after solving and a star is awarded for each completion • increasing difficulty as your child progresses through the games in three distinct levels • no advertising Kid's Dinosaur Jigsaw Puzzles comes with a selection of free puzzles that can be easily upgraded through a single low cost in-app purchase to enable all puzzles. By upgrading from the Free App to the full version you’ll also be entitled to all additional puzzles and features added in future releases. Connect the Dots games have traditionally been a fun and early education learning tool for tots, toddlers, preschoolers, kindergarten, and early school age children and are a stimulating game for girls and an exciting game for boys. • 2 year old and 3 year old children can practice their hand eye coordination and matching skills as they progress through the puzzles on each level and enjoy the roars and sounds on completion of each puzzle • 4 year old and 5 year old kids can learn to read, write and pronounce the complicated dinosaur names. We hope you and your children enjoy playing our latest and best early education game for toddlers and preschoolers. Check out our other puzzle games and acclaimed kids educational apps at http://espacepublishing.com or follow us on Facebook for the scoop on new app releases and free giveaways at http://facebook.com/espacepublishing .

Easy, simple, fast. No cloud, no lock in, your data is private. Simple, easy, fast, flexible and reliable cash register or point of sale alternative, suitable for high sales volume cafes, mobile services, food vans, coffee carts, market stalls, dollar shops, popup shops, trade shows and club events or anyone that needs a fast, configurable and flexible register with locally stored data. Torn between the problems of an open till, a primitive cash register and an inflexible PC Point of Sale? SuperFastPoS is just what you need to record your sales transactions without getting in the way, speeding up counter sales to increase revenue. Now with open orders, table service and inventory, so it can also easily be used as an invoicing tool. The application has a flat navigation to ensure only the minimum number of finger taps, clicks or swipes are required to record a sale, with a highly customizable interface. Thousands of products? No problem, use a bluetooth barcode reader or the searchbar for rapid order entry. Now with optional Mint Wireless chip and pin card payment processing integration for Australian customers, with more payment provider options coming soon. Either use the simple built in functions for managing your products or use the easy import and export options. Choose icons from built in shapes or photos or picture gallery. You can also apply individual colours on each item for instant recognition of each item. Items can also be defined on the fly for those custom orders that may come up. Whether adding items automatically with a bluetooth barcode reader or built-in camera scanner, booking orders to customer accounts or setting up loyalty points it is simple and easy with SuperFastPoS. Split bills allow easy separate payment types on an order. You can arrange the screen by simple drag and drop, even across multiple pages of products so that combinations sold together are positioned close together for faster sales processing. Integrates with standard POS receipt printers and cash drawers or you can simply email receipts. If offline, recepts get emailed once a network is found. Wireless network, Bluetooth and USB printer and drawer connection options allows for a wide range of hardware integration options. Discounts can easily be applied with a simple slider, automatically updating the current sales order including recalculating all taxes and totals. Automatically apply a discount based on the customer selected or just apply to one line item. Customer loyalty points can also be automatically added based on points set for each product. Unlimited multiple tax rates, both inclusive and exclusive to the unit price can be easily added and applied to each product for automatic calculation of GST/VAT for tax reporting. Flexible sales reporting with graphs and comma separated exports, cash drawer balance tracking and reconciliation with exportable reporting on adjustments. No requirement to maintain a constant internet connection, all of your data is stored on your device. The complete database can be exported for backup or for running custom reports. Fully functional trial limited to 15 orders without an in-app subscription purchase. Subscription can be for just one month or longer as required. Permissions use and reason: Internet/network state: For wireless access to pos printer/cash drawer Bluetooth: For bluetooth printer connectivity Camera: For barcode reading via camera Write external storage: For database, products and report import and export Read contacts: For optionally selecting a contact in the contacts list to be applied to customer details

description: Your Medical Encyclopaedia contains detailed comprehensive illustrated information on 400+ medical conditions, which would fill more than 1000 pages of a standard medical text. All information in this encyclopaedia is current and has been cross-referenced with a number of highly reputable sources (see data source). This information is presented under the following headings for easy access; -Disease Description. A clear and concise description of the disease including pathophysiology, incidence, complications and causes. Information is presented in a simple easy to understand format without sacrificing accuracy or detail. Explanations of disease processes are assisted by the appropriate use of illustrations and diagrams. -Signs and Symptoms. A complete description of all the signs and symptoms associated with each disease. -Investigations. A detailed list of recommended investigations which may be used to make a diagnosis. This includes laboratory tests, radiography, imaging, surgery and all other relevant investigations -Treatment. A comprehensive and detailed description of current recommended treatments, including dosages for most medications -Patient Management. Things the patient can do to assist in treatment where applicable. Most medical information accessible to the general public is either over simplified and of questionable value, or too complicated to understand. The objective when compiling this encyclopaedia was too strike a middle ground, so that the information was presented in a way that could be understood by the general public and contained enough accurate and detailed information to satisfy health care providers or members of the medical profession. This software was designed to assist members of the public with their healthcare by providing easy access to an accurate source of comprehensible medical information. Other individuals or groups which would benefit from the use of this software include; -Patients with an exiting medical condition can access simple detailed illustrated explanations of their condition with the click of a button. They can also obtain information on the appropriate diagnostic tests and procedures which should be used to confirm the diagnosis and check their medication in the treatment section. -Patients who are newly diagnosed will be better able to understand their condition and will be well informed about upcoming diagnostic tests and procedures and the different forms of treatment currently available. -Medical practitioners can refresh their memory from the 400+ diseases in the database or quickly obtain a list of recommended diagnostic tests or procedures. -Allied health professionals can use the software to quickly obtain simple accurate and detailed descriptions of medical conditions they may not be familiar with so that they can better contribute to patient care -Medical students can gain rapid access to a vast collection of readily available medical information at a fraction of the cost of medical text books. They will also appreciate the simple yet detailed disease descriptions, with coloured illustrations and the comprehensive list of diagnostic tests and treatments. Data Source All of the medical data used to compile this software was extracted, cross-referenced or summarised from a number of highly reputable sources including: -Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine 16th Edit. -The Merck Manual 18th Edit. -Oxford Handbook of Clinical Medicine 6th Edit. -Murtagh's General Practice -Medscape's eMedicine If you want high quality, accurate up to date medical information at your finger tips, download this app now

app_name: Pimp My Music - Tag Editor Pro
description: Try 'Pimp My Music - Free' first. The pro version has no banner ads. The most complete and feature rich Android music tag editor/music player on the market! Find missing album covers/lyrics and change artist and album names effortlessly, straight from your phone. ***Important*** From Android 4.4 Kitkat and above. Google has restricted third party apps from writing to an external SD card. This means that this app can no longer update music on an SD card on Kitkat and above. You can either move your music collection to internal storage OR root your device and change your external storage permissions. ******************************************************************************************************************************** * Fix your music library, on your phone. * Music player * LRC Karaoke style lyrics scrolling/highlighting support (LRC format must be pasted into lyrics field) (Beta) * Edit Id3 tags in MP3, OGG, FLAC, MP4, M4A, M4P, M4B, WAV, RA, RM, MPGA and WMA audio files. * Auto fetch missing album covers. * Search and save album covers/art from Google images (finds images for rare albums). * Add album covers from sdcard. * Batch tagging. * Rename/delete files from id3 tag fields. * Saves to both file and android media database. * Audio playback (not FLAC or WMA audio). * App2sd (store app on SD card) * Supports MP3 ID3v1,ID3v11, ID3v2.2, v2.3 and v2.4 transparently, saves in v2.4. * Browse by album, artist, song, genre, folders. * Search by ID3 fields. * Editable ID3 tag fields include: artist, title, album, artist album, genre, comment, track, track total, composer, lyrics, year, disc number. * Search lyrics (artist & title and from text in lyrics) * Auto fetch missing lyrics * Fix garbled tags by changing character sets. Note: * Unfortunately, Google have blocked write access to external storage from kitkat (api level 19 and above). Media files would need to be on your internal storage. Or if you root your device, you can modify the external storage write permissions. * Saves to both file id3 tag and Android music player database. * The android music player only uses 1 album cover per album. Save one file in an album and the music player will show that album cover for all the tracks in the album. * The missing album cover search selects the first result, if it is wrong you need to change it manually by clicking on the song. * Does not edit all video file formats. Any errors please submit an error report. If you would like to help fix wrong translations, please send an email.
release_text: 2.2.4 - Reverted text save changes - Added BPM (Beats per Minute) field - Minor translation fixes 2.2.3 - Thumbnails now automatically refresh after a save - List scrolling improvements. - Tags -> Filename - now available in multiple file mode - Filename -> Tags - now available in multiple file mode - Tag saving improvements - Bug fixes 2.2.2 - Improved Music Player stability

developer: NSW Department of Attorney General and Justice
description: The Australian NSW Registry of Births Deaths & Marriages Family History App is the cornerstone of building your New South Wales family tree. Find out more about your ancestors. Where they were born, where they got married, where and when they died. Are there any secrets in your family for you to uncover? Don’t leave any relatives unfound. The Registry is the official keeper of birth, death & marriage records registered in New South Wales, Australia. Search the historical indexes for free today! If there is a record that captures your interest or completes the missing puzzle of your family tree you can purchase a birth, death or marriage certificate through the Registry’s official Family History App. Ever wanted to find out more about the first settlers, iconic Australians or historical moments of your ancestor’s? Are you related to a famous Australian? Start searching today and discover information about your family’s past. Collect certificates and create a family tree for future generations. Use the Family History app to: · Search historical indexes · Trace your family tree · Search specific birth, death or marriage records · Purchase birth, death or marriage certificates · Find specific information such as birth, marriage & burial place of your ancestors · Look up iconic Australians · Build a collection of certificates What indexes can you look up? You can search historical indexes for births deaths & marriages registered in New South Wales. Births - 100 years ago or more Deaths - 30 years ago or more Marriages - 50 years ago or more How does it work? Using the Family History App is simple. All you need to do is select the event type you wish to search, type in the name/s and year of birth, death or marriage and then select search. If you’re not sure of the exact year, you can type in a year range and the App will bring back matching results for events records in the New South Wales Registry's historical indexes. Once you have selected a specific record you can then purchase the certificate. When a selection is made you will be directed to the Registry’s secure website for the final purchase. The certificate will be posted to you. Postage is free! To find out more go to www.bdm.nsw.gov.au

Speed Adviser is a trial driver's aid designed to reduce speeding and save lives in NSW. Speed Adviser monitors your location and speed via GPS and plays an audible warning if you exceed the speed limit. Speeding is the most common contributing factor to road deaths in NSW. NEVER FORGET THE SPEED LIMIT Speed Adviser displays the speed limit for the road you are travelling on. Speed zone data has been compiled by NSW Roads and Maritime Services, Transport for NSW and Sensis. DOWNLOADING AND INSTALLATION Ensure you have a Google account and that it is linked to your phone. When you have an account, open the “Settings” app on your phone and find the “Accounts” section. If your account is not linked to the phone, tap “Add account” to add your Google account. You can install Speed Adviser using the Play Store app on your phone (called “Market” on older phones), or by accessing the Google Play website on your computer. Generally Speed Adviser will not download to your phone until it is connected to a WiFi network. To download Speed Adviser over a 3G network, go to the Play Store app on your phone and in its Settings turn off the option to “Auto-update apps over WiFi only”. Be aware that it will probably cost you more to download over a 3G network rather than WiFi. Two files are downloaded when you install Speed Adviser. The main file is about 10 MB and the secondary file about 130MB. If the downloading of the secondary file does not start automatically, accessing Speed Adviser on your phone will guide you through the downloading. CHANGES IN SPEED LIMIT Speed Adviser alerts will go off if you are speeding to remind you to keep within the sign posted limit. Another alert will be played if you continue to speed. Alerts can be spoken in a male or female voice; a simple sound effect or you can disable audio alerts. Speed Adviser display will flash. SCHOOL ZONES Speed Adviser knows where and when every school zone in NSW is active – including gazetted school days and non-standard school zones. Speed Adviser lets you know if a school zone is active and displays the speed limit of 40 km/h. NIGHT DRIVING Speed Adviser automatically switches between day and night modes. The night mode display emits less light, reducing visual strain. HEAVY VEHICLES You can specify if you're driving a heavy vehicle. Speed Adviser will warn you when you exceed the NSW maximum speed limit of 100 km/h. RUN OTHER APPS AT THE SAME TIME Speed Adviser will run in the background, still playing alerts, allowing you to use other apps. L PLATE AND P PLATE DRIVERS Learner and P1 drivers may not use this app. P2 drivers can use Speed Adviser; the app will operate with the maximum100 km/h that applies to all P2 drivers in NSW. WARNINGS You must not adjust the app while driving and must have your phone in a commercial phone mount when using a driver’s aid such as Speed Adviser, in accordance with the NSW Road Rules. Speed Adviser uses your phone’s GPS hardware which uses considerable battery power. You can use a car charger while operating Speed Adviser and should always terminate the app when you are finished with it. PRIVACY Speed Adviser does not collect data or report speeding events to Transport for NSW. ON THE WEB For more info go to http://roadsafety.transport.nsw.gov.au/aboutthecentre/research/roadsafetytechnology/speedadviser/index.html . Go to www.speedadviser.com.au to provide feedback.
release_text: * Updated speed limit data across all NSW * Added advance warning of school zones * Added speed limit data for 1000km of new roads

2.1+ version of "Network Info" Donate version available, buy me a coffee :) Shows info about the phone and the current network, Bluetooth, IPv6 and Cell connection. It also shows your public/external IP & hostname. Only goes on-line to get and resolve the public IP via my own server http://aschillings.co.uk/myscripts/getip.php and to remotely resolve it (see notes below). Initially the application was also using whatismyip.org but, as the server seems to be constantly down it was removed. No ads. >> Information shown << •Device IP and hostname, both private and public. •Current mobile Cell and any neighbours, along with their signal strength, location info and type. •IMSI/ IMEI. •Information about the current mobile provider (MCC+MNC, current connection, etc.) •The Android device unique ID. •Full information regarding the WiFi connection (MAC, current SSID and BSSID, link speed, IP/Netmask, Gateway, DNS and DHCP servers, etc.) •Your current location according to Android based on your network neighbours. No GPS is needed or used. •Information regarding Bluetooth status, the current Bluetooth connection(s) and info about past pairings. •IPv6 device and router IP addresses for all device interfaces (see notes, this should now work for everyone). >> Notes << •This is an expansion of the 'Network Info' application, to support more phones based on the 2.1 Android API. •I only have a GSM/UMTS phone. If anything funny happens on any other phone type, email me and I will try to fix it. •This application will connect to the network only to fetch your external IP/Hostname (using http://aschillings.co.uk/myscripts/getip.php and http://aschillings.co.uk/myscripts/gethostname.php ). No other information is sent (my policy is located below). •Please email me about any bugs or features you want. I cannot see all market comments and I am not notified when someone does comment. •The IPv6 part should now work for everyone. If that is not the case for you, please email me ( aschillings.dev@gmail.com ) so I can try to fix it. If possible, download 'Under the hood' from the market and send me the results via export. •If you want to show the Vendor which owns a MAC address, download 'MAC (OUI) Database' from the market (it is one of my applications) and use it to download a copy of the OUI database. •In version v0.5.2 I added remote hostname resolution which is your public hostname as is resolved by my server. It should be the same as your external hostname, unless there is a record propagation delay or your DNS server is lying (like some home routers which resolve their external address as a local hostname). My server is hosted by 1and1 so this will be unreliable if you use the same DNS servers. •'Ext. Hostname (L)' is the hostname your device resolves your external IP (local resolve).\n •'Ext. Hostname (R)' is the hostname my server resolves your external IP (remote resolve). •'Field Test' is a hidden application which comes installed in HTC phones. The menu item will only appear if the 'Field Test' is installed in your phone. >> Known Issues << Samsung devices do not display Neighbouring Cells. This is a problem in Samsung's Android implementation and there is nothing I can do. >> Privacy Statement << I do not collect any information which can directly and uniquely identify and/or bind a user to a device or any other personal information. When you retrieve your external IP address, my server will log a standard website “hit” which is the same as if you browsed a page on my server using a browser. No other information is logged or kept. *** Please email me with any bugs/problems/feature requests. I cannot reply to market comments which can make debugging difficult. ***

description: Welcome to explore the United States Of America (USA). This application gives you information about the United States Of America (USA). Explore history off USA. Learn everything about the United States Of America (USA). Quick Information: The United States of America (USA), commonly referred to as the United States (US), America, or simply the States, is a federal republic consisting of 50 states, 16 territories, and a federal district. The 48 contiguous states and the federal district of Washington, D.C., are in central North America between Canada and Mexico. The state of Alaska is the northwestern part of North America and the state of Hawaii is an archipelago in the mid-Pacific. The country also has five populated and nine unpopulated territories in the Pacific and the Caribbean. The largest of these territories are Puerto Rico and the American Virgin Islands. At 3.79 million square miles (9.83 million km2) in total and with around 316 million people, the United States is the fourth-largest country by total area and third largest by population. It is one of the world's most ethnically diverse and multicultural nations, the product of large-scale immigration from many countries. The geography and climate of the United States is also extremely diverse, and it is home to a wide variety of wildlife. General informations about the United States Of America: - Etymology - History - Geography - Climate and environment - Environmental issues - Political divisions - Parties and elections - Foreign relations - Government finance - Public debt - Military - Crime and law enforcement - Economy - Income, poverty, and wealth - Transportation - Popular media - Literature philosophy, and the arts - Food - Sports

description: Create your child's photo book on the go. Publish to secure web page. Post To Facebook. Email the events to your family and friends. Never lose those memories. Must have app for Moms and Dads. With baby journal app you don't have to wait to come home. Start capturing those precious moments right from the hospital room. This is an easy, efficient and fun way to create the baby journal and mark important events on the baby calendar. New events can be added easily on Calendar and can be viewed from journal. Events can also be edited or deleted. For a quick glance on photos, just go to the photos tab. Baby Journal app is like a scrapbook. You can pick different stickers while adding new events. Individual events can be shared with your family and freinds when you are in journal. Complete journal can be shared through the share tab. Now you can also post the baby diary/journal to your Facebook. This is the first version. We always encourage feedback from users to make this app better than before. Version 1.6: Bug Fixes Keywords: Baby Book, Baby First year, Scrapbook, Online Baby Journal, Baby Diary, Baby Events Log
release_text: Now you can publish the mobile baby journal, photo book to secure online web journal. Web based journal can be shared with your friends and family. Web journal can be accessed at http://www.babyfirstjournal.com

* * * * * If you like my free app you can support me by buying the pay version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=barsnick.felix.camcalc.don This includes the same functionality, so it is only a small financial thank you to me. The pay app will always be Ad free! * * * * * DSLR CamCalc is a helper to calculate values ​​and settings related to photography. By day and night my app helps you create wonderful pictures during day and at night with clear and very useful features. But this is no app to make or edit photos on your smartphone. This can be calculated: + Maximum exposure time without star trails at night + Calculate the hyperfocal distance + Calculate the Depth of Field <<-- NEW + Calculate the critical aperture to avoid diffraction blur << -- NEW + How to adjust the exposure time to a modified ISO and aperture + Extension of the exposure time for up to three neutral density filters + Calculate sun / moon rise and set for any date and location << -- NEW + Determine the stereo basis for 3D Photos The following sensorsizes are now supported: + Fullframe + APS-C Canon + APS-H Canon + DX Nikon + CX Nikon + Sony/Pentax APS-C + (Micro-)Four-Thirds This app is in constant change, I appreciate any user feedback and always keep that in mind for my app updates. In the latest version, the permission to access GPS is added. The GPS position is only used for sun and moon rise and set calculation and not otherwise. This app uses anonymous user tracking by Flurry. Visit their website for more information www.flurry.com

app_name: 電池残量表示ウィジェット.初音ミク[VOCALOID]
description: ニコニコ動画などでも大人気のボーカロイド、初音ミク（はつねみく）があなたのスマホを完璧にサポート！ 【ミクラボ】による初音ミクシリーズ第一弾、電池残量表示ウィジェットver.初音ミクが登場です！ お使いのスマートフォンの電池残量がひとめで細かくわかります！ さらに節電設定機能でバッテリーの減りも抑える事が出来ます！ ボカロ好きの友達に自慢しよう♪ ＊＊＊＊便利な機能＊＊＊＊ ◆シンプルなデザインにこだわり、誰にでも使いやすいアプリに仕上げました。 ◆1刻みのパーセント表示なので、バッテリー残量が細かくわかります。 ◆サイズは3種類あります。お好みのサイズでご利用下さい。 ◆節電設定で充電超長持ち！！ ☆ワンタッチの簡単節電設定☆ 以下項目のＯＮ/ＯＦＦが切り替えられます。 ・WiFi設定 ・Bluetooth設定 ・画面の自動回転設定 ・アカウント自動同期設定 ・GPS設定 使わない機能をオフにして充電を長持ちさせよう♪ ※ウィジェット一覧に当アプリが表示されない方へ※ ・解決方法その1 Android OSが、ウィジェット一覧を更新しそこねることがあるため 一覧を表示したまま、お使いの端末本体を横もしくは縦に倒して 画面表示を横向きもしくは縦向きにして、一覧を更新して下さい。 一覧が更新されれば当アプリのアイコンが登場します。 もし更新しても表示されない方は お手数ですが端末の再起動や、アプリの再インストールをお試し下さい。 ・解決方法その2 インストール先がSDカードになっていないかチェックして下さい。 ウィジェットはSDカードでなく端末本体にインストールしないと正常に動作しません。 自動的にインストール先は本体端末となりますが 一部機種ではSDカードへインストール出来てしまったり、もしくは手動でSDカードへ移動させた場合などに、 正常に動作しないという問題が発生してしまいます。 お手数ですがインストールの際には保存先を確認して 端末本体に保存するようお願い致します。 ※パーセント等が正常に表示されない方へ※ 端末自体のメモリが少ない機種をお使いの場合は うまく表示出来ずに、電池のパーセントがズレる場合があります。 予めご了承下さいませ。 インストール時の権限に現在地情報が必要となっておりますが これはGPS機能の節電設定をするためのものです。 ご安心くださいませ。 ミクラボは皆様の声援とアドバイスで成り立っています。 こんな便利アプリが欲しい！といったご要望がありましたら ぜひレビューにリクエストの書き込みをお願い致します！ これからもミクラボをご愛顧下さいますようよろしくお願い致します！ 本アプリはピアプロ・キャラクター・ライセンスに基づいてクリプトン・フューチャー・メディア株式会社のキャラクター「初音ミク」を使用しております。

description: Dé oplossing als u online wilt bankieren op uw tablet. Met de snelle en gebruiksvriendelijke Belfius Direct Tablet app kunt u de stand van uw rekeningen en van uw kredietkaart raadplegen of een overschrijving doen waar en wanneer u maar wilt, in alle veiligheid! Deze toepassing werd speciaal ontwikkeld voor tablets, met een uniek design! Gebruiksvriendelijk én een streling voor het oog! Bent u nog geen Belfius-klant? Word meteen klant via onze app en ontvang het gratis pack Belfius Pulse Start! Let op: is het de eerste keer dat u inlogt? Registreer uw toestel dan eerst met uw bankkaart en uw kaartlezer. Om al deze functies te kunnen gebruiken, maakt u eerst een Belfius Direct Mobile-contract aan, direct in de app zelf of via de optie ‘Mijn mobiele diensten’ in Belfius Direct Net (de online bankservice van Belfius Bank). De rest is kinderspel! The solution if you want to online banking on your tablet. With the fast and user Belfius Direct Tablet app allows you to check the status of your accounts and your credit card or bank transfer whenever and wherever you want, in complete safety!   This application was developed specifically for tablets, with a unique design! Easy to use and a delight to the eye!   Not yet a Belfius customer? Become a customer immediately via our app and get a free pack Belfius Pulse Start!   Please note that this is the first time you log in? Register your device first with your bank card and card reader. Thus the security of your transactions is perfectly guaranteed. Afterwards suffice your password to log on!   Take advantage of all existing features: - Make a bank transfer; - Transactions without the reader draw (depending on your limits); - Operations that require multiple signatures, with no signs reader; - Execute transactions between your accounts; - View Zoomit documents, edit and signs, through the Transfer menu; - Consult and manage standing orders; - Manage your list of beneficiaries; - Check the balance and the history of your personal or business accounts in an innovative way; - Search for a transaction in your history or evolution chart your balance; - Manage limits for transfers from current accounts through the app; - Consult consumed amount of a limit; - Check the balance, the history and the barriers of your credit card; - Change the limit of your credit card; - Recharge your Prepaid MasterCard; - An overview of your investments, including value-evolution, the detail and the gains and losses; - Income and manage expenses through Belfius Budget Assistant; - The app give a strong personal touch in "My List"; - Personalize your profile with a photo; - Contact Belfius; - Manage your Mobile contract; - Consult your retirement savings account; - Deposit on your retirement savings account. - Open a savings account.   In order to use all these features, first create a Belfius Direct Mobile contract, directly in the app or via the option "My mobile services' in Belfius Direct Net (online banking services Belfius Bank). The rest is easy!

description: Meteogram Widget - Free and Donate version Meteogram widget is a unique app because it shows the weather in a very detailed way at a glance on your home screen. The app comes in a free and a donate version ( Google Play: http://goo.gl/HbxHGx ). Support us by buying the donate version, offering some extra features (e.g. 10 day long term forecast, sunrise and sunset indication, show moon phase...). Besides those extra features, the app is more regularly updated. The app: the weather at a glance on your home screen Meteogram widget is a unique app because it shows the weather in a very detailed way at a glance on your home screen. While a lot of weather apps are showing the weather forecast in a rather basic way, this app does that by visualizing the forecast in a so-called meteogram. Doing so gives the user a much better idea of when exactly rain will fall, the sun will be shining, when it will become cloudy... The main focus of the app consists in showing the meteogram on a small home screen widget (e.g. a 4X1 widget). Even while the widget does not occupy that much space on the home screen, it still manages showing the forecast in a very clear way. Simply add a widget on your home screen, specify your location (or let the widget automatically determine your location) and the weather forecast appears on your home screen. The meteogram shows the temperature and expected precipitation for the whole forecast period. Besides those typical weather elements, the wind speed, wind direction and air pressure can also be visualized. The user has all freedom to determine how the meteogram should look like: a great set of configuration settings allows the user to customize the widget completely to his own needs. Feature overview • Temperature, precipitation, wind and pressure • Cloudiness indication • Short term forecast (next 24 or 48 hours) • Short term forecast for the next 5 days • Lots of user settings: colors, weather elements, ... Not all features are available in the free version. Below is a summary of the features that are exclusively available in the donate version (Google Play Store: http://goo.gl/HbxHGx) : • Long term forecast (next 10 days) • Show sunrise and sunset • Blue temperature line color when below freezing • Custom line thickness and style • Save settings as default settings • Show moon phase • Show wind chill • For United States only: NOAA as weather provider • More updates Weather forecast data All thanks to MET.NO (The Norwegian Meteorological Institute) for offering the weather forecast data. For a lot of European countries hourly forecast data is available, while for other countries 3 hourly data is available. For the long term forecast period, one of the best weather models - ECMWF - is used. Some remarks • Contact me if you have suggestions, remarks, issues... ( info@meteogramwidget.com ). • The app is optimized for use on smartphones • Join our Google+ Community : https://plus.google.com/communities/107244343755721103588
release_text: - 1.6.01: Lots of bug fixes and improvements Show actual location name (current location feature) Any questions or issue: info@meteogramwidget.com

description: The KBC Research app gives you access to the expertise of the KBC Market Research Desk. Daily in-depth analyses and forecasts on fixed income and foreign exchange markets, focused on the Euro zone, US, UK and Central Europe. You don’t have to register or log in. All you need to do is download the app. What to expect from KBC Research • Daily reports on developments in fixed income and foreign exchange markets and analysis of economic data. • A weekly overview of important economic data, government bond auctions and other events for financial markets. • Daily updated and historical graphs of exchange rates and interest rates. • Overview of KBC macroeconomic forecasts and forecasts for exchange rates and interest rates. • Short analysis and comments on what’s happening on the financial markets. The downloaded information remains available offline and you can archive the reports. Note for users: This application contains non-exhaustive information and is based on short-term forecasts for expected developments on the financial markets. KBC Bank cannot guarantee that these forecasts will materialise and cannot be held liable in any way for direct or consequential loss arising from any use of this document or its content. The document is not intended as personalised investment advice and does not constitute a recommendation to buy, sell or hold investments described in it. Although it has been obtained from and is based on sources KBC believes to be reliable, KBC does not guarantee the accuracy of this information, which may be incomplete or condensed. All opinions and estimates constitute a KBC judgement on the date of the report and are subject to change without notice.

You test your knowledge on the basis of 50 exam. Moreover, you can create unlimited new exams. Be selected at random every 50 questions. From a file with hundreds of questions

description: If your car breaks down or you’re involved in an car accident in Belgium or abroad, you obviously want to receive assistance as quickly as possible. To ensure this happens, KBC Insurance has developed a free App called KBC Assistance. Just one push of the button and you can contact a roadside assistance provider day or night wherever mobile phone coverage is available. At the same time, the provider also has all the information necessary (who you are, where you’re at, etc.) to assist you as quickly and efficiently as possible. The way in which you are assisted depends on the cover afforded by your assistance insurance policy. For optimal performance in Belgium, you should permit geolocation and enable your Internet connection. For optimal performance abroad, you should activate data roaming as well. Remember this may involve additional charges! KBC has developed this App especially for customer who have taken out fully comprehensive insurance or assistance cover. To get going, the only thing you have to do is download the App and install it… More info at www.kbc.be/kbcassistance

description: Welcome to Brussels VISITBRUSSELS, the most comprehensive app in Google Play to discover Brussels. 100% Offline (no roaming costs) and 100% free, this app is available in English, French and Dutch. Simple, functional, extremely complete, free and offline, the VISITBRUSSELS application is your official guide before or during your stay in Brussels. Features: - Around me: Thanks to the GPS locator (offline) you can easily discover where you are in Brussels and receive information about the “points of interests” POI surrounding you. You can also filter the type of place you want to see on the map from the 1200 addresses listed and updated daily. You can choose between list view or map view. - Map of Brussels 100% offline (no connection required). - A database of over 1200 addresses with listing, pictures and practical details + call function. Discover Brussels through 20 databases structured as follows: - Do & See : Top10 / Museums & Visits / Monuments & Sites / Events / Attractions & Leisure / Shopping / Markets - Eat & drink: Restaurants / Bars & Cafés / Breakfast - Nightlife: Nightclubs / Night Restaurants / Leisure / Live Music - Sleep: Hotels / Bed & Breakfast / Hostels / Tips / Pack hotels - Global search functionality in the application based on keywords. - Search on events in the Cultural Agenda

*** Root required *** This application will allow to use your device as a remote mouse and keyboard for your PC/PS3. Since low level apis are used, there is no way by now to ensure 100% compatibility with all devices (because of different bluetooth implementations of some vendors): if the log says "invalid or inactive bluetooth device" your only option is to try a different ROM like Cyanogenmod (if available). Look at the video tutorials for more info: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mU2Gwv3YmzA http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JQiCy46KCTE http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gfF6Qp1CUQU Quick tutorial: - Open the application and click on the start button (top/left button ">") - Check for errors in the log window - IMPORTANT: if you got the error "invalid or inactive bluetooth device", your device is not supported and your only option is to try a different ROM like Cyanogenmod (I cannot fix that because the problem is at "kernel" level). - Pair your device with an host of your choice* - Once paired, click on the lens button (secondo top/left) to refresh the available bluetooth devices - Click on a device of your choice to establish a connection - Once connected a green screen should appear - Single press to simulate the left mouse button (the background should change in blue) - Double press to simulate the right mouse button (the background should change in red) - Hit "menu" to show/hide/change the keyboard *Tested hosts: - PS3: works - Linux: works (tested on Ubuntu 10.10) - Windows 7: not working yet - MAC: ? (not tested) - Vizio Internet TV: works Like this app? Please rate 5 stars so that it can be improved, thanks! This is an ad-supported application (it won't start if you disabled ad on your device): please consider buying "BlueputDroidPro" (which doesn't require enabled ad) if you need an ad-free/donation version. Please respect my work and don't waste your time with unnecessary comments or bad rating for adchecker.

description: FTPDroid is an FTP server for Android that will let you to manage files and folders on your device without the USB cable. The benefits of using this application are: - Transfer files and folders to/from any computer and your device without the need of the USB cable. - No need anymore to mount/unmount the SD card. - Easily share files with other devices (Android or anything else, see the FAQs) - Keep the USB port of your device safe. Why FTPDroid is the best FTP server for Android? Because it's not YAFS (Yet Another FTP Server) since is a native port to Android of best FTP server around: Pure-FTPd http://www.pureftpd.org Features: - Anonymous access - Configurable users - Restrict access to specific folders - Active and passive mode - Multiple files transfers - UTF-8 support - Root support to allow binding on standard FTP port 21 (please note that root is supported but NOT required) - SSL/TLS support (pro) - App widget (pro) FAQs: q: How can I share files with another device? a: Look for an FTP client (every system like Android, iOS and Windows Phone has its own). q: Why my transfer speed decrease when I turn off the screen? a: Enable the option 'Lock Wifi'. If your device is running at least Android 2.3.x, you should get full speed transfer even when the screen is off, otherwise enable the option 'Lock screen' too. q: How can I disable anonymous access? a: Please follow the instructions in the help (open the menu from the main page of the application).
release_text: 2.1.1 - Preliminary Android 5 support (may not work with root yet) 2.1.0 - Optimized layout for tablets - Fixed a problem with in-app purchase restore - Google Play Services updated - Minor UI changes

description: *** ROOT REQUIRED *** SambaDroid is a native port for Android of the popular Samba for Linux. This application allows you to share/manage files on your device easily from any PC of your network: once started just type [Win]+[R] in your computer, write \\SAMBADROID and enjoy! FAQs: q: Why my transfer speed decrease when I turn off the screen? a: Enable the option 'Lock Wifi'. If your device is running at least Android 2.3.x, you should get full speed transfer even when the screen is off, otherwise enable the option 'Lock screen' too. q: I got the message "Can not find a valid WiFi interface", how can I solve it? a: On some devices (Galaxy Note 2 in particular) the WiFi interface is not detected from the application, please set the option "Bind interfaces" to wlan0 q: How can I use this app if my device is connected with an ethernet cable? a: Disable the require WiFi option and set as bind interface eth0

description: My Mtel makes it is easy for you to activate services, change your preferred “Friends and Family” numbers, check at any time what is your current usage or bill. You can track what remains from the minutes, SMS, MMS included in your tariff and if they are over you can easily and securely buy additional ones. When you want to visit a Mtel store, check out the nearest to you with its address, contact phone and business hours. My Mtel, the first application for smartphones on the Bulgarian telecommunications market is free and no internet will be taken from your monthly allowance. Mobile data usage of Google maps, however is charged according to the tariff plan. The application is in Bulgarian. Runs on smartphones with Android versions higher than 2.2.X. description: This is the Bible in simple language (spanish). Here you can not only read the sacred scriptures easily due to its good font size and simple vocabulary, but also hear it, as through a convenient button to turn on and off the voice of reading, this Bible will be read in viva voice. If you are performing tasks that do not allow you to be reading the Bible, with this version may also meet the Word of God, who will accompany you in listening with a pleasant voice. The Bible in simple language is a shortened and simplified version of the text universally recognized as the Word of God, for that is understandable through a reduced vocabulary and hold their value essential as teaching material and Christian religious guide. Now may accompany you on your phone or Android tablet to allow her to study and reference where you may need to hear or read the Holy Scripture. For the reading, the sacred text is auto adjust its size in order to provide an easy to view independent of the size of the screen on your Android device. WARNING: To make it possible to hear the narration of this Bible, you must have previously activated and configured in the appropriate language, the system of voice synthesis of Android. On most phones and current tablets this already comes pre-installed, but in the case that it isn't, you can activate it from the SETTINGS menu of Android, in the part of Language and Text Input.

La Santa Biblia en su versión de las américas, en español: Cada capítulo está escrito con letra grande, que se ajustará al tamaño de su pantalla automáticamente para una fácil lectura. Imprescindible material de guía y enseñanza religiosa, que se dispone en forma gratuita para usted, en su versión especialmente sancionada para los hispanoparlantes de las Américas. Nuevo: Puede dejar un comentario debajo de cualquier capítulo de la Biblia. Su comentario será publicado y compartido con todos los lectores. Podemos crecer todos en nuestra fé con las contribuciones de sentimientos, conocimientos y agradecimientos en la Palabra de Dios. ATENCIÓN: Necesitará tener acceso a internet para poder consultar cada capítulo. El contenido de la Biblia de las Américas reside en nuestro servidor y solamente le enviamos a su dispositivo Android el capítulo que usted elige, para no ocuparle espacio en su dispositivo Android y mantener los comentarios actualizados. The Holy Bible in its version of the americas, in Spanish: Each chapter is written in large letters, which will be adjusted automatically to the size of your screen for easy reading. Essential guidance material and religious education, which is available free of charge to you, as attested especially for Spanish-speaking Americas version. New: You can leave a comment under any chapter of the Bible. Your comment will be published and shared with all readers. We can all grow in our faith through the contributions of feelings, knowledge and acknowledgment of God's Word. ATTENTION: You need to have internet access to check each chapter. The content of the New American resides on our server and we only ship to your Android device chapter you choose to occupy him no space on your Android device and keep updated comments.

TINACloud is the cloud based multi-language online version of the popular TINA circuit simulation software now running on your mobile. With this powerful, industrial strength, yet affordable circuit simulation tool you can analyze & design analog, digital, VHDL, MCU, and mixed electronic circuits including also SMPS, RF, communication, and optoelectronic circuits and test microcontroller applications in a mixed circuit environment. Electrical engineers will find TINACloud an easy to use, high performance tool, while Educators will welcome its unique features for the training environment and distance education. You need to have a valid TINACloud subscription to use this product. If you don't have any, you may use the program in trial mode for 15 days or you may buy a subscription from the login window.

Celeb Heads Up Charades! by Blueique Studios. (NOT affiliated with Ellen iPhone Heads Up! app) An INSANELY funny game that will have you laughing in tears! The concept is simple, guess the word on the card that will sit on your head, from the clues your friends give you BEFORE the timer runs out! Your friends can use funny voices, mimic celebrities and moo like a cow - all to make you guess. Sorry no video recording! Awesome Instructions: - Hold phone to your head - Tilt the phone forward to bring up a new card, for a correct answer. - Have your friend describe the word on the card, but remember don't say the word on the card! - Tilt the phone back to pass. - All it takes is one friend to start playing, or play with many SIX Categories include: - Stranger Than Fiction: Jump for joy as your friends guess your most loved cartoon, TV and movie characters! - Make an Impression: Have your friends in hysterical laughter as you mimic a French accent or Texan! - Movies: Laugh as your friends mime Iron Man and other popular Hollywood movies! - Ani-mania: Double over in giggles as your friends moo like a cow and other animals! - Celebs: Watch your friends try their best to describe Jennifer Aniston and other stars! - Reality TV: Cry with tears as your friends pretend to be the cast from quality reality TV series such as 'Keeping Up with the Kardashians'. Parties will never be the same again, and you will be the life of the party! description: ◆“디딩보딩 디보디보딩 ‘디보’와 함께하는 신나는 모험”◆ ◆이벤트1 : 신나는 디보 주제곡 동영상과 재미있는 색칠놀이를 무료로 드립니다. ◆이벤트2 : 리뷰를 달아주신 모든 분께 디보 동영상 두 편을 무료로 드립니다. ◆[내 용] 아이들 방에 달린 모빌 위에 작은 세상이 펼쳐져 있습니다. 그곳은 바로 폭신폭신 마을 코지랜드 입니다. 코지랜드에는 분홍코끼리 버니와, 아기까마귀 크로, 용감한 코끼리 엘로,큰언니 애니와 아기양 올리버가 살고 있었어요. 그런데 어느 날 쿵쾅쿵쾅! 하는 커다란 발소리와 함께 선물공룡 디보가 찾아왔어요. 디보는 코지랜드 친구들에게 매일 하나씩 선물을 주며, 친구들을 신나는 모험의 세계로 초대합니다. 코지랜드 친구들은 디보만 있으면 언제 어디서나 즐겁답니다! 자~ 그럼 디보와 함께 모험의 세계로 떠나볼까요? -장 르: 유/아동 애니메이션 -제작형식: TV시리즈 애니메이션 -작품구성: 11분 52부작 -제작방식: Full 3D CGI Animation -제 작: ㈜오콘 ◆유니버셜앱 : 해당앱은 한번 구매로 안드로이드 폰과 패드 모두에서 사용할 수 있는 유니버셜앱 입니다. ◆앱 관련 문의: 결재 오류 및 앱에 관련된 문제 발생시( helpdesk@bluepin.co.kr ) ◆◆ 블루핀 공지 사항 ◆◆ 안녕하세요. 블루핀 매니저 입니다. 항상 저희 어플에 관심을 가져주셔서 감사드립니다. 어플 사용과 관련한 문의 사항을 리뷰에 올리시면 앱스토어 시스템상 대응하기 어려운점이 있습니다. 이에 고객님들의 문의 사항을 최대한 신속하게 처리하기 위해 블루핀 고객센터를 개설 하였습니다. 앱 관련 문의 사항이나 불편 사항에 대해서는 helpdesk@bluepin.co.kr 로 문의 주시면 최대한 빨리 확인하여 답변 드리도록 하겠습니다. 고객센터로 문의시에는 다음과 같은 방법으로 문의 주시면 더욱 빠른 답변이 가능합니다. (라바 공식 모바일 앱) ◆ 고객 감사 이벤트 하나 - 유쾌한 슬랩스틱 코미디 라바 2편과 재미있는 인터렉션 게임을 무료로 드립니다. ◆ 고객 감사 이벤트 둘 - 26편 전편구매시19.99-->9.99 50% 파격 할인!!! ◆ 옐로우와 레드. 두 애벌레의 상상초월 우주 최강 코믹쇼!! 라바는 버럭 레드와 만능재주꾼 옐로우가 펼치는 유쾌한 슬랩스틱 코미디입니다. 오로지 웃길 수만 있다면 그 어떤 시련과 역경에도 스스로 뛰어들어 웃음을 선사하고 마는 옐로우와 레드. 웃고싶을 때에도, 울고싶을 때에도, 언제든지 엔돌핀 제조기 옐로우와 레드를 찾아주세요! 여러분의 웃음폭탄 라바가 오늘도 빵! 터트려 드립니다. 52번가 횡단보도 앞 하수구 밑에 사는 작은 벌레, 레드와 옐로우. 오늘도 하수구 위에서는 사람들이 끊임없이 하수구 아래로 무엇인가를 떨어뜨립니다. 씹다 버린 껌, 먹다 버린 아이스크림, 동전, 반지 등등. 레드와 옐로우는 이런 것들로 인해 곤란해지기도 하고, 행복해지기도 하며, 때론 떨어진 물건을 차지하기 위해 티격태격하기도 합니다. 또, 인간들에게 별거 아닌 비나 더위, 모기, 바람 등으로 인해 레드와 옐로우는 생각지도 못한 위기 상황에 빠지기도 하는데……어려운 상황 속에서도 우리에게 웃음을 주는 레드와 옐로우. 오늘은 그들에게 무슨 일이 벌어질까요? ◆ 유니버셜앱 : 해당앱은 한번 구매로 안드로이드 폰과 패드 모두에서 사용할 수 있는 유니버셜앱 입니다. ◆ 앱 관련 문의 : 결재 오류 및 앱에 관련된 문제 발생시( helpdesk@bluepin.co.kr ) ◆◆ 블루핀 공지 사항 ◆◆ 안녕하세요. 블루핀 매니져 입니다. 항상 저희 어플에 관심을 가져주셔서 감사드립니다. 어플 사용과 관련한 문의 사항을 리뷰에 올리시면 앱스토어 시스템상 대응하기 어려운점이 있습니다. 이에 고객님들의 문의 사항을 최대한 신속하게 처리하기 위해 블루핀 고객센터를 개설 하였습니다. 앱 관련 문의 사항이나 불편 사항에 대해서는 ( helpdesk@bluepin.co.kr )로 문의 주시면 최대한 빨리 확인하여 답변 드리도록 하겠습니다. 고객센터로 문의시에는 다음과 같은 방법으로 문의 주시면 더욱 빠른 답변이 가능합니다. description: L’App Quotazioni di Borsa di BNP Paribas BNL mostra le quotazioni in tempo reale di azioni, indici, valute, materie prime e tassi d’interesse. Consulta da smartphone e tablet le news finanziarie e l’ampia gamma di certificati d’investimento e leva fissa e variabile (Turbo) proposti da BNP Paribas per soddisfare ogni esigenza di mercato. Il sito Prodotti di Borsa sul tuo smartphone e tablet! Real Time, Quotazioni in tempo reale: Vuoi monitorare il mercato finanziario in ogni momento e tenerti aggiornato sui sottostanti su cui hai investito? La sezione Real Time ti fornisce le quotazioni delle principali azioni, indici, valute, materie prime: tutto in tempo reale. In evidenza: Le più importanti news dai mercati finanziari, le soluzioni d’investimento adatte a diverse esigenze di mercato e le analisi tecniche sui principali indici europei. Inoltre tutte le newsletter di BNP Paribas. BNL: I certificati in collocamento presso le filiali BNL e l’esclusiva online: consulta le informazioni , scopri le interessanti opportunità di ogni mese e sfoglia il mensile “Un mese di Borsa”. Cerca: Trova i certificates che più si adattano alle tue preferenze e aspettative: vuoi investire a leva? al rialzo? Al ribasso? Oppure preferisci un investimento di lungo periodo? La gamma di certificati targati BNP Paribas risponde a tutte le esigenze degli investitori. Servizi: Scopri come funzionano i certificati nella sezione Academy, come contattare il team di Prodotti di Borsa o come scoprire importanti novità come i seminari. Keywords: _ Prodotti di Borsa _ Quotazioni _ Quotazioni di Borsa _ Quotazioni Real Time _ Quotazioni in tempo reale _ Borsa Italiana _ Borsa in tempo reale _ Borsa real time _ News finanza _ Notizie finanza _ News finanziarie _ Notizie finanziarie _ Mercato finanziario _ Mercati finanziari _ Azioni _ Indici _ Certificati _ Certificate _ Andamento azioni _ Andamento indici _ Andamento borsa _ Trading _ Trading online _ Investire in borsa _ Investire _ FTSE MIB _ Leva _ Turbo The App Market Prices BNL BNP Paribas shows real-time quotes of stocks, indices, currencies, commodities and interest rates. View from smartphones and tablets the financial news and the wide range of investment certificates and leverage fixed and variable (Turbo) offered by BNP Paribas to meet every need of the market. The website of Borsa products on your smartphone and tablet! Real Time, Real-time quotes: Do you want to monitor the financial market at all times and keep abreast of the underlying on which you have invested? The section Real Time gives you the prices of major stocks, indices, currencies, commodities, all in real time. Highlights: The most important news from the financial markets, the investment solutions for different requirements of market and technical analysis of the major European indices. In addition, all newsletters BNP Paribas. BNL: The certificates placement at the BNL branches and the exclusive online: See the information, discover the exciting opportunities of each month and browse the monthly "A month of the Stock Exchange." Search for: Find the certificates that suit your preferences and expectations: do you want to invest in leverage? the upside? The downside? Or do you prefer a long term investment? The range of certificates targati BNP Paribas meets all the needs of investors. Services: Find out how certificates work in the Academy, how to contact the team Products Stock Exchange or how to find out important news such as seminars. Keywords: _ Products of Stock Exchange _ Quotes _ Market Prices _ Real-Time Quotes _ Real-time quotes _ Italian Stock Exchange _ Stock Exchange in real time _ Stock Market real-time _ Finance News _ Finance News _ Financial News _ Financial News _ The Financial Market _ Financial Markets _ Shares _ Indices _ Certificates _ Certificate _ Performance shares _ Performance indices _ Performance bag _ Trading _ Online Trading _ Investing in the stock market _ Investing _ Dow _ Lever _ Turbo

description: This app provides complete information about borderline personality disorder diseases. Best comprehensive overview covers the symptoms and treatment of borderline personality disorder . This app has been developed for everyone, all topics has been made to make it complete, useful and interesting. We hope you will find this app very informative and useful. If you like it please do share it with your friends and family. Application does not overload you with complicated medical terminology, the language is clear and does not require any proficiency. ❤❤❤❤❤ Content & Features ❤❤❤❤❤ • how to prevent yourself from borderline personality disorder • definition , description of disease and symptoms sign • what are the causes of borderline personality disorder and risk factors • preparing for your appointment • tests and diagnosis • treatments and prevention • lifestyle and home remedies • internal medical disorders • congenital and inherited disorders • infectious diseases and organisms • drugs and medication for borderline personality disorder • easy to read and download & beautiful full screen slideshows • table of Contents can be used for easy access. • search option is available for quick search of the topic. • friendly and easy to use. • simple uses and indications. • easy to study, no need to install or keep updating local databases • important from examination point of view. • add to favorite option is added. • always new content will come in regular updates • internet connection is not required in order to use this app • 100% Free!!! anyway, this is a great worth app for your heath What to handle your heath from now on? Download this App now and learn from it for you loved. Help to keep away from borderline personality disorder in your family! Just download it and learn from it! Enjoy! ^_^ ❤❤❤❤❤ ATTENTION ❤❤❤❤❤ This app contains borderline personality disorder diseases information for knowledge if you need to apply then please contact to nearby doctor. Useful information but is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. If you think you may have a medical emergency, immediately call your doctor or the emergency services. Before acting on any of the information in this application, consult with your doctor to make sure that it is right for you. Information of the diseases, contained in this application, are not intended for medical treatment without a doctor and can be used for information purposes only. This app cannot and should not replace a pharmacist or a doctor consultation. App content is only for pocket reference & educational purposes. Consult a doctor before actual usage of any of the information in this app. ❤❤❤❤❤ App Developer Note ❤❤❤❤❤ Please Rate it 5 Star for our application and feel free to email us about any comments or suggestions for future improvement. In case you face any problems do send us an email with information about your phone model, and the exact problem, and we'll try to fix it immediately.

Play to learn math in the most entertaining way, combining operations and activities with our funny pictures. Suitable for children from USA , Canada , UK , Australia , New Zealand , India, Singapore , Hong Kong, ... Math practice for kids. It has 50 different games to learn math in second grade, divided into : ★ Add. ★ Subtract. ★ Fractions (with building blocks and pizzas). ★ Count. ★ Coin Math ( EUR / USD / GBP). ★ Geometry (polygons and polyhedra ). ★ Time ( analog clock, days of the week, months of the year). Learn math with BORIOL! Kids will love this game because it shows numbers, operations , polygons , watches, ... with a nice interface . You 'll like it too because this app it is based on the curriculum of second grade . Easy to play . You have the option of unlimited play . You can see your progress step by step . Learning app for kids at primary school suitable for children 6, 7, 8, 9 years. You can play without internet connection. Games adapted for tablets of 10", 8" and 7 ". Also for smartphones. Multiuser Users: ✔ England: key stage 1: year 2; ✔ England: key stage 2: year 3, 4 ✔ Australia: year 1, 2, 3, ✔ Parents for daily homework ✔ Teachers in the classroom ✔ Homeschoolers Follow us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boriol.apps Follow us on twitter : https://twitter.com/boriolapps Available in English, Spanish , catalan, german, french, Italian
