Quer inovar na cozinha? Precisa de receitas práticas e rápidas? O app Guia da Cozinha é perfeito para você! Ficou mais fácil impressionar os familiares e amigos com seus dotes culinários. E sem precisar de um livro de receitas gigante! Com layout reformulado, o app ficou ainda mais intuitivo! Aproveite agora as receitas deliciosas que separamos pra você! Todas as receitas são testadas e acompanhadas por foto: garantia de que vai dar certo e ficar uma delícia! Além disso, elas são classificadas por tempo de preparo e número de porções exata que rende: tudo pra você se organizar direitinho! O app conta, também, com a busca de receitas por ingredientes e uma lista de favoritas, para que você possa consultar sempre aquelas delícias que mais gostou de preparar e de saborear. Você ainda pode indicar os pratos para algum amigo ou parente por e-mail e até compartilhá-los nas redes sociais direto do seu celular! Mostre pra todo mundo que você arrasa na cozinha! O aplicativo já foi recomendado pela revista Info e 250 mil pessoas já testaram e aprovaram! Você vai ficar de fora? - layout reformulado - todas a receitas acompanhadas de foto, tempo de preparo e rendimento de porções - busca por receita ou ingrediente - seleção de favoritas de cada usuário - compartilhamento por e-mail e redes sociais Baixei agora e receba elogios na cozinha! Want to innovate in the kitchen? Need practical and quick recipes? The Food Guide app is perfect for you! It was easier to impress family and friends with your culinary skills. And without a giant book of recipes! With redesigned layout, the app was even more intuitive! Enjoy delicious recipes now we parted for you! All recipes are tested and accompanied by pictures: guarantee it will work and be a delight! Moreover, they are sorted by time of preparation and exact number of servings which yields: organize everything for you straight! The app also has a search recipes by ingredients and a list of favorites, so you can always refer you liked those delights to prepare and taste. You can still display the dishes for a friend or relative by email and even share them on social networks straight from your mobile phone! Show everybody that you rock in the kitchen! The application has been recommended by the magazine Info and 250 thousand people have already tested and approved! You will be left out? - Reworked layout - All the recipes accompanied the photo, preparation time and yield portions - Search by recipe or ingredient - Selection of favorites for each user - Sharing via email and social networks Downloaded now and receive praise in the kitchen!
release_text: - O layout está reformulado para seu melhor aproveitamento! - Compartilhamento em redes sociais - Envio das receitas por email - bug fix

description: APLICATIVO NÃO OFICIAL. ATENÇÃO: Esta aplicação funciona APENAS para o Detran de PERNAMBUCO. ATENÇÃO: As informações sobre os veículos bem como a DISPONIBILIDADE são de responsabilidade do Detran de Pernambuco. Esta aplicação apenas faz a consulta e exibe os dados para o usuário, assim poupando tempo e banda de internet do usuário. ATENÇÃO: Se por acaso a consulta não funcionar, por favor antes de avaliar a app negativamente tente entrar em contato pelo e-mail placasdetranpe@gmail.com . Muito obrigado. Consulte facilmente: 1 - Placas de veículos registrados no Detran do estado de PERNAMBUCO; 2 - Pontuação na carteira CNH (Carteira Nacional de Habilitação). Não perca mais tempo acessando o site. Com a aplicação Placas Detran PE você economiza tempo e plano de dados nas consultas citadas acima. IDEAL PARA: 1 - Quem trabalha no trânsito, por exemplo: 1.1 - BPTran; 1.2 - CTTU; 1.3 - Trânsito Educadores; 1.4 - Agentes de trânsito em geral. 2 - Quem trabalha em segurança pública: 2.1 - Diversos batalhões da Polícia Militar; 2.2 - Polícia Civil; 2.3 - Guarda Municipal. 3 - Quem trabalha com compra e venda de veículos usados: 3.1 - Agências; 3.2 - Corretores; 3.3 - Concessionárias; 3.4 - Locadoras. 4 - Pessoas físicas e jurídicas em geral: 4.1 - Consulta de situação de carros particulares; 4.2 - Consulta de situação de carros pertencentes a frotas; 4.3 - Taxistas. Com o Placas Detran PE você só precisa digitar a placa para ter acesso aos dados do veículo e detalhamento dos débitos como multas, restrições e licenciamento. Para consultar a pontuação e multas para o motorista também é simples: basta informar o CPF, CNH nova ou CNH antiga. Fácil e rápido. ATENÇÃO: Esta aplicação funciona APENAS para o Detran de PERNAMBUCO. Isto está bem claro no nome do aplicativo, na descrição e até na imagem da página. Por favor, não avalie o aplicativo negativamente caso este não funcione no seu estado. APLICATIVO NÃO OFICIAL. Observação: As informações sobre os veículos são de responsabilidade do Detran de Pernambuco. Esta aplicação apenas faz a consulta e exibe os dados para o usuário. Keywords: detran, pe, carro, moto, ônibus, caminhão, consulta, débito, multa, licenciamento, pontuação, carteira de motorista, cnh, habilitação, APLICATIVO NÃO OFICIAL. Saiba como fazer doações aqui: https://placasdetranpe.wordpress.com/
release_text: 5.1 - Opção de habilitar ou desabilitar o histórico de placas consultadas. 5.0 - Aviso de baixa do gravame (atendendo a pedidos); - Melhoria na visualização dos dados dos veículos; - Correção de bugs e outras melhorias; - Possiblidade de recomendar o aplicativo. Entre em contato: placasdetranpe@gmail.com

description: O rastreador de aproximação é um aplicativo de segurança que envia SMS para outro celular ou tablet que possua o aplicativo instalado com o objetivo de avisar que você esta se aproximando de um local previamente selecionado no GPS do SEU CELULAR. EX: Você esta em sua casa, seleciona em seu celular o LOCAL ou seja faz com que seu celular reconheça as coordenadas geográficas para onde deverá enviar o SMS quando você estiver se aproximando, neste caso sua casa. Em seguida você seleciona o numero ou os números de celular e ou tablet que você deseja que receba o SMS avisando que você esta se aproximando de seu ponto selecionado. Para seu funcionamento e simples: Você devera agora definir no seu aparelho a distancia de aproximação que você deseja que o seu celular comece a enviar os SMS para o celular/tablet previamente selecionado, observe que estes aparelhos que vão receber o SMS não precisarão estar obrigatoriamente no ponto determinado poderão estar em qualquer local. Toda Vez que você estiver se dirigindo para o Ponto Marcado em seu celular e desejar que o aparelho que você selecionou para receber o aviso de aproximação seja acionado você deve ativar o aplicativo e a partir daí uma vez que você entre no raio do GPS de distância selecionado independente da direção de aproximação o seu celular enviara automaticamente a mensagem de aviso. PASSO A PASSO: 1. O usuário seleciona marcar ponto, será exibida no mapa a localização atual, ao clicar em marcar local, será marcada a posição atual que você se encontra. (OBS. A distância do ponto é o raio de segurança, o qual será enviado sua posição aos números cadastrados quando você entrar no raio, o mínimo é 200 metros). 2. Selecionar os contatos que você quer avisar quando estiver chegando no local determinado. 3. Definir o intervalo de tempo de envio da sua localização. (OBS. Caso não seja informado o intervalo o aplicativo enviará sua localização apenas uma vez quando você entrar no raio definido). 4. Em ver últimas localizações, você pode ver ou excluir as últimas localizações quando desejar. 5. Em ver últimas localizações, você pode ver ou excluir as últimas localizações quando desejar. The crawler approach is a security application that sends SMS to another mobile phone or tablet that has the application installed in order to warn you that you are approaching a previously selected location in GPS YOUR PHONE. EX: You're in your home, on your cell selects the LOCAL ie makes your phone recognizes the geographic coordinates for where you should send the SMS when you are approaching, in this case your home. Then you select the number or mobile numbers or tablet and you want to receive SMS warning that you are approaching your selected point. For its operation and simple: You should now set on your device the distance of approach you want your phone to start sending the SMS to the mobile / tablet previously selected, note that these devices that will receive the SMS does not necessarily need to be at a particular point may be any location. Every Time you're heading to the Marked Point on your phone and you want the device you have selected to receive notice of approach is set, you must activate the application and from there once you enter the radius of the GPS away selected independent of the direction of approach your phone automatically sent the warning message. STEP BY STEP: 1. The user selects scoring point appears on the map the current location, click the mark location, the current position is marked you meet. (NOTE The distance from the radius point is security, which will be sent to your position numbers registered when you enter the radius, the minimum is 200 meters). 2. Select the contacts you want to alert when arriving at the given location. 3. Set the time interval for sending your location. (NOTE If the interval is not provided the application will send your location only once when you enter the radius defined). 4. In view latest locations, you can view or delete the latest locations when desired. 5. In view latest locations, you can view or delete the latest locations when desired.

description: O cuidador de remédio é um aplicativo para Android que tem por finalidade principal auxiliar os profissionais cuidadores e enfermeiros(as) a controlarem mesmo a distância, se seus pacientes estão atentos aos horários de seus medicamentos. Também pode ser utilizado para uso pessoal para controlar o horário de tomar seu remédio quando a função cuidador não estiver ativada. Nota: As musicas devem estar na pasta Sounds do cartão SD no formato MP3 ou MID The caregiver remedy is an Android app that aims to help primary caregivers and nurses (as) to control the distance even if their patients are aware of the schedule of your medications. It can also be used for personal use to control the time to take your medicine when the function is not activated caregiver. Note: The songs should be in the Sounds folder of the SD card in MP3 or MID

Localize seus amigos, seus familiares sem a necessidade de adquirir outros equipamentos especiais de rastreamento, utilizando apenas 2 aparelhos celulares com sistema Android que possui GPS. Este aplicativo tem como objetivo fornecer as coordenadas de GPS em locais que não possui internet. Um sistema de localização inteligente de integração social que você utiliza somente quando quiser localizar seus amigos. Assim quando você precisar localizar um amigo, o sistema enviara um SMS para o outro celular selecionado, e este então retornara a sua posição no mapa com data e hora e também as coordenadas de latitude e longitude. ATENÇÃO: Caso o numero que você deseja localizar ou o numero que você deseja dar permissão para que te localize NÃO for LOCAL coloque o 0XX(Operadora) e o código de área, na hora de localizar e ao dar permissão para que o aplicativo funcione corretamente. Privacidade: O usuário cadastra os números que ele permitirá acesso a sua localização, o sistema irá aceitar o pedido e fornecerá a sua posição apenas para os números cadastrados, outras pessoas mesmo que possuam o sistema não invadirão sua privacidade. Passo 1: insira o número que deseja localizar e clique em localizar. Passo 2: Para permitir que localizem sua posição clique em Autorizar contatos que podem me localizar. Passo 3: Insira os números que você desejar. Opção. Você pode fazer uma solicitação e verificar a posição quando desejar, sem ter a necessidade de ficar aguardando. Para isso clique em configurações e marque a opção Salvar última solicitação. Para visualizar a última solicitação, na tela principal aparecerá um botão ver última solicitação basta clicar que será exibida no mapa a última solicitação com a posição do celular. Locate your friends, your family members without the need to purchase other special equipment tracking, using only 2 mobile devices with Android system which has GPS.   This application aims to provide GPS coordinates for locations that do not have internet. A location system intelligent social integration that you use only when you want to find your friends. So when you need to find a friend, the system sent an SMS to another cell selected, and then returned to this position on the map with date and time and also the latitude and longitude. ATTENTION: If the number you want to locate or number you want to give permission for you locate the place is NOT PLACE 0XX (Operator) and the area code, in locating and giving permission for the application to function properly. Privacy: The user registers the numbers that it will allow access to its location, the system will accept the request and provide their position only numbers registered, other people even if they have the system does not invade your privacy. Step 1: Enter the number you want to find and click Find. Step 2: To allow locate your position click Authorize contacts that can locate me. Step 3: Enter the numbers you want. Option. You can make a request and check the position when you want, without having the need to stand waiting. For this click Settings and select the save last request. To view the last request, on the main screen appears a button to see last request just click that appears on the map the last request with the position of the cell.

(Note The step by step description of how is the end of the description). (NOTE: The application requires only the Internet to view the map) (NOTE: If the number you want to send your location is NOT LOCAL put the 0XX (Operator) and the area code for the application to work correctly.)   (If you use the vehicle place the phone on the dashboard to not lose the GPS signal). So when you are traveling with the mode enabled system coordinates sent via SMS to selected contacts know your position on the map, the points you spent with date and time and also the latitude and longitude. The user registers the numbers that he wants to be told their position, the system will capture your location via GPS and will send SMS to numbers registered its position. The system automatically intercepts the message and saved so when you want to find someone just go find contacts and click the contact and select to view the location map and the positions of the contact will be marked with flags. Step 1: Click to see selected contacts to enter the contact who will receive the SMS (name and phone number). Step 2: click to set timeout for sending SMS. Step 3: Activate way trip. description: Esse aplicativo tem por finalidade auxiliar no envio de SMS tornando mais fácil, você envia um SMS e o aplicativo mantém gravado a mensagem assim quando você for enviar a mesmo mensagem basta seleciona-la na lista e enviar para quem você quiser é simples e rápido. O(s) número(s) pode(m) ser selecionados na lista de contatos clicando em "Buscar nos contatos". 3. Insira a Mensagem e clique em enviar. 4. Ao voltar para a tela inicial a sua mensagem já estará na lista. Para seleciona o(s) contato(s) marque a caixa na lateral (quantos você desejar) e clique em selecionar. Para enviar a mensagem novamente basta clicar na mensagem que aparece na lista inicial e selecionar a opção enviar, depois insira o(s) número(s) e envie. This application is intended to assist in sending SMS making it easier, you send an SMS application and thus maintains recorded the message when you send the same message simply select it from the list and send to anyone you want is simple and quick. The message will also send to the messages sent to your phone, so you know just who sent it. You can also send the message to as many numbers as you want, and you can select the numbers in your contact list. 1. Click "New SMS". 2. Insert (s) number (s) you want. The Note (s) number (s) (s) can be selected from the contact list by clicking "Search contacts". 3. Enter the message and click send. 4. Returning to your home screen message is already in the list. To select the (s) contact (s) check the box on the side (as you want) and click select. To send the message again just click the message that appears on the initial list and select the option to send, then enter the number (s) (s) and send.

MatchUp baby animals! Baby Animal is a cute and educational memory card game that will help your children and toddlers to improve their memory, logic reasoning, focus and fine motor skills. Give it a try and let your kids enjoy this wonderful game plenty of cute pictures and motivating sounds of baby animals and pets. This game can also be fun for adults, since it has tree difficult levels: easy, normal and hard. - Featuring Animals: baby kitten, baby puppy, pet, baby lamb, sheep, baby monkey, baby pig, baby duck, little owl. - Future update survey: let us know what animal you prefer to be added in the next update! Please rate us! Kids and toddlers can play with friends and family.
release_text: - Added option to remove ads. - Fixed a rare bug that would close the app due lack of memory.

description: Versão off-line e sem anúncios da Bíblia e da Harpa Cristã, não é necessária conexão com a internet para leitura (a conexão somente será necessária caso se deseje ouvir alguma canção da Harpa). Para ir para o índice da Harpa, acione o menu do aplicativo e selecione 'Harpa'. Trata-se da versão Almeida, totalmente corrigida e atualizada. Caso tenha gostado do aplicativo, deixe seus comentários e a nota. O aplicativo será atualizado constantemente, então envie sua sugestão para summtech.dev@gmail.com . Sobre Almeida: A tradução feita por João Ferreira de Almeida é considerada um marco na história da Bíblia em português porque foi a primeira tradução do Novo Testamento a partir das línguas originais. Anteriormente supõe-se que havia versões do Pentateuco traduzidas do hebraico. De acordo com esses registros, em 1642, aos 14 anos, João Ferreira de Almeida teria deixado Portugal para viver em Málaca (Malásia). Ele havia ingressado no protestantismo, vindo do catolicismo, e transferia-se com o objetivo de trabalhar na Igreja Reformada Holandesa local. Ele já conhecia a Vulgata, já que seu tio era padre. Após converter-se ao protestantismo aos 14 anos, Almeida partiu para a Batávia. Aos 16 anos traduziu um resumo dos evangelhos do espanhol para o português, que nunca chegou a ser publicado. Em Malaca traduziu partes do Novo Testamento também do espanhol. Aos 17, traduziu o Novo Testamento do latim, da versão de Theodore Beza, além de ter se apoiado nas versões italiana, francesa e espanhola. Aos 35 anos, iniciou a tradução a partir de obras escritas no idioma original, embora seja um mistério como ele aprendeu estes idiomas. Usou como base o Texto Massorético para o Antigo Testamento e uma edição de 1633 (pelos irmãos Elzevir) do Textus Receptus. Utilizou também traduções da época, como a castelhana Reina-Valera. A tradução do Novo Testamento ficou pronta em 1676. O texto foi enviado para a Holanda para revisão. O processo de revisão durou 5 anos, sendo publicado em 1681, após terem sido feitas mais de mil modificações[carece de fontes]. A razão é que os revisores holandeses queriam harmonizar a tradução com a versão holandesa publicada em 1637. A Companhia das Índias Orientais ordenou que se recolhesse e destruísse os exemplares defeituosos. Os que foram salvos foram corrigidos e utilizados em igrejas protestantes no Oriente, sendo que um deles está exposto no Museu Britânico. O próprio Almeida revisou o texto durante dez anos, sendo publicado após a sua morte, em 1693. Enquanto revisava, trabalhava também no Antigo Testamento. O Pentateuco ficou pronto em 1683. Há uma tradução dos Salmos que foi publicada em 1695, anexo ao Livro de Oração Comum, anônima, mas atribuída a Almeida. Almeida conseguiu traduzir até Ezequiel 48:12 em 1691, ano de sua morte, tendo Jacobus op den Akker completado a tradução em 1694. A tradução completa, após muitas revisões, foi publicada em dois volumes, um 1748, revisado pelo próprio den Akker e por Cristóvão Teodósio Walther, e outro em 1753. Em 1819, a Sociedade Bíblica Britânica e Estrangeira publica uma 3ª edição da Bíblia completa, em um volume. Há também as edições impressas em na colônia dinamarquesa de Tranquebar, que datam de 1719 a 1765. São edições parciais da Bíblia, que foram obtidas à medida que os revisores terminavam seu trabalho. Offline version without ads and the Bible and Christian Harp is not required internet connection for reading (the connection is only necessary if you want to hear some song Harp). To go to the index of the Harp, activate the application menu and select 'Harp'. It is the King James Version, fully patched and updated. If you enjoyed the app, leave your comments and notes. The app will be updated constantly, so please send your suggestion to summtech.dev @ gmail.com. About Almeida: Translation made by João Ferreira de Almeida is considered a milestone in the history of the Bible in Portuguese because it was the first translation of the New Testament from the original languages. Previously assumed that there were versions translated from the Hebrew Pentateuch. According to these records, in 1642, at age 14, King James would have left Portugal to live in Malacca (Malaysia). He had joined in Protestantism, Catholicism coming from, and transferred with the goal of working in the Dutch Reformed Church site. He already knew the Vulgate, as his uncle was a priest. After converting to Protestantism at age 14, Almeida left for Batavia. At 16 a summary of the Gospels translated from Spanish to Portuguese, which was never published. In Malacca translated parts of the New Testament also Spanish. At 17, he translated the New Testament from the Latin version of Theodore Beza, and has relied on versions Italian, French and Spanish. At 35, started from the translation of works written in the original language, although it is a mystery how he learned these languages. Used based on the Masoretic Text for the Old Testament, and an edition of 1633 (the Elzevir brothers) of the Textus Receptus. Also used translations of the season, as the Castilian Reina-Valera. The translation of the New Testament was completed in 1676. The text was sent to the Netherlands for review. The review process lasted five years, being published in 1681, after having been made over a thousand changes [citation needed]. The reason is that the reviewers wanted to harmonize the Dutch translation with the Dutch version published in 1637. The East India Company commanded to collect and destroy copies defective. Those who were saved were fixed and used in Protestant churches in the East, one of which is on display at the British Museum. Almeida himself revised the text for ten years, being published after his death in 1693. While revisava, also worked in the Old Testament. The Pentateuch was completed in 1683. There is a translation of the Psalms which was published in 1695, annexed to the Book of Common Prayer, anonymously, but attributed to Almeida. Almeida could translate to Ezekiel 48:12 in 1691, the year of his death, having Jacobus op den Akker completed the translation in 1694. The complete translation, after many revisions, was published in two volumes, one in 1748, revised by the den Akker and Christopher Theodosius Walther, and another in 1753. In 1819, the British and Foreign Bible Society published the 3rd edition of the complete Bible in one volume. There are also editions printed in the Danish colony of Tranquebar, dating from 1719 to 1765. Are partial editions of the Bible, which were obtained as the auditors finished their work.

Now you can do acupuncture even more easily with AcuMapa! For more information, please visit our website at http://www.acumapa.com or the facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/acumapaenglish

description: MOM'S HELP Este aplicativo foi desenvolvido para auxiliar não apenas as mães, mas também toda a família. Por isso, separamos dicas de profissionais e cuidados importantes para os pequenos, além de ferramentas muito úteis para o monitoramento da saúde deles, como o controle de vacinas e medicamentos, controle médico, diário do bebê e muito mais. O Mom’s Help é dividido em 6 tópicos principais e seus respectivos sub-links: 1) Filhos (Cadastro de Filho, Diário do Bebê, Álbum de fotos, Registro de Altura e Peso, Resultado de Exames). 2) Saúde ( Controle de Consultas, Controle de Remédios, Calendário de Vacinas e Dentição). No controle de consultas e de remédios têm uma ferramenta muito útil: o ALARME. 3) Alimentação (Amamentação, Alimentação- Filho e Mamãe) 4) Sono (Sono da criança, Distúrbios do Sono) 5) Dicas ( Nesta parte as dicas são de especialistas, não são trocas de informações entre mamães – como um bate-papo. São textos objetivos e com conteúdo elaborados por profissionais). 6) Parceiros Disponível para Android, em breve para IOS. MOM'S HELP This application was developed to assist not only mothers, but also the entire family. Therefore, separate professional tips and important for small care in addition to very useful tools for monitoring their health, such as control of vaccines and medicines, medical control, daily baby and more. Mom's Help is divided into 6 main topics and their sub-links: 1) Children (Register of Child, Baby Album, Photo Album, Record Height and Weight, Results of Examinations). 2) Health (Control Consultation, Control of Medicines, Vaccines and Teething Calendar). In control consultations and medicines have a very useful tool: the ALARM. 3) Food (Breastfeeding, Food and Mommy-Son) 4) Sleep (child sleep, Sleep Disorders) 5) Tips (In this part of the tips are from experts, there are exchanges of information between moms - like a chat with The objectives and content produced by professionals) texts.. 6) Partners Available for Android, coming soon to iOS.

Monster Cube is a wild new match three game that opts out from the normal 2D game grid into a wild 3D cube made out of smaller different colored cube shaped monsters! It’s your job to pull them out one at a time, re-arrange them to connect three in any direction, and boom! Destroy as many cubes in a row before time runs out to get the most points possible. Experience Monster Cube Madness! Monster Cube includes: ● Dozens of fun unique missions. ● Combos, Point boosters, and Fever Modes to tap into to pump up your score to epic levels. ● Interactive online leaderboards ● A Facebook Page where you can see the weekly highscore from players of all over the world and an awesome Hall of Fame. Check out from which platform gamers are playing and which of both is racking up the highest score! The countdown is on. The monsters are all in and its up to you to pulverize them. The battlefield in Monster Cube is a vivid 3D cube layered 4 wide and 4 deep with rowdy multicolored cubic monsters, and its up to you to destroy as many of them as possible before time runs out. The controls are simple, if you want to wind around to see the Monster Cube from different angles simply swipe in the desired direction. Just tap on a cube to grab it, and tap again to put it where you want to. It's that simple. Get ready to discover the evolution of the match three game - it's Monster Cube and it's here now! Monster Cube is developed by Monster Juice.

description: Cheaper than any book and a lot more practical, the Acupuncture Assistant helps students and Acupuncture professionals to have a quick and practical access to Traditional Chinese Medicine points and suggestions to treatment based on signals and symptoms. Everything according to the TCM (Traditional Chinese Medicine). ★ Same point descriptions from http://www.acupuncturepointsatlas.com ">www.acupuncturepointsatlas.com ★ Full description of 390 acupuncture points with illustrations (all regular points plsu 29 extra points). ★ Each point includes: - Original Chinese name - Meaning of the name - Point Category - Localization with high quality images - Point Actions - Point Indications - Point target area of effect - Unitary Channel ★ Option to add your own notes and information about each point. This data is sync between other devices and included in suggestions search. ★ A search for point suggestions according to signs, symptoms and patterns. ★ Time counters for patients rest time control. ★ Buy once and use in all your Android phones and tablets. * Para eventuais problemas, reinstale o app OnibusSP é um aplicativo que permite localizar diversas linhas de ônibus em São Paulo em tempo real. O aplicativo exibe em um mapa o local em que determinada linha de ônibus está, podendo mostrar mais de um veículo em atividade pela cidade. A utilização do app é muito simples. Basta digitar o número da linha a ser pesquisada e escolher qual o sentido a ser exibido no mapa. Ainda há uma opção para favoritar linhas de ônibus, para acessar a localização do veículo de maneira ainda mais rápida. Além de poder visualizar os tweets sobre o trânsito de São Paulo e tweets da SPTrans. Hoje o aplicativo também consta com visualização do Status do Metrô de São Paulo, podendo ver se ocorreu algum problema e acessar aos tweets das Empresas do Metrô e da CPTM. Soldier, you have been drafted to fly the most hardcore helicopters from all military forces. The entire world is under attack and your duty is to save the Earth from doom! So, welcome aboard, you’re now part of the Combat Helicopter Offensive Pacification Squad. Call it C.H.O.P.S.! When problems cannot be resolved on the ground, it is time for the air forces to join the battlefield. This is the moment that all of your years of hard training will be put at test. Will you be able to destroy all the enemies and save the day? Face many different types of aircrafts and helicopters and take all of them down before it is too late. Use various weapons and slugs to fight your way to the victory. Prove that you have nerves of steel and do not forget to avoid obstacles while piloting your chopper. UPGRADES AND CUSTOMIZATION In C.H.O.P.S. you earn coins every time you shoot down an enemy , so you can customize four different types of helicopters and upgrade your weapons. And believe me, soldier: you are going to need every little piece of help an upgrade can offer. WEAPONS Have a blast of fun with the Machine Gun, the Missile, the Laser, the Flamethrower and much more! Upgrade them up to 12 times to make them stronger and virtually unbeatable! ORBITOIDS Dreadful drones will help you fire and defeat the enemies willing to take you out of combat. Combine them with your weapons and increase your fire power and decrease your chances of sending home a KIA -- killed in action -- notice. HIGHLIGHTS • XP: After every match you gain combat experience to level up your weapons and orbitoids • Classic gameplay: tap and hold the screen to go up and release to go down • Retro & old school design: relive the amazing and classic action of side-scrolling pixel art games • Loads of enemy threats and challenges to beat • Endless gameplay: how far can you go without being destroyed? • Challenging tasks: take down as many mercenaries as you can Buckle up and dominate the sky to master the world’s most advanced combat aircraft machine! Download now C.H.O.P.S. and enjoy the most exciting action packed side-scrolling helicopter game. Are you ready to boom some enemies, soldier? You had better be! Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

FULL VERSION with 45 top levels! Enjoy your free time with this top funny action, brain & puzzle game! Rope-Bot is a little, yet skilled, robot searching for his lost Golden Screws as he unveils the mystery of an abandoned factory. Join him as he breaks in through the many different and challenging puzzle levels of this fun and addicting top action and puzzle game. The game couldn’t be simpler: shoot, release and cut the rope while you swing our top little droid hero like a spider man. With beautiful graphics, simple dynamics and easy control, the game is sure to please you with hours of enjoyment. If you enjoy puzzles like Cut the Rope, Monkey Blast or Burn the Rope, you may like this physics game as well. Kids love it too! And new puzzle levels are already on the way! RopeBot Top Highlights: + Simple and fun, like games are meant to be! + Wonderful top quality graphics ★ A game developed by Tapps - Top Apps and Games Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

You sit on it every day, but do you know what lies within the depths of your toilet when it is clogged? Sit tight and prepare yourself to play a game based on true discoveries directly from the annals of plumbing history. Find the long lost and wondrous objects from inside your toilet in Toilet Treasures! Grab your plunger and get ready: you’ll be amazed with what is inside of your toilet! Collect dozen of marvelous artifacts sunken in your toilet. As you complete each thematic collection, earn exquisite thematic plungers. Plus, can you find all the rare and legendary golden objects? Try Toilet Treasures now and live a realistic unclogging experience -- finally a game where you might actually learn something useful for life. HIGHLIGHTS • 60 bizarre objects to collect • Thematic plungers to unlock • Tasteful design • Feel like a real plumber • Based on a true story Download Toilet Treasures now and reflect upon the beauty hidden in the depths of everyday life. Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

description: Você está entediado e quer passar o tempo e se divertir com charadas? Que tal baixar este aplicativo Charadas? São várias piadas à sua disposição!!!! Falando nisso... - Qual o lugar em que todos podem sentar, menos você? - Tem coroa mas não é rei, tem raiz mas não é planta? Ficou curioso??? Então descubra as resposta à todas essas charadas baixando este aplicativo. Para ler as respostas de charada, aperte no botão "Ler Resposta" e para voltar à pergunta, pressione novamente o mesmo botão. Você gostou da charada e gostaria de compartilhar com seus amigos??? Basta clicar em "Compartilhar" e escolher a melhor forma de compartilhar. Você pode compartilhar via e-mail ou twitter, desde que o seu dispositivo Android possua suporte à esses aplicativos. ******** Nota Importante ******** No momento não é mais possível compartilhar a mensagem no Facebook devido à restrições de segurança imposta pelo site do Facebook. Desculpe-nos pelo transtorno. Assim que for possível contornar este problema, iremos fazer a atualização no aplicativo. ********************************* Não perca tempo e baixe já o aplicativo Charadas! Atenção: Se você não tem senso de humor e não curte charadas, nem baixe este aplicativo. Agora...se você curte charadas... Então baixe este aplicativo, pois foi feito especialmente para você!!!! :D Por favor, não esqueça avaliar e dar nota no Android Market. :) Todas as sugestões serão bem vindas. Are you bored and want to spend time and have fun with charades? How about downloading this app Charades? There are several jokes at your disposal!! Speaking of which ... - What is the place where everyone can sit, unless you? - Has crown but is not king, but it is not rooted plant? Are you curious?? Then discover the answer to all these riddles downloading this app. To read the riddle answers, press the button "Read Response" and to return to the question, press the same button again. You liked the puzzle and would like to share with your friends?? Just click "Share" and choose the best way to share. You can share via email or twitter, from your Android device has to support these applications. Important Note ******** ******** It is not currently possible to share the message on Facebook due to security restrictions imposed by the Facebook website. Sorry for the inconvenience. Thus it is possible to circumvent this problem, we will upgrade the application. ********************************* Hurry up and download the app now Riddles! Attention: If you have no sense of humor and do not enjoy riddles, or download this application. Now ... if you enjoy riddles ... Then download this app, because it was made especially for you!! : D Please do not forget to rate and give notes on the Android Market. :) All suggestions are welcome.

Matérias disponíveis: Português - Matemática - História - Geografia - Física - Química - Inglês - Espanhol - Biologia - Filosofia - Sociologia Você que está estudando para o vestibular e/ou ENEM, a Papyrus Apps criou um novo aplicativo que irá ajudá-lo a cumprir seu tão sonhado objetivo: ingressar na universidade. O aplicativo é focado em questões do ENEM. Com ele, você poderá: 1) Estudar a qualquer hora e lugar. Basta ligar seu smartphone ou tablet e começar a fazer questões com gabarito. Assim, você não perderá mais tempo com trânsito ou em outras situações ociosas. 2) Crie simulados com as matérias que você desejar. 3) Interrompa o simulado no meio e comece de onde parou. 4) Ao final de cada simulado, o aplicativo mostra uma estatística de quantas questões você acertou e errou. Assim, você pode acompanhar seu progresso nos estudos facilmente e ver qual matéria você precisa se dedicar mais para passar no vestibular. Uma dica: Tenha sempre em mente que quanto mais questões você fizer, mais estará acostumado e familiarizado com a matéria e, consequentemente, mais perto da sua aprovação na faculdade. Palavras chave: ENEM, Vestibular, questões, provas, universidade, faculdade, simulados Materials available: Portuguese - Mathematics - History - Geography - Physics - Chemistry - English - Spanish - Biology - Philosophy - Sociology You who are studying for the exam and / or ENEM, Papyrus Apps created a new application that will help you meet your dreamed goal: go to college. The application is focused on ENEM issues. With it, you can: 1) Study anytime, anywhere. Just connect your smartphone or tablet and start making questions with feedback. Thus, you will not lose more time with traffic or other idle situations. 2) Create simulated with the materials you want. 3) Stop the dummy in the middle and start where you left off. 4) At the end of each simulated, the application shows a statistic of how many questions you hit and missed. So you can track your progress in studies and easily see which field you need to devote more to pass the entrance exam. A tip: Always keep in mind that the more questions you do, the more you used to and familiar with the matter and hence closer to approval in college. Keywords: ENEM, Vestibular, questions, tests, university, college, simulated
release_text: - Melhoria na interface gráfica - Correção de Bugs - Inclusão de Cursos para o Enem

description: Aplicativo da Receita Federal do Brasil destinado às Pessoas Físicas que recebem rendimentos de outra pessoa física ou do exterior e estejam sujeitas ao recolhimento mensal obrigatório (carnê-leão). As novidades na segunda versão são: a) inclusão do ano-calendário 2015; b) geração do DARF com os devidos acréscimos legais para pagamento após a data de vencimento; c) possibilidade de utilização da dedução com Livro Caixa; d) obrigatoriedade em informar o beneficiário do serviço nos rendimentos de determinadas categorias profissionais. O aplicativo permite: a) informar as ocorrências relacionadas à apuração do imposto devido no mês; b) fotografar e armazenar os comprovantes relativos às ocorrências registradas; c) gerar o documento de arrecadação (DARF) para pagamento na rede bancária; d) consultar os demonstrativos mensais e anual; e) exportar os dados informados para o IRPF 2015/2016. Application of Federal Revenue of Brazil intended for Individuals receiving income from another person or from abroad and are subject to mandatory monthly payment (booklet-lion). The new features in the second version are: a) inclusion of the calendar year 2015; b) generation DARF with the legal additional for payment after the due date; c) possibility of using deduction with Paper Box; d) the obligation to inform the recipient of the service in yields of certain professional categories.   The application allows: a) inform the occurrences related to the calculation of tax payable in the month; b) shoot and store vouchers relating to incidents recorded; c) generate the collection document (DARF) for payment in the banking network; d) refer to the monthly and annual statements; e) export data reported for the PIT 2015/2016.

Aplicativo da Receita Federal do Brasil destinado aos interessados no processo de IMPORTAÇÃO de mercadorias (importadores, despachantes aduaneiros, agentes de carga...). Essa primeira versão do aplicativo permite: a) consultar informações básicas sobre o Conhecimento de Carga e sobre a Declaração de Importação. b) acompanhar Conhecimento de Carga e Declaração de Importação e ser avisado (push service), automaticamente, quando houver mudança em sua situação. c) simular a importação de uma mercadoria, calculando os impostos devidos e informando o tratamento administrativo necessário à mportação. d) acessar a tabela de NCM (Nomeclatura Comercial do Mercosul) através de pesquisa por código, descrição ou estrutura e visualizar as alíquotas, as medidas compensatórias e o tratamento administrativo de cada produto consultado. e) consultar Dicas e realizar um teste de conhecimentos sobre o processo de importação de mercadorias f) avaliar a aplicação. Brazil's Federal Revenue application for those interested in the import of goods (importers, customs brokers, freight forwarders ...) process. This first version of the app allows you to: a) see basic information about the Bill of Lading and the Import Declaration. b) accompany Bill of Lading and Import Declaration and be warned (push service) automatically when a change in your situation. c) simulate the importation of goods, calculating taxes owed and stating the necessary administrative processing mportação. d) access the table of NCM (Mercosur Trade Naming) by searching by code, description, structure and view the rates, compensatory measures and administrative processing of each product consulted. e) consult Tips and perform a test of knowledge about the process of importing goods f) evaluate the application.

Brazilian Customs (RFB) APP for International Travellers. Improvements: 1) The Traveller’s Electronic Declaration of Goods (e-DBV) is now embedded in the app, with offline completion, requiring an Internet connection only at the time of it's transmition. 2) New service that refers to the situation of an e-DBV. 3) Informative videos now have subtitles for the English language. 4) New FAQ service, with several relevant questions answered. In addition, support for English language throughout the application, with a menu for easy access to the language change.

description: "Uli's Adventures" is not just a coloring game! It's a whole world, which a little snail inhabits. Together with her, a child will go on great Summer and Winter travels, and even to hot Africa! The main advantages of "Uli's Adventures" are: You can mix colors. When using paint, one cannot predict the end result and it's difficult to fix it afterwards. You can safely experiment with colors in our game! You will enjoy the added bright colorful textures! With one click you will have a ready-made pattern on the grass or the fence! That’s always nice and fun! The main character, Uli the snail, lives in a cozy little house, where you can arrange the furniture and decorate the interior using the points received in the game. You can develop memory and attention, while getting more points, when you color-match a provided pattern. All scenes in the game have animated objects. This coloring game is full of surprises, what makes it even more interesting for the child. The coloring game is full of sounds! Pleasant music will accompany the child on the journey. Even objects in the game make sounds to encourage the development of auditory perception. Download it! It beats any typical coloring book you can ever buy!

Расшифровщик кодов ошибок электронных систем автомобилей ЛАДА (Lada OBD). В программе содержится расшифровка диагностических кодов ошибок электронных систем автомобилей ЛАДА. В поле "код" необходимо вводить только цифры номера ошибки. Некоторые расшифровки кодов ошибок контроллера ЭСУД содержать также причины их возникновения. Специально для сайта 4pda.ru по просьбе Paguk Decryption error codes electronic systems LADA (Lada OBD). The program contains the transcript of diagnostic error codes electronic systems LADA. In the "code" to the numbers in the error number. Some decoding error codes ECM contain the reasons for their occurrence. Specifically for the site at the request of 4pda.ru Paguk

Main fatures: * Built-in English dictionaries * Player's custom dictionary feature * Single- and 2-player modes * Lightning-fast AI and custom screens Balda King Square a fun word puzzle game for Android featuring multiple dictionaries, player modes, and many other custom options. Drawing on inbuilt English dictionaries, the app's extremely fast AI searches through thousands of words less than in a half a second. You can also add any words not found in the main dictionaries using the user's custom dictionary feature. Play against your mobile device in single player mode or against your friend in two-player mode. You can customize the game's screen grid, choosing dimensions ranging from 4x4 up to 7x7. The game auto-saves your game progress, so you never lose your place. The basic principle of the game is the addition of one letter, so that each move should get a new finished word. Each of the next letter in the word is separated from the previous by one cell horizontally or vertically. Rules are as follows: 1. Before the game start program puts a random word(nominal, nominative, singular) on a square field with cells. The goal is to fill the entire field of characters. The player who records the longer words will get a larger number of points. 2. New words are obtained by adding just one letter in any neighboring cell of any recorded letters. For each letter of the newly formed word you will get a one point. 3. Using all available letters is not required but the letters chain which makes the word must be indivisible and disjoint. The same cell cannot be used twice in one move. 4. Do not use words that have already been drawn up during the game as well as word of the first move. Good luck!

KKC Barcode PRO 3.0 - это многофункциональный сканер штрих-кодов, удобный генератор QR кодов, надежный терминал сбора данных для мобильных устройств на базе Android. Поддержка планшетов. СКАНЕР ШТРИХ-КОДОВ Сканер распознает большинство популярных штрих-кодов, включая 1D, 2D. Работать со сканером штрих-кода KKC Barcode PRO одно удовольствие: * Отсканированные данные можно скопировать в буфер обмена, послать по SMS или E-mail или перейти к поиску в интернете. * Визитную карточку из 2D штрих-кода можно одним нажатием сохранить в телефонной книжке. * Отсканировав шрих-код, моментально набрать номер телефона или ввести адрес получателя в E-mail. Все отсканированные штрих-коды храняться в истории сканирования и доступны в любое время. ГЕНЕРАТОР QR КОДОВ Используя KKC Barcode Pro теперь вы сможете в несколько кликов создать QR код, содержащий различную информацию: контактные данные для телефонной книги, ссылка на сайт,адреса для отправки электронной почты и многое другое. После генерации штрихкода вы сможете сохранить его в формате .jpg или отправить через интернет. Для начала генерации QR-кода выберите раздел «Генерация штрих-кода» в главном меню приложения. ТЕРМИНАЛ СБОРА ДАННЫХ KKC Barcode PRO благодаря встроенной функции терминала сбора данных превращает мобильный телефон с Android в полноценный терминал сбора данных. Идеально подходит для проведения инвентаризации (переучета) товаров с использованием штрих-кода. Варианты использования терминала сбора данных: 1. Автономный вариант. С помощью приложения производится сканирование товаров с указанием количества. Результат инвентаризации можно сохранить в текстовом файле на карте памяти устройства и затем переслать для обработки по e-mail или bluetooth. 2. Сетевой вариант. Загрузка списка товаров с настольного компьютера через соединение WiFi. Выгрузка данных в настольное приложение через соединение Wi-Fi. Для связи с настольным компьютером необходимо использовать программу KKC Barcode PRO Server. Возможен экспорт результатов инвентаризации в Exel. Скачать настольное приложение, а также подробные инструкции по использованию и настройке можно на сайте производителя www.kkc.by в разделе «Программное обеспечение» / «Для терминалов сбора данных»/KKC Barcode PRO Android OS. KKC Barcode PRO 3.0 - is a multi-barcode scanner, QR code generator is a handy, reliable data collection terminal for mobile devices based on Android. Supports tablets. Barcode scanners The scanner recognizes the most popular barcodes including 1D, 2D. Work with barcode scanner KKC Barcode PRO is a pleasure: * The scanned data can be copied to the clipboard, send by SMS or E-mail or go to search on the Internet. * Business card from a 2D bar code can be stored in one-touch phone book. * Srih scanning the code, immediately dial a phone number or enter the recipient's address in the E-mail. All scanned barcodes are stored in the history of scan and are available at any time. QR CODE GENERATOR Using KKC Barcode Pro now you can with a few clicks to create a QR code that contains a variety of information: contact details for the phone book, a link to a website, the address for sending email and much more. After generating a barcode, you can save it as a .jpg or send via the Internet. To start generating QR-code, select the "Generate Barcode" in the main application menu. Data collection terminal KKC Barcode PRO thanks to built-in data collection terminal turns a mobile phone with Android in the full data collection terminal. Ideal for inventory (stocktaking) goods using a barcode. Variants of using a data collection terminal: 1. Stand-alone option. With the application scanned goods, indicating the number. The result of the inventory can be saved in a text file on the memory card device and then forwarded for processing by e-mail or bluetooth. 2. Network option. Download the list of products from the desktop through the connection WiFi. Uploading data to the desktop application through the connection Wi-Fi. To communicate with a desktop PC must use the KKC Barcode PRO Server. Export is possible inventory results in Exel. Download the desktop application as well as detailed instructions on how to use and configure, please visit the manufacturer www.kkc.by in the "Software" / "For data collection terminals» / KKC Barcode PRO Android OS.
release_text: - Добавлена функция создания собственных QR-кодов, возможность их сохранения или отправки. - Добавлена возможность включения мгновенного поиска товара в интернете после сканирования штрих-кода. - Добавлена поддержка планшетов.

description: Pastee Droid is an Android client for "the secure pastebin" Pastee! Supports Paste encryption. If encryption is selected pastes are encrypted (AES-256) with a password. A SHA-256 hash of the password is stored in the database, not the passphrase itself, which ensures that only those who know the password will be able to view the content of your paste. All traffic is sent over SSL Supports over 100 languages. Languages are listed in order of common (C, Java , Text Only, etc) , other (ActionScript, Debian Source File, etc ) and combo (XML+Ruby , HTML+Django/jinja, etc) . Supports pastes of up to 200,000 characters Pastes are not listed. Pastee assures users that it will never list or index your pastes for any reason. Privacy and security are essential to Pastee. Paste IDs are carefully chosen , this makes them less susceptible to crawling bots. Paste ID's are short and easy to remember if you must. Pastee Droid supports sharing of pastes via various apps such as twitter , text message , email etc. Pastee Droid also supports URL-shortening .Just paste a URL and it will be shortened . Pastes have reasonable expire times. An hour , a day , a week , a month and a year. For more information on Pastee see https://pastee.org/about "Pastee Droid" is copyrighted by Technologique Park "Pastee" is copyrighted by Pastee The Pastee Droid Logo is a modification based on work created and shared by Google and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 3.0 Attribution License. Original can be found at http://www.android.com/developers/branding.html

deciBel is the result of a serious effort to make an Android based SPL meter as close to a professional-grade device as the phone hardware limitations allow. It uses a Fast Fourier Transform algorithm to implement a high precision A weighting filter and sophisticated digital signal processing techniques to achieve the best possible SPL readings out of your Android phone or tablet. It displays the current, maximum and minimum values in decibels, and generates 3 kinds of sound pressure level versus time charts. The display can be turned upside down to allow pointing the mic at the sound source. deciBel is supported by ads. ### Please calibrate before the first use! ### Features: - true A-Weighting (ANSI S1.4) - simple calibration interface - numeric dB, dBmin and dBmax display - sliding sound level versus time chart - sliding max, min and average soud level versus time chart - accumulated sound level exposition chart (dosimeter) - saves chart screen shots to the SD card - dominant frequency display - 22Khz bandwidth at the input of the weighting filter - 1024 point real time FFT and digital sound processing - movable to the SD card
release_text: Notification area icon added Performance improvements User interface improvements

description: Client für die phpSee Foto-Homepage. Client for phpSee photo website.

"Birds of prey are birds that hunt for food primarily via flight, using their keen senses, especially vision. They are defined as birds that primarily hunt vertebrates, including other birds. Their talons and beaks tend to be relatively large, powerful and adapted for tearing flesh. The term "raptor" is derived from the Latin word rapere (meaning to seize or take by force). Because of their predatory lifestyle, often at the top of the food chain, they face distinct conservation concerns." Explore the wonderful world of the Birds of Prey. Discover the many eagles, falcons, harriers, vultures, hawks, buzzards, kites and osprey and learn what sets them apart, what they eat, and where they live. Bird of Prey calls and songs are included with most profiles, and you can flip through a growing photo album. Birds of Prey will be updated regularly to include the many different members of this wonderful grouping.
Kid-friendly whack-a-mole-like game play to test reaction times. Score is median of reaction times (smaller is better), and statistics are saved to csv files after each game.

description: ** Important: As much as I'd like, some applications I cannot seem to add support for, such as WhatsApp. Please contact them and ask them to add support for 3rd party apps like mine, thank you! If there is an app you'd like added, email me and I'll see if I can :) Message Center Plus is an extremely customizable Widget for displaying Notification Alerts. It supports Missed Calls, EMail (via K9), GMail (via K9), Missed Text Messages (SMS Messages), and upcoming Calendar Appointments! If your using Android 4.2 or higher you can also add this Widget to your Lockscreen! Several icon themes are included, but you can also make use of any existing Application Icons as well, or even Contact Photos of who sent you that Text Message or Called You! Choose your colors, background, and which notifications you want. You can even use Filters! Please Contact me with any issues or suggestions you may have, and please try the free Message Center Widget also in the market before buying to ensure this is what your looking for. The free version only includes the "Classic" Widget Style. NOTE: For GMail notifications you either have to use a version of GMail prior to 2.3.5 OR use K9/Kaiten for notifications - this is explained in the Help part of the Widgets configuration. You can also email me if you have any questions on this. To force a refresh of unread count you can double tap on the widget. Note if your phone is busy doing other options it may take a bit to register the click nothing I can do about that. This has been tested on 2.1 - 4.0 on Acer Liquid E, Droid X, Samsung Galaxy S, Asus Transformer and other devices. I cannot respond to comments posted below, if you have issues PLEASE send me an email or contact me on Twitter @CS_Studio. Actively working on implementing additional suggestions, if you have more feel free to submit them!

description: Simple and easy to read phone diagnostics tool and systems check for: - Memory - Battery life - RAM - Accelerometer - Camera - Camera flash - Bluetooth - Microphone - Wifi

Harbour View is a site-specific audio/visual exhibition created by sound artist Chris Driedzic and photographer Graham Kennedy. Guided by your smartphone, this app takes the user on a 45-minute tour of downtown St. John's, Newfoundland, Canada. The app leads the user to points on the map where the view of the St. John's harbour has been obstructed by urban development. Once arriving at these points the app plays a multimedia work which combines stop-motion photography and sound collage to capture the intangible beauty of the John's harbour. Harbour View promotes reflection on the impact and meaning of progress. It asks the user to consider: What sights and sounds of the St. John’s harbour have been lost to development? How does our romanticized notion of historic spaces affect our views of urban growth? Is there a clash between this idea of the picturesque and the actual function of a working harbour?

Stop driving in circles, avoid parking tickets, head directly to the right street! Find a free parking in the nearest residential street when driving in Montreal. An Open Source project done in collaboration with Montréal Ouvert. Github: https://github.com/mudar/ParkCatcher Park Catcher is powered by The City of Montreal Open Data Portal, in compliance with its Open Data license. Data source: http://donnees.ville.montreal.qc.ca/fiche/stationnement-rue/ Data Licence: http://donnees.ville.montreal.qc.ca/licence-texte-complet Using the map - The interactive map and the search engine allow you to find spots where parking is allowed for the time period you need. - Tap on a parking post, displayed in green, to display the next no-parking period in that area. - Zones where parking is forbidden are hidden from the map. - Tap the date at the screen bottom to select the time period for which you need a parking spot.
release_text: - Small changes: layout, navigation and Material Design guidelines. - Minor bug fixes and compatibility issues (Gingerbread to Lollipop). - Next update will contain Parking 2015 data!

description: Do you know that San Francisco, Los Angeles and Toronto have transit service trackable online via NextBus.com? If so, you've got to the right app. All features you really need are in one place, right here! With our Ultimate NextBus Tracker, your buses are in your hand! The screenshots will tell you everything described below. In addition, Bay Area Rapid Transit(BART) is also available! FEATURES: ✓ Serves 40 public transit systems: San Francisco Muni, Toronto Transit Commission, Los Angeles Metro, MBTA, AC Transit, California University of Pennsylvania, Camarillo Area (CAT), Chapel Hill Transit, Charles River TMA - EZRide, Charm City Circulator, City of Oxford, Collegetown Shuttle, DC Circulator, Downtown Connection, Emery-Go-Round, Georgia College, Glendale Beeline, Gold Coast Transit, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Moorpark Transit, , NYC MTA - Staten Island, North County Transit District, Pensacola Beach (SRIA), Portland Streetcar, RTC RIDE, Reno, Radford Transit, Roosevelt Island, Rutgers Univ. Newark College Town Shuttle, Rutgers University, Seattle Streetcar, Simi Valley (SVT), Societe de transport de Laval, Temple University, Thousand Oaks Transit (TOT), Unitrans ASUCD/City of Davis, University of Maryland, Ventura Intercity (VISTA), Western Kentucky University, York College. system ✓ Transit can be seamlessly interchangeable. Requires no refresh or reset at all. ✓ Get real-time bus arrival / departure predictions by any route, direction, stop name and stop ID within just 3 touches. ✓ Check all vehicles' current locations on your toute. ✓ Add a stop to your favorites without any confusion, and even create a shortcut on your Home screen. ✓ Set an alarm so that it reminds you of the current location of the bus. ✓ Check the exact location of the bus on the map. You can also intuitively check other buses and bus stops together at once! ✓ In your favorites, you can not only save a bus stop but also a pair of route and bus stop. Now you can get exactly what you want! ✓ Find nearby stops based on your location. Within just 2 touches, you can find when the bus will arrive at that stop. StreetView will be there to show the surrounding view of that bus stop. ✓ Predictions will automatically updated. You can set the refresh interval on your own. ✓ Full support for devices from Ginger Bread(2.3.3) to Jelly Bean(4.1), including tablets. .... and many more cool features you can easily understand. This app is designed to provide predictions as clearly and simply as possible within a few number of touches. You will love it! Disclaimer: This app has no affiliation with NextBus.com. Pro vs. Lite: - Unlimited number of tracks you can save - Viewing all buses for a particular route on the map - Displaying as many predictions as possible - Auto refresh and Manual refresh - Full featured nearby stop search

description: CCTV Design Tool is new and will be rapidly updated soon to include floor map imports, and FOV selectors using trigonometric routines and displays. This is the free version which allows you to use all of the CCTV design calculators. You cannot create a project or scenes with this version, you need to purchase the full version for that. This app includes these calculators/utilities: > lens calculator > storage calculator > bandwidth calculator > ohms law & power calculator > voltage drop calculator > conduit fill calculator (per NECA) > RAID storage calculator > IR illuminator light distance calculator > Ping test tool > Camera Connect tool This app also includes RJ45 terminations and pinout diagrams. Please leave notes, comments or suggestions on what other calculators you might want to see added, or changed to make them more useful.
release_text: > Added camera resolution selector > Corrected a minor metric conversion error > Added CCTV lens calculator. > Fixed some text color issues on some tablets > Added Ping Test and Camera-Connect tools > Fixed a problem with panel heights on some devices. > Added ability for username/password when connecting to a camera > Added better support for landscape mode and tablets

description: Blue Neon Clocks This is a clock widget not an app, it is under widgets not apps A collection of 10 blue neon clocks This is a variety of clocks based on a blue neon theme. This should go good with any blue theme you might have on your phone or just want a blue neon clock. All clocks come in three sizes 2x2 3x3 4x4 (this makes it 30 clocks in total) All clocks come with the standard alarm settings. I made a variety of different layouts. description: Aprender a Leer es la aplicación ideal para que los niños de primaria aprendan a leer, conocer el abecedario y aprender fácilmente y de una forma divertida en su educacion la gramática. La lectura no es un juego pero tus hijos podrán aprender a leer de manera entretenida e interactiva con Aprender a Leer. Consta de cuatro apartados para educar a los niños en el mundo de la lectura: - Introducción a la Lectura, donde se educa la construcción de las sílabas para aprender a leer. - Vocabulario. Con distintas secciones que se irán completando: Aprender a leer como se escriben los diferentes Animales, Aprender a leer como se escriben las Prendas de vestir, Aprender a leer como se escriben las Formas, Aprender a leer como se escriben los Instrumentos musicales, etc. - Reglas ortográficas. Una herramienta necesaria en la educacion para aprender a leer y escribir de manera eficaz. Gracias de antemano del equipo C&C - Carrión Castillo Learn to Read is the ideal medium for primary school children learn to read application, knowing the alphabet and easy and a fun way to learn grammar in their education. Reading is not a game but your children can learn to read entertaining and interactive way to learn to read. It consists of four sections to educate children in the world of reading: - Introduction to Reading, where the construction of the syllables are trained to learn to read. - Vocabulary. With different sections will be completed: Learning to read as different Animals are written, Learning to read as written Clothing, Learning to read and Forms are written, Learning to read like musical instruments are written, etc. - Spelling rules. A necessary tool in education for learning to read and write effectively. Thanks in advance team C & C - Carrion Castillo

description: Pipe Friction Factor allows the user to calculate the friction factor for pipes or ductwork by providing the Reynolds number (turbulent flow only) and the relative roughness of the pipe. The program then solves the Colebrook equation for the friction factor. No more staring at Moody Diagrams thanks to Pipe Friction Factor! The algorithm used for solving the Colebrook equation is based, in part, on "Solving for Friction Factor", ASHRAE Journal, vol. 45, no. 7, p. 41-44.

The new image viewer plus the unique Full Screen Option: you can see your photos in full screen, without the annoying stripes on the sides. This application resizes your photos without distorting them: much more than a standard image viewer! Please do LIKE on Facebook, +1 on Google Plus, write a review on Google Play and share Full Screen Pic. Thanks for the support. Main functions: .viewing Pics faster than the standard Gallery and other popular App... .the Full Screen Option can be disabled so you can use the App as a Standard Image Viewer .KITKAT Immersive Mode for devices with software keys (Hide navigation Bar for Full Screen Pics) .ability to set the Wallpaper of the Home Screen with the Full Screen Pic, you can also enlarge the Pic to fit the screen size; process WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) is used .3 Widgets (2x1, 3x2 and 4x3) that you can add to home screen and configure with independent pics & actions .easy toggle pic size with double tap .ability to add your favorite folders excluding those that contain unwanted images .thumbnails navigation .open last viewed folder .View in Map" to Start Google Maps and Google Earth by Coordinates or close Address .view File information, ExIf data and GPS tags and Copy to Clipboard .slide show .share pics with friends .sort filelist in various ways, also by ExIf Camera Data .clear History of viewed folders .many configuration options To deepen: In still camera photography, the most common aspect ratios are 4:3 and 3:2, closer to a square shape and suitable for printing. However, many mobile devices, tablets, laptops, desktop monitors and TVs have an aspect ratio of 16:9 or 16:10, closer to a rectangular shape and suitable for movies. When 4:3 or 3:2 images are displayed on a 16:9 or 16:10 device, two stips are shown on the sides of the screen and the image remains smaller. This App solves the problem by adapting the image to the size of the screen. Of course, the top and the bottom of the image are slightly cut, but in most cases this is not a big problem and you can however see the original image with a double tap. In case of photos of people where may be cut off heads or feet, you could turn off the full screen display and use the app as a regular photo viewer. If your device supports it, you can connect it to the TV with an HDMI cable and enjoy your pictures in Full Screen. Of course some mobile devices can be set to take pictures in 16:9 format but this format is not suitable for printing and does not use the sensor completely (less megapixels) so this is not a good solution. The Lite version is limited to 15 consecutive Full Screen Pics and is made in order to evaluate the innovative feature of the App. To remove this limit you need to get the PRO version; all other functions are active and complete, then you can then use it as a fast picture viewer TAGS: Picture Viewer, Image Viewer, Photo Viewer,ExIf, Slide show, Share Photo, GPS, Google Maps, Google Earth, Gallery
release_text: News: Added "Status Bar Color" Option Added Contest Menu "Jump to Top" & "Jump to Bottom" Improvements: Folders are Sorted by "Last View Pic" by default Files are Sorted by "File Time Descending" by default "Theme" Option replaced by "Background Color" Option Graphical improvements Fixed ScrollBar not visible with Lollipop "Flat Title Bar and Black Splash Screen" Option has been removed Minor bug fix

description: "Stockfish Chess" is an Android port of the famous chess engine "Stockfish 4". You need a graphical user interface for playing against this engine. Please download the application "Chess for All" from "Google Play Store".
release_text: Source code released on GitHub. IDE: Conversion of Eclipse on Android Studio.

description: Play chess against an engine or use the program as a PGN editor/-viewer. Engine Play: This program is using a chess engine as a service. Please download an engine from the "Google Play Store" for playing against an engine. The following engines are supported: * Stockfish Chess * Chess Engines "Chess for All" features: * play against an engine * support of two chess engines * automatic engine play * analyze mode * show engine thinking * polyglot opening book * two player mode * load/save/edit games * delete PGN-files * edit PGN tags * own PGN database with search for player, event and opening * PGN download (web) * clipboard: copy/paste * PGN-Viewer * graphical setup board * four different chess board and pieces * time control(game clock, move time, sand glass) * one touch moves * undo moves * full Chess960 support * sound effects * option to keep the screen on while playing * enable/disable status bar * user manual (web) * free, GPLv3 Please contact the developer if you have questions or issues, before rating the app low. With an e-mail you can reach the developers directly: select "Menu", "About" and "Contact".

Die AAGL App liefert Abfahrtszeiten von allen öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln im TNW direkt auf Ihr Smartphone. Die App ist einfach zu bedienen und bietet unterwegs einen echten Mehrwert. Besonders an Haltestellen die nicht mit digitalen Fahrgastinformationsbildschirmen ausgerüstet sind, können sich Fahrgäste so jederzeit über die nächsten Abfahrten informieren. Funktionen: - Abfahrtsplan inkl. Nachtfahrplan sämtlicher Transportunternehmen im TNW - Anzeige von Realtime (RT) Abfahrtszeiten für die Busse der AAGL und BLT - „Locate Me“- Funktion zur Bestimmung der Haltestellen in Ihrer Nähe - Anzeige möglicher Umsteigehaltestellen mit Abfahrtszeiten - Verwaltung der Fahrpläne innerhalb der App - Ohne Verbindung zum Mobilfunknetz werden die Fahrplanzeiten angegeben - Liste der vom Benutzer gespeicherten Favoriten - Einfaches Umstellen zwischen Wartezeit und Abfahrtszeit The AAGL app provides departure times of all public transport in the TNW directly to your smartphone. The app is easy to use and the road offers a real added value. Particularly at bus stops which are not equipped with digital passenger information screens, passengers can be at all times informed of the next departures. Functions: - Exit plan including night services all transport companies in TNW - Display of real-time (RT) times for the buses of the AAGL and BLT - "Locate Me" - function for determining the stops in your area - Indication of possible interchange points with departure times - Management of schedules within the app - No connection to the network, the schedule times are specified - List of saved by the user favorites - Lets you easily switch between waiting time and departure time
release_text: - Behebt einen Fehler in der Suche - Optimierte Geschwindigkeit beim Aufbau der Screens - Verschiedene Bugfixes

description: Cook Droid Recipes is your personal Cook Book everywhere and anywhere. It contains thousands of recipes clearly structured in multiple categories (including by meal and by origin). Beside containing a huge list of english recipes, you can easily switch to your desired language: English, German, French and Italian! (Just switch it in the preferences) Due to Cook Droid's direct access to the *.wikibooks.org database, you'll have always an updated list of the recipes available there. Not committed yet? Maybe the following features will do that: - Multiple color themes: green, blue, pink, violet, yellow and dark (checkout the preferences) - Print recipes using Google Cloud Print - Smartphone and tablet compatible (of course with device specific layouts ;)) - Search function over the whole index - Listing by origin - Listing by meal (appetizer, breakfast, dessert, holiday), depends on selected language - Random recipes with endless scrolling (only in English Version) - Favorites management (favorites will be stored for instant access even without an internet connection) - Share your recipes (by E-Mail or by any Messaging-Service of your choice) - Recipe search by ingredients (only in English Version) - Links referring to *.wikibooks.org can be directly opened within this app - Export and Import/Synchronization functionallity for your favorites (useful in combination with services like dropbox :)) - Local caching of categories to improve the application speed (can be disabled in the preferences) Tested on: - Asus Transformer Prime (Ice Cream Sandwich) - Samsung/Google Galaxy Nexus (Ice Cream Sandwich) Notes: - All recipes come from en.wikibooks.org (or the equivalent in the specific language) - During the recipe selection is an internet connection required (as long as the category hasn't been cached) Rights: - INTERNET & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Used for online requests of the recipes. - WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Offline-Storage for the favorites and the local cache All recipes are available under the Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License (or its equivalent in the proper language) http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ Tags: Cooking, baking, cookbook, recipes, dishes, drinks, cakes, desserts, kitchen, CookDroid, cocktails, grill, international, honeycomb, tablet, delicious
release_text: Changed root category Now you have more categories to select from :)

description: A game targeted to all highscore fans. Let the pearl jump over the walls and collect points. But be cautious: Jumping to high will result in a crash, jumping to low or touching a wall and your pearl shatters. (Perfect: Jump through the blue shine.). No master has fallen from the sky, so keep... trying, trying, trying. After successfully conquer 10 walls you'll face a box marked with a question mark. Smash it and score 10 extra points. Eat all the letters of the word "PEARL" by touching the word or a single letter. After you made this challenge you'll receive a total of 100 extra points! Where's your highscore in the worldwide ranking? Just find out and download this free game now. Features: - 3D-Styled side-scrolling game - Cool sound effects - Stunning explosions - Worldwide highscore ranking - Playable in both landscape and portrait orientation Quick Guide: - Hold your finger on the screen to charge the jump force and quickly release it to jump - Jump through the transparent blue boxes in order to continue playing (missing them will make you lose) - Try to collect the special items to boost your score Compatibility - Phones (Tested on Nexus 5, Galaxy Nexus, Samsung Galaxy S3) - Tablets (Tested on Asus Transformer Prime, Nexus 7) Permissions - Internet access: required to load and publish your highscores Tags Sidescroller, side, scroller, 3D, 3-D, game, play, fun, hard, difficult, highscores, ranking, unity, addicting, skill, experience, challenging, jumping, ball, effects
release_text: Fixed bug that a crash is possibly not being detected. Fixed jump effect animation.

description: Experience game fun just like in the eighties. Deal with aliens, dodge asteroids or shoot them out of space. Collect points and achieve the highscore, collect achievements and show all, that you are the best. But pay attention... Your fuel is decreasing quickly. You have to collect the energy rings to keep your shuttle flying. Over the top, the speed of the game will be increased constantly and you will not have enough time to destroy everything which is blocking your way. Experience the good old eighties arcade game feeling and get the highscore (personally and world-wide) in different categories. Features - Arcade feeling just like in the good old days - Exciting and funny achievements to unlock - Three different leadboards in which you can challenge your friends and the best of the world Notes about Google Play Game Services - Achievements and Leaderboards are disabled by default (because of the required permissions) - Enable them by clicking on the button "Stats Off" in the top left corner and authorize this app to use the Google Play Game Servies Tested on - Smartphone: Galaxy Nexus, Nexus 5 - Tablet: Asus Transformer Prime, Nexus 7 Tags Explosions, Arcade, Leaderboards, Achievements, Shooting, Laser, Aliens, UFOs, Space, Spaceship, Sidescroller, 2D, Hunter, Skill, Challenging, Hard, Difficult, Fun, Entertaining, Exciting, Interesting, Addicting, Planets, Stars, Cruising, Flying, Invader

Hashi is a logic puzzle. Connect islands by horizontal and vertical single or double bridges such that in the end, all islands are connected with the indicated number. Note that bridges may not cross other bridges or go over islands. Note that the solution is always unique. You can get hints when stuck. Different sizes can be played and some further properties of the puzzles may be customized. Now there is also an expert mode where triple bridges are possible. You may choose between two color schemes (white on black or black on white).
release_text: New menu / settings dialog Sound volume can be adjusted Minor bug fixes (and sorry about the shameful 2012-02-28 version).
