description: Die Supercard App macht das Profitieren noch bequemer. Sobald Sie sich in der App mit Ihrer Supercard Nummer und der PIN* angemeldet haben, haben Sie Ihren Supercard Barcode immer dabei. Damit können Sie direkt Punkte sammeln und einlösen. Bei Ihrem nächsten Einkauf in den Coop Verkaufsstellen** zeigen Sie einfach per Smartphone den Supercard Barcode an der Kasse vor. Auch können Sie mit der App digitale Bons ganz bequem von unterwegs aktivieren und auf Ihre Supercard laden. Durch vorzeigen Ihrer Supercard können die Rabattbons schon beim nächsten Einkauf eingelöst werden. Die Supercard App steht Ihnen in drei Sprachen (DE, FR, IT) zur Verfügung. Die Sprache können Sie innerhalb der App unter Menü - Spracheinstellungen ändern. Hier ein Überblick über alle Funktionen und Informationen, die die Supercard App Ihnen bietet: ☆ Digitale Bons aktivieren und auf die Supercard laden. Mehr Infos zu digitalen Bons unter www.coop.ch/supercard ☆ Wöchentlich neue attraktive Angebote rund ums Sammeln von Superpunkten, immer sonntags um 7 Uhr ☆Aktuelle Supercash-Angebote «Das zahle ich mit Punkten» ☆Überblick über exklusive Vorteile und Vergünstigungen ☆ Beim nächsten Einkauf einfach per Smartphone den Supercard Barcode an der Kasse** zum Punktesammeln und Punkteeinlösen (Supercash-Angebote) vorweisen ☆ Übersicht über Ihren aktuellen Punktestand und den Kontoauszug der letzten 30 Tage ☆Übersicht aller Supercard Partnerunternehmen ☆Standortsuche mit Routenplanung (inklusive Locate-Me-Funktion) und Anzeige der Öffnungszeiten für Coop Supermarkt, Coop Bau+Hobby, Coop City, Coop Restaurant, Coop Vitality Apotheke und Coop Pronto Bei schlechter oder nicht vorhandener Internetverbindung stehen Ihnen der Supercard Barcode zur Verfügung. Der angezeigte Punktestand stammt von der letzten Aktualisierung mit dem Supercard Webservice. Wir freuen uns auf Ihr Feedback und Ihre Anregungen unter http://konsumentendienst.coop.ch und wünschen Ihnen viel Spass mit der Coop Supercard App *Für Ihre Sicherheit: Um Ihre Supercard vor unbefugtem Zugriff zu schützen, ist das Benutzen dieser App nur mit Ihrer persönlichen Geheimzahl (PIN-Code) möglich. Sollten Sie noch keine Geheimzahl für Ihre Supercard besitzen, generieren Sie Ihre persönliche Geheimzahl an der Superbox Ihrer nächsten Coop Verkaufsstelle (Supermarkt, Bau+Hobby, City Warenhaus) oder fordern Sie sie ganz bequem online an unter www.coop.ch/supercard. **Einsatz des Supercard Barcodes: An den Kassen wird nur die offizielle Coop Supercard App akzeptiert, welche die Barcode-Seite mit dem aktuellen Datum, der laufenden Uhrzeit sowie der rotierenden Supercard zeigt. Einsatzmöglichkeiten des Supercard Barcodes in folgenden Verkaufsstellen: Coop Supermarkt, Coop City Warenhaus, Coop Bau+Hobby, Coop Pronto, Toptip/Lumimart, Import Parfumerie, Christ Uhren & Schmuck, The Body Shop und ab Dezember 2013 Coop Restaurant und Interdiscount The Supercard app makes the advantage even more convenient. Once you have logged in to the app with your Super Card number and PIN *, you have your Supercard Barcode always. So that you can earn and redeem points directly. During your next purchase at the Coop sales outlets ** just show by phone from the Supercard barcode at checkout. Also, you can conveniently activate the move and charge your Supercard with the app digital receipts. By show your Supercard the Rabattbons can already be redeemed on your next purchase. The Supercard app is available in three languages ​​(EN, FR, IT) available. The language you can within the app under menu - change language settings. Here is an overview of all the functions and information that the Super Card App gives you: Activate ☆ Digital receipts and charge the Supercard. description: *** Calculate Chemical Formula From Exact Mass *** This app calculates the chemical formula from exact mass measured in mass spectrometry. It requires the input of the monoisotopic mass, its charge and the ionizing molecule. The chemical formula calculation supports the elements C H N O P S (carbon, hydrogen, nitrogen, oxygen, phosphorus and sulfur) with a maximal content of 1 single P or S. Thus the app is suited for instant identification of metabolites (small molecules) in non-targeted (open) metabolomics approaches using mass spec. Positively charged ions with different adducts and with a maximal mass of 500 Da are supported (bigger masses are hard to identify and require much more calculation time). The chemical formula is automatically checked for even electron content and mass distribution for the different elements. Whether matching formulas are common chemicals can be checked by following the rpvided link to PubChem from NCBI.

The Hexagon Election Campaign Game Spend money to win elections: The game world is made up of hexagonal areas. An area can be empty or belong to either one of the RED or the BLUE party. Each party can spend money (hexabucks) on hexagons to influence them. The computer announces how many hexabucks can be spent in the next round. The player chooses on which hexagon he or she wants to spend them. (a) On an empty hexagon, the value of this hexagon will be the sum of hexabucks spent. The campaign will influence each of the up to six neighboring hexagons: (a1) if empty, it will be converted to the color of the player, with a value of 1 (a2) if of the same color as the player, it will increase its value by 1 (a3) if of the opposite color, will decrease its value by 1. If this would result in a zero value, it will be converted to the player's color instead. (b) On a Hexagon of the player's color, this hexagon's value will be increased by the amount spent. This will not influence neighboring hexagons. (c) On a Hexagon of the opposite color, this hexagon's value will be decreased by the amount spent. If the result is negative, the hexagon is converted to the player's color. In this case, the move will influence neighboring hexagon as if it was empty. The game is over when: (a) No empty hexagons are left. (b) 60 Rounds are played. (whatever comes first)\n\n Have fun!

Mit der «SRF Meteo App» sind Sie immer auf dem Laufenden über das Wetter in der Schweiz und weltweit. Informieren Sie sich schnell und einfach über das Wetter an Ihren Lieblingsorten und vergleichen Sie die zugehörigen Prognosen auf einen Blick in der Favoritenübersicht. Das Niederschlagsradar zeigt Ihnen die Entwicklung der letzten sowie der kommenden Stunde. Bei Wetterextremen an Ihren bevorzugten Schweizer Orten werden Sie per Pushmeldungen und direkt in der App mithilfe der Wetterwarnungen gewarnt. Artikel der SRF Meteo-Redaktion sowie Infos zum SRF Meteo-Team bieten Ihnen einen vertieften Einblick in die Themen Wetter und SRF Meteo. Zusammenfassung: - Alle relevanten Wetterinformationen schnell auf einen Blick - Prognose + Wetterbericht für die Schweiz - Lokalprognosen für nationale und internationale Orte - Niederschlagsradar (Messung + Prognose) - Interaktive und zoombare Wetterkarten - Wetterwarnungen per Push-Meldung - Favoriten verwalten und vergleichen - SRF Meteo News - Infos zum SRF Meteo-Team Für Feedback oder bei Problemen mit der SRF Meteo App wenden Sie sich bitte an den SRF Kundendienst per Mail ( srf@srf.ch ) oder per Telefon (0848 80 80 80). With the "SRF Meteo App" They're always up to date on the weather in Switzerland and worldwide. Find out quickly and easily about the weather at your favorite places and compare the associated forecasts at a glance in the Favorites list. The precipitation radar shows you the development of the last and the next hour. In extreme weather conditions at your favorite Swiss places you will be alerted via push notifications and directly into the app using the weather warnings. Article of the SRF Meteo-editors and information about the SRF Meteo-team offer a deeper insight into the issues of weather and SRF Meteo. Executive Summary: - All relevant weather information quickly at a glance - Forecast + Weather for Switzerland - Local forecasts for national and international locations - Precipitation radar (measurement + forecast) - Interactive and zoomable weather maps - Weather alerts via push notification - Manage favorites and compare - SRF Meteo News - Information about the SRF Meteo-Team For feedback or problems with the SRF Meteo app, please contact the SRF customer service by email ( srf@srf.ch ) or by phone (0848 80 80 80).

description: Build unique machines - from simple gearboxes to complex clockworks! Space is scarce - avoid redundant cogs in the wheel! Stack multiple gears and take the genre to a whole new level! Groovy Gears is a simple yet challenging puzzle game. Your task is to arrange gears of different size in order to make all output shafts rotate at the correct speed. Unlike other gear-based games, Groovy Gears allows you to stack multiple gears on top of each other, opening up a plethora of new possibilities. The game features 75 levels with increasing degree of difficulty. While the first levels will get you going quickly, a good deal of logical thought is required in the later stages. But don't worry: If you ever get stuck, you can simply skip a level.

My Android applications will now be supported by a "pay what you want" system. You can choose your price US$1 - US$50 in US$1 increments. The first app that will be migrated to this system will be Octave, followed by others. While this may be disappointing for some, I have realized that giving this work away free (as in $) doesn't serve your or my interests well. It is clear from users that they love what I have done, but want more features and better support. It bothers me significantly that I am not able to provide it because of time and money constraints. This will not be about making a lot of money, this will simply be about creating a better project by paying for developer time going forward. By the way, if you have paid previously via the Play Store for any of my apps, no additional charge is required. Also, paying one amount will cover your usage of all of my apps, which will all adopt the same payment system. How money is spent (after Google gets their cut): 10% (or more): Donated to Free or Open projects that my works is dependent on. 10% (or more): To the Lord's work (humanitarian work). Remaining: Developer time There is pretty much 0 overhead for the work I do.

Play "Four In A Line" online with players all over the world or play offline with machine AI. "Four in a Line" is a two-player game in which the players first choose a color and then take turns dropping their colored discs from the top into vertically-suspended grid. The pieces fall straight down, occupying the next available space within the column. The object of the game is to connect four of one's own discs of the same color next to each other vertically, horizontally, or diagonally before one's opponent can do so. There are two variations on the board size, the most commonly used being 7x6, the other being 9x7. It has a strong AI engine when play offline, there are 7 difficulty levels in total. In online play mode ELO rating system is used to calculate the relative skill levels of players.

Mahjongg Solitaire, also called Taipei or Shanghai, is an old chinese board game. The objective is to remove all 144 tiles from the board. There are six kinds of layer suit for play on phone device. The rules are simple: Starting from the sides, or from the central tile at the top of the pile, remove tiles by clicking on two equal symbols. If the tiles are identical, they will disappear. Removeable tiles always must be free on their left or right side. If a tile sits between two tiles on the same level, it cannot be selected.

Play Checkers online with players all over the world, or play with machine AI of 5 difficulty levels. Plays according to American Checkers/English Draughts rules. The strength of AI is very strong, worth you to spend hours on it. There are lots of players online waiting for you at any time. Checkers (also known as draughts) is a board game played on an eight by eight squared board with twelve pieces on each side. These pieces may only initially move and capture diagonally forwards. Only when a piece is "crowned" or "kinged" may it move both backwards or forwards. Players take turns making moves, the blue one always making the first move. To win, you must capture all of your opponent's checkers or block them so that they cannot move.

SameHexagon is a new version of classic SameGame, the tiles are now hexagons. The objective of game is to clear out all of the tiles and score the maximum number of points along the way. You remove groups of tiles that have the same color by tapping on them. You can only remove groups of two or more tiles that are connected to each other. When you remove a group, any tiles above them fall down to fill in the gaps. When you clear out an entire vertical column, the other columns shuffle left to fill in the gap. The more tiles you remove in one tap, the more you score. In general, removing N tiles in one tap scores (N-2) x (N-2) points. When there are no more groups of two or more tiles left, the game is over.

An intelligent app for task management. When the app is launched, it will automatically recommend useless apps, and retain useful apps. Simply with one touch, you can let the phone run faster, while not affecting its normal functions. Different from other task killers, this app will not always stay on the notice bar,it only appears to remind you when memory is running low or depending on your phone status. You can also select to turn the reminder on notice bar on or off by going to the "settings" of the menu. This app has 2 modes: normal mode and entertainment mode. If you like to play games or take photos, you can select entertainment mode. Easier to use.

description: This is an interesting lock screen app for FREE. Different from other lock apps on the market, in addition to the traditional lock-screen functions, you can use this app to tease your friends. This app has a special unlock. The main interface displayed on the screen is the traditional sliding unlock way which will mislead people. Without acknowledge, when your friend try to unlock your screen, there will randomly come out a horror, spoof or funny picture or a animation to tease them, your friends will surely be frightened that brings utter amusement to you. * Correct unlock way: The cross unlock way on the main interface is fake, if you use it to unlock, it will pop up 4 kinds of animation to tease people, and then it will return to the lock screen. Drag the "SMS" icon at the bottom of the screen into the "phone" icon to really unlock the lock screen. Do not forget it! Otherwise, you won't unlock yourself! * Friendly Reminder: Horror animation is full of terror. Do not tease people who have heart disease. Software features: * Lock screen * Fake unlock * Real unlock * 4 animations for teasing people * Vibration * Automatic lock screen Your comments and opinions are highly appreciated, please review our apps on market or contact us by Email.

description: Hongkong Metro

有人说，人生至少应该有两次冲动，一次是为了奋不顾身的爱情，一次是为了说走就走的旅行。然而，若是能用说走就走的旅行，来印证彼此奋不顾身的爱情，这，才是一种完满吧。 台湾很小，台湾也很大，从城市到乡村，高山到大海，峡谷到湖潭，每个地方都散发着不同的风情，值得细细品味。享受台北，品味台南，领略高雄，漫步垦丁。一杯咖啡一本书，在多雨多雾多梦想的空中之城九份，慵懒一个悠闲的下午；饶富趣味的巷弄美食和地道小吃挑逗着味蕾，身为一个吃货在这里是如此的幸福；在诚品，发呆惬意两相宜，和书籍一起贩售的，还有生活方式。看过你许多的电影，像是走过了许多段的人生，你用画面讲述故事，用音乐点燃内心的情感，恋恋台湾，也许每个人心中都藏了一份，有关台湾的，浪漫而偏执的梦。如果可以，我不想匆匆。 Zn攻略： 提供最佳的旅行攻略，请多多支持 kw:有人说，人生至少应该有两次冲动，一次是为了奋不顾身的爱情，一次是为了说走就走的旅行。然而，若是能用说走就走的旅行 ，来印证彼此奋不顾身的爱情，这，才是一种完满吧。 台湾很小，台湾也很大，从城市到乡村，高山到大海，峡谷到湖潭，每个地方都散发着不同的风情，值得细细品味。享受台北， 品味台南，领略高雄，漫步垦丁。一杯咖啡一本书，在多雨多雾多梦想的空中之城九份，慵懒一个悠闲的下午；饶富趣味的巷弄 美食和地道小吃挑逗着味蕾，身为一个吃货在这里是如此的幸福；在诚品，发呆惬意两相宜，和书籍一起贩售的，还有生活方式 。看过你许多的电影，像是走过了许多段的人生，你用画面讲述故事，用音乐点燃内心的情感，恋恋台湾，也许每个人心中都藏 了一份，有关台湾的，浪漫而偏执的梦。如果可以，我不想匆匆。 Zn攻略： 提供最佳的旅行攻略，请多多支持 kw:攻略 旅行 旅游 台湾 宝岛 高雄 台北

StackO - A Scrabble-like Word Game of Skill, Strategy and Speed StackO is a unique, smooth, quirky, and intelligent word game which is capturing the imagination of Android gamers. If nothing, it will definitely improve your vocabulary. Follow us on Twitter and Facebook for daily user picks and other interesting features: Twitter: http://twitter.com/stackogame Facebook: http://facebook.com/stackogame **************************************************** WHAT IS StackO ABOUT? Given limited stacks of letters, you have to strategically make words to maximize your game score within a limited time. The games can be played in either easy, medium or hard mode. You can challenge your facebook friends and other random opponents for Head to Head games. Each head to head game consists of 1 round and can be played whenever you've time. Tap on the letter tiles on a game board to make valid words containing at least 3 letters. With special tiles, bonuses for long words and penalties for 3 letter words, the game is about using the tiles in the most judicious way to maximize your score. Board Clearance Bonus, Extra Tiles and Time Remaining Bonus add an extra element of fun and strategy to the game. Unlock achievements and brag about them on Twitter and Facebook. Can you outscore others?

SessionChat Android Edition is a SIP Phone for your Android OS device. PLEASE NOTE THIS IS THE TRIAL VERSION OF SESSIONTALK AND HAS A ONE MINUTE TIME LIMIT ON CALLS. If you like it please consider upgrading to full version. Use your favorite VoIP provider as the softphone is not tied to any particular one. Not used VoIP? Sign up for free with a number of SIP compliant providers worldwide and make VoIP to VoIP calls free anywhere in the world. Save money on international calls. On the move? With SessionChat Android you can make SIP VoIP calls wherever you have a 3G connection. Please note some mobile network operators prohibit or restrict the use of VoIP over their networks and may impose additional fees or other charges. Please check with your operator before making calls over 3G. SessionChat Android features: ★ Supports making VoIP calls over 3G and WiFi ★ Background support - receive calls whilst the app is in the background, switch between apps and stay on the call. ★ Multiple accounts - simultaneously registered. Receive calls on any registered account. ★ Set call background image to contact photo or custom image ★ Dial Plan ★ Dual Line ★ Swap between 2 active calls ★ Conference - Merge and Split ★ Attended and Unattended Transfer ★ TLS Encryption with optional certificate verification ★ SRTP secure calls ★ Call Recording ★ Bluetooth Support ★ Quick import of accounts from major VoIP providers ★ Excellent audio quality ★ G722, G711 ,GSM and iLBC codec support ★ Speakerphone, Mute and Hold ★ DTMF Support , RFC2833 and Inband ★ SIP Proxy support ★ Automatic service discovery using DNS SRV queries ★ STUN server support ★ Global IP ★ Ringtones ★ Contacts integration, add or edit contacts from within the app ★ Detailed Call history ★ Dial from Call History and Favorites ★ Voicemail Notifications *IMPORTANT SIP PROVIDER OR SIP PBX SERVER REQUIRED. SessionChat Android Edition is a SIP VoIP Phone not a service. You must use SessionChat with a SIP compliant VoIP provider or SIP PBX (server) to use this softphone product. Please contact your service provider or IT helpdesk for more information. Check out our website for further info sessiontalk.co.uk. If you need technical support please email support@sessiontalk.co.uk

description: New good night's app to the "Sleepy Boyfriend" series for all the otome-girls around the world! Soine Hitsuji -Kaname Ver.- ===================================== This app is meant for your good nights enjoyment. *Using headphones or earphones is recommended for more realistic experience. ===================================== - Character info Name: Kaname Voice: Hiro Shimono Age: 17 Occupation: High-school 2nd year Personality: Diplomatic, has many friends, helps people Sample phrases: "I might do something more lover-like..." "Don't say my warmth feels good so easily..." "Don't stare at me! Stop it!!" Cover illustration is made by Yone Kazuki! - Characters series Vol.1：Ryuutarou Okiayu Vol.2：Keiji Fujiwara Vol.3: Daisuke Kishio Vol.4: Hiro Shimono - Features By tapping a character in the top view you get to "Talk-mode". By tapping the Talk-button the character will say something. *The free version of the app contains 10 different phrases. The alarm can be set from the settings. After setting the alarm please be sure to leave the app running in talk-mode or sheep counting-mode. In "Counting sheep-mode" the character will sing the sheep counting song! *In free version the character will count to 10. Additional phrases can be purchased in the "Hitsuji-ya" shop. A special microphone was used during the recording to give a more realistic experience. We recommend using headphones. *IMPORTANT The alarm feature can not be used in iPhone's sleep mode. When using the alarm the app needs to be left on. It is recommended to use a power adapter. - About "Soine Hitsuji CD" "Soine Hitsuji CD" is a collaborative release from honeybee label's "Hitsuji de oyasumi series" and BlackButterfly's "Shuukan Soine CD series". Your wonderful boyfriend will count sheep with you before falling asleep! Official site http://www.blackbutterfly-cd.com/short/ Twitter http://twitter.com/soine_kareshi

description: 耳年齢って気になりませんか？ 「耳年齢アプリ」は、デンマークの補聴器メーカーワイデックスが提供する、モスキート音（高周波）を使った簡単な耳年齢チェックができる無料アプリです。その他にも補聴器販売店を検索できる機能もあります。 画面の中の動き回るひよこをタッチしてさっそくチェックしてみましょう。 使い方はかんたん 画面の中を動き回るひよこをタッチするすると、今度は一列に並んだひよこが出てきます。次にそれぞれのひよこをタッチすると、各年代の平均的な聴力にあわせて音がでます。高い年代から聞いていき、聞こえるところまでがあなたの耳年齢ということになります。 主な機能 耳年齢チェック 補聴器販売店検索 ご注意ください チェックの結果は、あくまでも目安となります。聴力の低下が疑わる場合や、気になる場合には、すぐに耳鼻科の専門医に相談することをおすすめします。 ワイデックスホームページ 難聴と補聴器の総合サイト「みみから。」　 http://www.widexjp.co.jp/ Do not mind me ear age? "Ears age app" is a free app that can be a hearing aid manufacturer Widex of Denmark has to offer, a simple ear age check using mosquito sound (high frequency). There is also a feature that allows you to search a hearing aid dealer also other. Let's check immediately by touching the chicks move around the middle of the screen. Easy to use When you touch the chicks move around in the screen, chick lined up in a row will come out this time. The next time you touch the chick each, the sound will appear to fit the hearing the average of each age. It will hear from high age, to the point where you hear will be that age your ear. Main function Ear age check Hearing aid dealer search Please note The results of the check, it becomes the aim to the last. And Utagawaru case, if you are worried about, hearing loss is recommended that you consult a specialist of otolaryngology immediately. Widex Homepage Comprehensive site of hearing aids and hearing loss "Mimikara." Http://www.widexjp.co.jp/

“공룡이 살아있다”는 No.1 “곤충이 살아있다”와 더불어 살아있다 시리즈의 두번째 시리즈로써 3D 가상체험을 통하여 스마트 학습을 효과적으로 누릴수 있도록 설계 되었습니다. ★ "공룡이 살아있다"는 유아(6개월 이후)부터 초등학생과 중학생등 학습 진도에 맞춰진 공룡 학습 교육 앱(App)입니다. 또한 학부모님을 포함한 유치원 선생님과 초등 및 중학교 선생님께서 유아 및 학생들에게 가상의 관찰 학습을 도와줄 수 있도록 제작되었습니다. ★ "공룡이 살아있다"는 3D를 활용하여 공룡을 여러 방향에서 볼 수 있습니다. 보다 현실감있는 공룡들을 가상 체험하고 학습할 수 있도록 설계 되었습니다. ★ 반복되는 학습 효과와 생동감 있는 3D 콘텐츠로 인하여 유아에게는 말트임 현상과 사물 인지와 창의력을 높여주며, 기본적인 색깔 구별을 실현토록 제작되었으며, 초등 및 중학생들에게는 현실감 있는 효과음과 동일한 연령층의 성우 나레이션을 통하여 학습효과를 높여줍니다.(업데이트 버전에 적용) <"공룡이 살아있다"의 주요 기능> ✓ 총 26종의 범용적인 공룡들을 3D로 표현했으며, 공룡 보기화면으로 들어가면 식성(초식 및 육식)구분, 시대구분, 크기구분(대,중,소), 최초 발견지 및 서식지 정보등을 한눈으로 볼 수 있도록 설계 되었습니다. ※ 공룡 크기구분 (대: 10m 이상, 중: 5~10m, 소: 1~5m) ※ 공룡 시대구분 : 쥐라기 중기는 앱 표현상 쥐라기 전기로 표시됨 ※ 26마리의 공룡을 모두 체험하시려면 표지화면에서 “➪” 다음화면으로 클릭하세요 ✓ 3D 가상체험과 함께 반복적인 학습효과를 위하여 공룡이름, 공룡 별명, 공룡이 살았던 시기등을 반복하여 볼 수 있으며, 현미경 버튼을 누르시면 공룡들의 주요 특징등 각 공룡들의 자세한 정보가 설명되어 있습니다. ✓ 3D 가상체험의 특성을 고려하여 모든 공룡은 3D로 표현되어 터치시마다 애니메이션이 3개 동작으로 구분되어 흥미를 더욱더 느낄수 있도록 제작되어 있습니다. ✓ 각 화면은 터치를 할때마다 공룡의 크기가 사용자가 보기 쉽도록 확대 및 축소해서 보실수 있어 인터랙티브한 공룡을 체험 하실 수 있습니다. ✓ OX 스피드 퀴즈 : 앱(App)에서 체험한 정보들을 활용해 각 공룡들의 OX 스피드 퀴즈를 풀 수 있으며 자연스럽게 학습을 유도합니다. 60초에 몇개의 문제를 맞출 수 있는지 확인해 보세요. ✓ 그림 퀴즈 : 앱(App)에서 체험한 정보들을 활용해 각 공룡들의 특징을 파악하고 분석하면서 자연스럽게 학습을 유도합니다. 공룡들의 특성을 파악해 보세요. ✓ 색칠하기 : 26종 각 공룡들을 알록달록 색칠할 수 있는 프로그램입니다. 해당 공룡들을 이쁘게 색칠해봅시다. 휴대폰 기능에 있는 스크린캡쳐를 하고 친구들과 부모님들께 자랑해보세요. ★ 갖가지 특징을 가지고 있는 26종의 공룡들을 만나봅시다! ★ 이 콘텐츠는 “안드로이드4.0” “아이스크림 샌드위치”이상 버젼에 최적화 되어 있습니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : 02-2038-8377 서울시 마포구 상암동 1640 마포비즈니스센터 1403호 (주)뷰아이디어 Is alive, Series No.2 - "dinosaur is alive _3D> Insects are alive "and" living dinosaur "the No.1 live with the second series of the series as a 3D virtual experience through smart learning is designed to receive, ★ "living dinosaur." Discover the fairy world in this enchanted game! A wonderful game for toddlers and kids with a cute collection of fairy princesses ! your little girl loves memory games, puzzles and want to admire the world of a fairy princess ? This is the app for you! Your child will discover beautiful fairies and in the meanwhile will exercise his/her memory! Fairy Princess for Toddlers is an educational and entertaining game. It is a nice, simple, fun, and colorful game for toddlers and little girls! Play with princesses games ! A lot of different kids memory games and beautiful princesses to keep your kid busy. Easy to learn and to control: -drag and drop the fairies on the screen, match the princesses, catch the jewels and match the couples! -interact with all the elements on the screen when a game is solved -when a game is completed tap the arrow to change to the next level You can also choose the difficulty level: easy, medium and hard, to suit the needs of each child and exercise your toddler fine motor skills. Available for all screen resolutions and devices, including tablet device as Kindle and Samsung ! Simple and intuitive, your baby will have lots of fun for hours with these fairy games ! This educational game will help your toddler to improve skills in problem solving, logical and cognitive skills, concentration and memory. description: Galaxy Fart is a special version of "Who Farted" dedicated to all the users having a phone from the Samsung Galaxy series. Who Farted? One of the funniest pranks to do on your friends with your android phone. You have 3 tricks in your sleeve: 1 Motion : Choose the fart sound. Arm your phone. And wait for someone to move it. As soon as someone lifts your phone the fun fart sound you selected will play. Put your friend in an awkward situation and blame him about what just happened. 2 Time Bomb : Again choose your weapon. Set the time you want the sound to play after. Arm.Put the phone near your none suspecting victim. And faaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaart there it is.Target Destroyed! If your friends are aware of your intentions just use the "Tap Atack".You know how to use this one don't you. We even supply you with a "Random " melee "Attack" mode. Pranks even work in the background arm->home button->STRIKE 15 Fart Weapons Like : Power,Dog,Thug,Fear,Dirty,Bunny,Gangsta,Motor,3 Squeak Farts,Italian,Uncle,Engine and Alien Farts. So, Who Farted? Tested on : Samsung Galaxy S Also works : Motorola Defy , Samsung Galaxy 5 and probably all unmodified Android devices. Keywords : Fart Machine,Fart,Who Farted,Galaxy,Fart Soundboard , Farts

Print Text Messages is the simplest way to transfer SMS messages from your phone to a computer for printing. Simply select the contact you wish to print text messages from and the app will collate all the SMS messages from your device into a printable list. You can then export the copied SMS messages into your chosen app or web service or you can choose to email the text messages using your email client or GMail. Print Text Messages supports a variety of web services such as Google Drive, Dropbox, Evernote, Adobe PDF and many others. You can quickly and easily export your text messages using any installed service you have. Print Text Messages is useful if you need to print SMS messages for business or if you need to show evidence of an ex sending your threatening or abusive text messages. If someone is sending you abusive SMS messages simply select them from the contact list and email the text messages to your lawyer or print out the text messages to present to a law enforcement agency. We offer a full money back guarantee if this app does not enable you to print your text messages directly from your phone. Contact us from the link in the app with your device details if you have any problems. You can also try out our limited free version before choosing to upgrade.

description: Developed by the Royal College of Physicians of Edinburgh and NHS Kidney Care, the Acute Kidney Injury (AKI) Mobile App is a free and practical application available on Android mobile. Features include a medical calculator, interactive exploration of the classification, diagnosis, and management of AKI and its complications, and illustrative case studies. A key resource for junior doctors and non-renal specialists treating AKI, the app has been endorsed by the Renal Association, the Royal College of Physicians (London), and the Society for Acute Medicine. Key features · Medical calculator to illustrate the staging and classification of AKI · Succinct and up-to-date guidelines on the prevention and management of AKI · Interactive case studies · Further resources of national and international guidelines on AKI

The Jungle Book (1894) is a collection of stories by English Nobel laureate Rudyard Kipling. The stories were first published in magazines in 1893–94. The original publications contain illustrations, some by Rudyard's father, John Lockwood Kipling. Kipling was born in India and spent the first six years of his childhood there. After about ten years in England, he went back to India and worked there for about six-and-half years. These stories were written when Kipling lived in Vermont. The tales in the book are fables, using animals in an anthropomorphic manner to give moral lessons. The verses of The Law of the Jungle, for example, lay down rules for the safety of individuals, families and communities. Kipling put in them nearly everything he knew or "heard or dreamed about the Indian jungle." Other readers have interpreted the work as allegories of the politics and society of the time. The best-known of them are the three stories revolving around the adventures of an abandoned "man cub" Mowgli who is raised by wolves in the Indian jungle. The most famous of the other stories are probably "Rikki-Tikki-Tavi", the story of a heroic mongoose, and "Toomai of the Elephants", the tale of a young elephant-handler. As with much of Kipling's work, each of the stories is preceded by a piece of verse, and succeeded by another. The Jungle Book, because of its moral tone, came to be used as a motivational book by the Cub Scouts, a junior element of the Scouting movement. Akela, the head wolf in The Jungle Book, has become a senior figure in the movement, the name being traditionally adopted by the leader of each Cub Scout pack. Demo version of AlfaOBD software for Alfa-Romeo, Fiat, Lancia. Some Dodge, RAM, and Chrysler models produced in cooperation with Fiat are covered. Although the software is primarily targeted for car owners, it provides the features of professional scanners. Many dealer-level diagnostic and configuration procedures are available in the full version. NOTE: if your Android device is not in the list of compatible devices on Google Play and you cannot install or upgrade your installation please contact info@alfaobd.com . Make sure you have a compatible OBD interface. For the list of supported OBD interfaces see www.alfaobd.com. NOTE: If AlfaOBD can not connect to a car ECU with the message "Interface reports NO DATA" or "Interface reports CAN ERROR" it most probably means your interface is not compatible or defective. For the details of configuration of connection to interface and car see application help available on http://www.alfaobd.com/AlfaOBD_Android_Help.pdf AlfaOBD features include: - native support of Electronic control units used in Fiat group cars. Native support differs AlfaOBD from many other diagnostic applications providing only limited generic OBDII support of Fiat group cars. - monitoring various dynamic parameters of engine, gearbox, ABS, climate control ECUs and graphical presentation as plots - reading of static data: ECU identification, system status, fault codes with probable causes and environment information where applicable - clearing of fault codes - (Full version only) active diagnostics and configuration procedures for various equipment controlled by engine, gearbox, body computer, climate control, ABS, airbag, code control and other ECUs - (Full version only) electronic key and RF remote control programming AlfaOBD supports ELM327 and OBDKey Bluetooth interfaces on all Bluetooth-enabled Android devices and ELM327/OBDKey WLAN interfaces on rooted devices only. For details of configuration of connection to interface and car see application help. Application available in Czech, English, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, and Spanish. Languages are selectable via Setting. The limitations of the demo version are: - Application run time limit of 15 minutes. Application reverts back to the first screen after 15 minutes of connection to a control unit. - No active diagnostic procedures available - The number of scanned gauges is limited by four - The number of monitored parameters is limited by four All other features are operational. No time limit is imposed on the application. NOTE: Please switch off "Don't keep activities" in "Settings"->"Developer Option" on your Android device. If plots are not updated, turn "Force GPU rendering" off in "Settings"->"Developer Option".

description: Panic Flight takes you on an endless adventure where your reflexes - and your finger - are put to the ultimate test! As a pilot of the AMA Airlines fleet, you must fly as far as possible and transport your passengers safely to their destination. But be careful! Obstacles such as tornados and UFOs with destructive desires will do everything in their power to stop you. Choose and upgrade your planes to fly at your convenience. Travel the globe On solo missions or demonstrate your flying skills to the world in infinite flight. The Panic Flight team wishes you a pleasant flight and invites you to check out the Panic Flight Facebook page to follow the news on the next content updates currently in production. Prepare for takeoff! Features: •10 planes with unique features and multiple upgrades •Solo campaign mode: 21 missions, in-game quests and mini-missions •"Infinite flight" mode with score sharing via Facebook and Twitter You can discover a greater gameplay experience on your HD TV thanks to MHL technology. Visit http://meetmhl.com/ to find out more. FOR ANY SUGGESTION ABOUT THE GAME, FEEL FREE TO CONTACT US AT: CUSTOMERSUPPORT@AMA.US Like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter to get the latest news on our games, contests and more! Official site: http://www.amamobile.com Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/AMAmobile Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PanicFlight Twitter: http://twitter.com/AMobileA YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/amamobile

description: Everyone has dreamt of becoming a star, but what is it like to be a celebrity? A world of glitz and glamour, of course, but you must also learn to face the tabloids and the vultures stalking you for any photo opportunity. In this crazy tower defense game: • Play Lady Laguna in this opening version • Put your trust in your most faithful fans, who are armed to the teeth • Declare war on the paparazzi In Stars versus Paparazzi, it’s time for you to turn the action back on them! Key features: • Actor, singer or sports personality, become your inner celebrity (7 stars to unlock) • 64 levels • 12 fans ready to become your bodyguards: find the metal-head grandpa, the gothic teen or even the gorilla! • More than 12 different weapons to fight off the unyielding paparazzi: from simple boxing gloves, to flamethrowers and even the Kamehameha, there is something for everyone! • Next up: Hip Hop edition, Nightclub edition and Rock Stage edition! To better meet your needs, we invite you to send your comments to customersupport@ama.us . Thanks! Official website: http://www.ama-studios.com/ Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/AMAmobile Twitter: http://twitter.com/AMobileA YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/amamobile

Whether you drive an RV or a Big Rig long distances, you need a place to park overnight, and sometimes by choice or by force you can't stay at a hotel, campground or other location that might allow your larger vehicle. In such a situation finding a friendly retailer with a large parking lot can be a godsend to park in overnight. This app lists over 7600 potential parking locations in the US, including reported WALMARTS that allow overnight parking (over 3300 of them), and over 600 Sam's Clubs as well. WalMart and Sam's are known as a corporate policy to be friendly to overnight guests, however, local regulations sometimes do not allow this, I have done my best to filter out thsoe known not to allow overnight, but just in case you can call the stores directly with a simple button click to find out for sure when on the road. This app also includes 3 other known retailers who have large lots, Home Depot, Lowe's and Costco and while I do not know if either of them have official policies, I have included them, and you can call those locations too with a simple button click to confirm whether or not they will allow an overnight guest. Features: Works in all resolutions, tested from the smallest droids to the largest without issues. Over 8100 potential Parking locations when in a bind, including Wal-Mart, Sam's Clubs, Home Depot and Lowes, with the ability to call them with a single click to ensure they won't mind an overnight guest in their parking lot. Simple, easy interface, fire it up and go. 1 Screen and 1 Finger interface. Keep your eyes on the road, no complicated multiple screen interactions. See whats near you (default behavior) via GPS, or search. Locations identified by company logos, see what's where quickly and easily. Visual referencing, no text lists, but graphical map view, see exactly where things are. Quickly snap back to your local location on the map with a single tap. Get accurate driving directions to the location you select, with a simple button click. Call the selected location with a simple button click. Displays up to 1000 locations on a single map, so you can view a very large area of the country on one screen and still see options. Easily show only the chain you interested in, or show all. Works in portrait and landscape mode, so don't be afraid to turn your phone sideways and pop out your keyboard. Don't forget to check out our Rest Areas app as well, and our Truck Stops App, that includes in its entirety this Apps information.
release_text: 1.31 Bug Fixes 1.3 data updates 1.21 minor updates 1.1: Costco's added Scale Indicator added

description: This App is TABLET SAFE! Driving long distance can definitely be a chore, knowing where the next or closest rest area or rest stop to you shouldn't be. And with this app it doesn't have to be. Not only will it quickly show you the rest areas near you, you can filter with a simple button tap to show just rest areas in the direction you are heading! North, South, East and West, don't get let down thinking the rest area is just around the bend, only to find out its only for folks on the other side of the highway. Not only that, but you can search for locations not near you if you want to see whats in a destination area, and quickly snap back to your current location with just a button push. Tap on the marker to quickly see more information about that rest area ahead, what facilities and ammenities does it offer? Pet Area? RV Dump? Vending Machines? Handicapped Facilities? etc. Features: Works in all resolutions, tested from the smallest droids to the largest without issues. Simple, easy interface, fire it up and go. 1 Screen and 1 Finger interface. Keep your eyes on the road, no complicated multiple screen interactions. See whats near you (default behavior) via GPS, or search. Quickly snap back to your local location on the map with a single tap. Easily show only the rest stops in the direction you are travelling/interested in, or show all. Works in portrait and landscape mode, so don't be afraid to turn your phone sideways and pop out your keyboard.
release_text: 1.8 Bug Fixes 1.4 Code Updates, Scale Indicator Added. 1.21 glitch fixes and moved exit to MENU option 1.2 Exit Button to close app added

The next game in the series optimised for playing on the appBlaster gaming platform. Clay pigeon Pull! combines our smoothest gameplay with unique functionality to bring Clay Pigeon shooting to life. Get shooting and see if you can beat yourself as well as your friends. Club and Competition levels will give traditional gameplay but played with changing speeds, clay size as well as time of day. With Blitz the clays bite back and with Swarm you may get overwhelmed but this makes our Clay Pigeon game unique. additionally with voice command activation of the clays as well as augmented reality options we bring clay pigeon into a different dimension.

With detailed information of around 10 museums and 40 featured attractions along with 1000s of other Points of Interest carefully integrated with every single travel activity, Glasgow travel is power packed with utilities and information. From Facebook Check-Ins to local event information, offline map to intuitive Augmented Reality experience, we have brought most of the travel activities and application needs to one single app. Save precious travel time rather than switching between several apps and utilities! • Practical travel guide with detailed information like attractions, getting around for each district of Glasgow City. • Travel utilities like hotel booking, currency converter, weather forecast, world clocks, reminder, alarm and many more available within the app. • Intuitive, easy-to-use one tap pane interface with tight social network integration for Check-Ins, photo sharing and places review. • Just one app for all your devices with dedicated UI and data sync capabilities. • Plan your itinerary and port your activity data between different devices and social network using our pangeaguides.com website. • Community sharing experience for your photos, reviews and travel memories with your friends and other fellow travelers. Premium features of Glasgow Travel Guide bring exclusive travel utilities that reduce travel planning hassles and make the experience fun and memorable. Premium features consists of - • A next generation modern marvel Augmented Reality experience that brings surrounded by wonders feeling. • Search for cafes, restaurants, theatres and even hospitals with carefully organized location data. Find more than 1000 Points of Interest around you and get directions to places of your interest. • Extremely detailed Glasgow offline map for no connectivity areas or internet availability (Connection required on first time use). • Comprehensive set of utilities and tools that will help you plan your trip. Organize checklist, send postcards, bringing a collection of useful travel apps within a single app. • Discover people, places and culture with information about upcoming local events. Designed and developed by the travelers, for the travelers that works in all parallel universe!
